hymns.title: Murinzi We, Vuz’ Impanda
verses: Murinzi, jy‘ uvuz’ impanda, Uhan’ umuntu wese; Ng’ uzumv’ izo nkuru nziza, Yihan’ akizw’ ibyaha.
Yivugirize mu mpinga, Mw’ ishyamba mu gisiza; Ndetse no mu nyanja hose, Bameny’ ako gakiza.
Yivugirize mu nzira, Mu rwiherero hose. Dat’ arabategereje, Ntacy’ ataringanije.
Uyivugiriz‘ indembe, Nazo zikizw’ ibyaha. Yes’ arabatumir’ ati: Nimuze mbaboneze.
hymns.refrain: Murinzi we vuz’ impanda! Yivuze cyane hose (hose), Menyesha bos’ ubutumwa, Imbohe zibohorwe.
hymns.author: Wm. J. Kirkpatrick

hymns.title: Umwam’ Ageze Kw‘Irembo
verses: Umwam’ ageze kw‘ irembo, Wabambwe ku musaraba; Yaje gukorany’ abera, Babane mw‘ ijuru.
Ibyerekana kuza kwe, Birihuta kuboneka; Kandi tugiye guhabwa, Kubaho kw‘ iteka.
Ntabw’ intambar’ izashira, Ntabw’ amahor‘ azahora, Kerek’ ibyaha n’ urupfu, Byatsembwe na Yesu.
Maze mw‘ isi yagizwe nshya, Niho tuzabahw‘ iteka; Kudapfa kwakuye gupfa, Dushiz’ agahinda.
hymns.refrain: Kw‘ irembo (Kw‘ irembo), Kw‘ irembo (Kw‘ irembo), Kw‘ irembo, Ub‘ ari kw‘ irembo; Nukw‘ araje (araje), Nukw‘ araje (araje), Kand‘ ageze kw‘ irembo
hymns.author: F. E. Belden

hymns.title: Nzabona Yesu
verses: Nzabona Yesu mu maso, Umuns’ azatujyana; Niho nzamwitegereza, Kw’ ari we wampfiriye.
Ubu ndamutekereza, Ariko simurora; Umuns’ uhiriw’ uzaza, Nzamubonan’ ubwiza.
Tuzishimir’ imbere ye, Ubw’ ishavu rishize; Ibigande biganduwe, N’ ahijimye hakeye.
Nzanezererw’ imbere ye, Nzamurora mumenye; Nzabana na Yes’ unkunda, Niwe Mukiza wanjye.
hymns.refrain: Nzamurora mu maso ye, Turi kumwe mw’ ijuru; Meny’ uk’ ubwiza bwe busa, Nzamusingiz’ iteka.
hymns.author: Grant Colfax Tullar

hymns.title: Har’ Amakuru Meza
verses: Har’ amakuru mez’ amenywa n’ abagenzi, Bazerera kure y’ iwabo, Kuk’ Umukiz’ agiye kuza mu bwiza bwe, Kand’ agiye kwim’ ingoma ye.
Ibituro by’ abera bos’ uko bangana, Byose bizakingurwa rwose; Kand’ inteko z’ abasinzira mu kuzimu, Bazongera gutura kw’ isi.
Nta kizadutanya mur’ iyo si nshya nziza, Tuzaririmb’ uko twakize. Abacunguwe bazaba bavuye hose, Baramy’ Umwami wo mw’ ijuru.
Haleluy’ amina, Haleluya iteka; Nitwitonda tuzahatura. Ba maso nezerwa, Kand’ ujye wiringira, Maz’ uzambar’ ikamba ryiza.
hymns.refrain: Azaza, ndabizi kw’ azagaruka, Nukw’ azaza rwos’ azaza. Abagenzi bose barembye, Bazakir’ Umukiza n’ aza kwima.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Murinzi We Menyesh’ Igihe
verses: Murinzi we! Menyesh’ igihe! Mbes’ iwacu n’ imuhero? At’ ijoro ryijimye cyane, Ariko buracya. Ntukarire, Gumy’ ugende, Nturorere kwiringira, Kugez’ igih’ uzasohora, Mu muns’ uhoraho.
Murwanyi we! Tyo mbwira nawe! Ansubiza yitonz’ ati: Intambar’ igiye gushira. Guma ku rugamba. Wibabara, Ihangane, Wirek’ imirimo yawe, Kuko tuzabon’ ibihembo, Tumaze gutsinda.
Ndacyabaz’ ibyaremwe byose, Binsubiza bitya biti: Iy’ is’ igiye guhanguka. Haz’ ind’ idashira. Ntukarir’ ibimenyetso, Byerekan’ aho tugeze, Kand’ ibintu byose byaremwe, Biriteg’ impanda.
Imuhir’ ubu ni bugufi, Tunezerwe mu mitima. Duhumure ko tuzakira, Dushir’ agahinda. Ntukarire tuzabana, Amakub’ azab’ ashize. Ntabwo tuzabur’ amahoro mu rugo rwa Data.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Mwebw’ Abera Mube Maso
verses: Mwebw’ abera mube maso, Ibyaremwe birahinda. Mukomez’ imuri zanyu, Mwiteg’ Umwam’ ari hafi.
Wibuk’ Umuvunyi wawe, Agakiza n’ imbabazi , Ikamba, icyubahiro. Jya wogez’ ako gakiza.
Nta bwami budahanguka; Wumv’ amagare y’ asuma. Bwira bos’ iby’ imbabazi, Ubu n’ igihe cy’ impuhwe.
Amoko yos’ azashira; Krist’ atebuts’ Ubwami bwe; Is’ igiye guhanguka; Nimwishim’ abahiriwe.
Banyabyaha mwe nimuze! Abitwarire kuri Se. Mwese nimugire bwangu! Imbabazi zikiriho.
hymns.refrain: Araje Yes’ araje! Azanye n’ icyubahiro. Yes’ aje kwim’ ingoma Ye, Araje, Yes’ araje.
hymns.author: Wm. J. Kirkpatrick

hymns.title: Ubwo Yes’ Azagaruka
verses: Ubwo Yes’ azagaruka, Kujyan’ abe bose, Bemeye kumuyoboka, N’ abatoni be.
Ubw’ azaza gukorany’ abo yatoye bose, Bera baboneye rwose, B’ abatoni be.
Yemwe bana! Yemwe bana! Bakund’ Umukiza; Abakunda, abakunda, Nk’ abatoni be.
hymns.refrain: Bazaka nk’ inyenyeri, Zitatse kw‘ ikamba rye; Bazatangaza cyane, Bakize rwose.
hymns.author: Geo. F. Root

hymns.title: Abarokots’ Ibyago Byo Hasi
verses: Abarokots’ ibyago yo hasi bazakoranywa, Ab’ azatumir’ azajyana nabo. Umwami n’ agaruk’ ikondera rye rizavuga, Amatek’ azab’ agiye gucibwa.
Uwo muns’ abapfuye muri Kristo bazazurwa, Bazava mu bituro nka we rwose. Abo yitoreye bazimana nawe mw ijuru, Ubw’ azagenda, azajyana nabo.
Niho tuzajya dukorer’ Umwami tudahwema; Tuzajya dusingiz’ urukundo rwe. Maz’ ubwo tuzarangiz’ imirimo yacu mw’ isi, Tuzateranywa tujyanwe mw’ ijuru.
hymns.refrain: Azaba yabararitse, Ubw’ azabahamagara (hamagara). Azaba yabararitse, Abazatumir’ azajyana nabo.
hymns.author: J. M. Black

hymns.title: Vuz’ Impanda Yumvikane Hose
verses: Vuz’ impanda yumvikane hose, Yesu agiye kuza! Muririmbe bagenzi mwishima, Yesu agiye kuza.
Mujye muhererekanya hose, Yesu agiye kuza! Azazan’ icyubahiro cyinshi, Yesu agiye kuza.
Yivugirize mu nyanja hose, Yesu agiye kuza! Yivugirize no mu bikombe, Yesu agiye kuza.
Mu misoz’ uyihavugirize, Yesu agiye kuza! Imiyag’ ijyan’ ayo makuru, Yesu agiye kuza.
Amok’ ubw’ azasubiranamo, Yesu agiye kuza! Ubwenge bwungukwa bwerekana, Ko Yes’ agiye kuza.
hymns.refrain: Ari hafi, Ari hafi, Umwam’ agiye kuza.
hymns.author: Geo. E. Lee

hymns.title: Duhurire Ku Mugezi
verses: Duhurire ku mugezi, Dusang’ abamarayika; Amazi yaw’ atunganye, Atemb’ av’ imbere y’ Imana.
Ku nkombe y’ uwo mugezi, Niho tuzatambagira, Turamy’ Umwami w’ iteka, Mu gihe cyiza kidashira.
Tuzagera ku mugezi, Dutur’ imitwaro yacu; Tuzakirishw’ imbabazi, Duhabw’ umwambaro n’ ikamba.
Ubw’ umugez’ uri hafi, Urugendo ruzashira; Tuzishima mu mitima, N’ indirimbo z’ umunezero.
Amok’ ubw’ azasubiranamo, Yesu agiye kuza! Ubwenge bwungukwa bwerekana, Ko Yes’ agiye kuza.
hymns.refrain: Nuko tujye ku mugezi! Duhurire n’ abera ku mugezi! Ku mugez’ utunganye w’ Imana, Utemb’ uv’ imbere y’ intebe.
hymns.author: Rev. Robert Lowry

hymns.title: Mukiza Ngukurikire
verses: Mukiza ngukurikire, Ah’ unshakira hose; Ah’ ujya ngukurikire, Mwami ngukurikire.
Nahw’ inzira yazitirwa, Naho yakukumuka, Ko wayinyuzemo mbere, Nyicamo mfit’ ishimwe.
Naho naterwa n’ ibyago, Nkageragezwa cyane, Warageragejwe nawe, Mwami ngukurikize.
Nib’ unyobora mw’ ishavu, Niba nkena nkanenwa, Wigeze kuba ruvumwa, Nanjye ngukurikize.
hymns.refrain: Mukiza ngukurikire, Wamviriy’ amaraso; Nib’ utagir’ ukwitaho, Njye nkwikurikirire.
hymns.author: James Lawson

hymns.title: Har’ Isoko
verses: Har’ isokw’ ivamw’ amaraso, Yo mu mitsi y’ Imanuweri. Niy’ atungany’ abanyabyaha, Bagashirahw’ inenge, Bagatsembwahw’ ibicumuro, Byose bikabacikaho. Niy’ atungany’ abanyabyaha, Bagashirahw’ inenge.
Igisambo ku musaraba, Kiyarabutswe cyarihannye; Nanjye mbwiriza nkwizigire, Noye kujya ncumura; Ibyaha mbicikeho rwose, Noye kujya nkugomera; Nanjye mbwiriza nkwizigire, Noye kujya ncumura.
Amaraso yaw’ atunganye, Ahoran’ imbaraga nyinshi; Niyo wacunguj’ itorero, Aritsembamw’ ibyaha; Ryaganjij’ imbaraga yabyo. Ryarabirokotse rwose. Niyo wacunguj’ itorero, Yaritsembyemw’ ibyaha.
Mperey’ igihe meny’ isoko, Iva mu bikomere byawe. Nogez’ urwo rukundo rwawe, Nzahora ngusingiza; Nzahora ngusingiz’ iteka, Nzajya ngusingiz’ iteka. Nogez’ urwo rukundo rwawe, Nzahora ngusingiza.
Mwami mpora ngucumuraho, Mpa kwizer’ imbabazi zawe! N’ amaraso yaw’ atunganye, Mpa kuramishwa nawe! Mpa kuramishwa nawe Yesu! Mpa no kuramishwa nawe! N’ amaraso yaw’ atunganye, Mpa kuramishwa nawe!
Har’ indirimbo zera ntazi, Nzaziririmbira mw’ ijuru. Naho nagobw’ ururim’ ubu, Uzarugobotora; Uzarugobotora Yesu, Ni wow’ uzankiza rwose. Naho nagobw’ ururim’ ubu, Uzarugobotora.
hymns.author: Unknown

hymns.title: Mwami Yesu Ndifuza K’ Umboneza
verses: Mwami Yesu ndifuza k’ umboneza; Ndashaka k’ umba mu mutim’ iteka. Noye kujya nita ku bigirwamana. Umboneze rwose nere ndush’ ingwa.
Mwami jy’ undebera ku ntebe yawe! Mpa gutamb’ igitambo kiboneye! Ndeke gushidikanya nitange rwose. Umboneze rwose nere ndush’ ingwa.
Yesu ndagutakambira nkomeje! Ngo mbon’ uko nkwitega Mwami mwiza! Ntunganish’ umuvu w’ amaraso yawe! Umboneze rwose nere ndush’ ingwa.
Mwami ngutegereje nihanganye, Yesu ngwin’ ump’ umutim’ utunganye! Nti wari wirengagiz’ abagushaka. Umboneze rwose nere ndush’ ingwa.
hymns.refrain: Ngo nere de ndush’ urubura! Mpa kwer’ ubu ngutunganire rwose!
hymns.author: Wm. G. Fischer

hymns.title: Wumv’ Amatur’ Agwa
verses: Wumv’ amatur’ agwa, Ukw’ ajegera. Yose n’ aya Yesu, Niwe dutura.
Ava mu tuganza, Wumv’ agumy’ agwa! N’ ituro rya Yesu, Ryo mu twana twe.
Ubu turi bato, Niyo dufite; Ubwo tuzakura, Tuzasumbyaho.
Nitugira bike, Tukwihe Mwami. Byos’ uzabyakira, Utwikirize.
hymns.refrain: Agwa, agwa, agwa, agwa, Amatur’ agwa, Yose n’ aya Yesu, Niwe dutura.
hymns.author: Wm. J. Kirkpatrick

hymns.title: Urukundo Rwa Yesu
verses: Urukundo rwa Yesu, Rwageze kuri twebwe; Rudukuraho rwose, Urubanza rwo gupfa.
Abatari bahabwa, Ubugingo bw’ iteka, Twihute tubabwire, Urukundo rwa Yesu.
Kuko yaradukunze, Yadupfiriye twese, Natwe dukunde dutyo, Abakiri mu byaha.
Aho Yes’ azazira, Aje kwim’ ingoma ye, Nibwo tuzumv’ ijwi rye, Ati: Mwakoze neza.
Akir’ uyu mutima, Weze maz’ ub’ uwawe, Wambambiwe ku giti, Nzagukunda mb’ uwawe.
hymns.refrain: Aradukunda, Aradukunda, Aradukunda, Yesu Mutabazi.
hymns.author: William B. Bradbury

hymns.title: Mbonez’ Intoke Zanjye
verses: Mbonez’ intoke zanjye, Zibonere rwose; Ko nazihaye Yesu, Ngo zimukorere.
Nteg’ amatwi ngo numve, Nez’ umunsi wose. Nkor’ ibikwiye numva, Ntagir’ icyo mpuga.
Mpang’ amabokw’ amaso, Ngo ndeb’ iby’ akora; Nyabuze kwenderanya, Akorere Yesu.
hymns.refrain: Nitondesh’ intambwe, Aho njya hose. Ne kuyobok’ undi, Keretse Yesu.
hymns.author: J. H. Rosecrans

hymns.title: Njye Nsingiz’ Urukundo
verses: Njye nsingiz’ urukundo, Nirwo rumbwiriza, Kugirir’ abandi neza, Bakamenya Yesu.
Iyi s’ ibamw’ ishavu, N’ ibyaha n’ urupfu; Ntibimbuza kuyobora bamw’ ibwami bwawe.
Maz’ ibyo nibishira, Tuzabe mw’ ijuru, Tuzajye tuguhimbaza, Mwami w’ urukundo.
hymns.refrain: Data we ko nd’ umwana wawe! Data we Ngukurikize! Njye nsingiz’ urukundo, Nirwo rumbwiriza, Kugirir’ abandi neza, Bakamenya Yesu.
hymns.author: F.E. Belden

hymns.title: Yemwe Ngabo Z’ Umwami
verses: Yemwe ngabo z’ Umwami! Nimutabare! Tujyane na Yesu! Niw’ utabaza. Twitwaz’ umusaraba! Utujy’ imbere! Mwese nimuze tugabe! Tunesh’ Umwanzi.
Ababisha bahunga, Babony’ intwari. Nimuze tuneshe, Ngabo z’ Umwami! Intangiriro z’isi zinyeganyezwa, N’ ibyishimo by’ ab’ Umwami, bamusingiza.
Itorero ry’ Imana, Rirafatanya; Rirahaguruka, Kunesh’ Umwanzi. Nta kizaduteranya, Turakundana, Duhora duhuj’ inama, Twizera kimwe.
Nta ngoma zidashira, Zirahanguka. Arikw’ itorero, Rizahoraho. Ukuzimu n’ urupfu, Ntibiririnda. Twarazwe na Yesu Kristo, Ntabw’ ahemuka.
Nuko mugabe mwese! Tugerereze. Tubumbire hamwe, Amajwi yacu, Turirimbe dushima, Umwami Yesu, Kukw’ afit’ icyubahiro, Giheranije.
hymns.refrain: Yemwe ngabo z’ Umwami mwese! Dutabare twese! Tujyane na Yesu, Dutsind’ Umwanzi.
hymns.author: Sir Artbur Sillivan

hymns.title: Ba Mas’ Udacumura
verses: Ba mas’ udacumura! Ibyaha bigota, Bihora bikwegera cyane, Ng’ utajya mw’ ijuru.
Ba maso rwana senga! Nturek’ urugamba! Ururasany’ iminsi yose, Utabaz’ Imana.
Komeza nturanesha! Wirekur’ intwaro! Dor’ intambara ntirashira, Udahaw’ ikamba.
hymns.author: Lowell Mason

hymns.title: Huguka Mutima Wanjye!
verses: Huguka mutima wanjye! Shishikarir’ ibyiza! Ukomez’ urwan’ ishyaka! Uzambikw’ ikamba.
N’ Iman’ iguhamagara, Gira bwangu witabe! Niy’ iziher’ ibihembo, Abatsinze bose.
Inteko zikurebera, Ziragutegereje, Ntutekerez’ ah’ uvuye, Reb’ imbere yawe.
Mukiza wacu dukunda, Twanesheje ku bwawe, Ubu twaje kugushima, Turagusingiza.
hymns.author: Thomas A. Arne

hymns.title: Ndeger’ Umusaraba
verses: Ndeger’ umusaraba, Naniwe nkennye mpumye, Singir’ icyo nitaho, Rwose nshaka gukizwa.
Nakwifujije kera, Njya mbabazwa n’ ibyaha. Yes’ ambwira nez’ ati: Ngukiz’ ibicumuro.
Ubu ndakwihereje, Simbuzwa n’ iby’ iyi si. Mb’ uwawe rwose Mwami, Nguhay’ ibyanjye byose.
Ndiringir’ iby’ uvuga, Wamviriy’ amaraso. Ubu ndicuza cyane, Mbambanywe n’ Umukiza.
Nezezwa n’ uko nkize, Yesu niw’ unkomeza. Nta nenge nsigaranye, Mp’ itam’ icyubahiro.
hymns.refrain: Mwami ndakwizigira, Mukiza wanjye mwiza! Ndicuz’ imbere yawe, Mwami Yes’ unkiz’ ubu!
hymns.author: W. G. Fischer, by Per

hymns.title: Mwami Mp’ Umugisha Wawe
verses: Mwami mp’ umugisha wawe, Uhera bos’ ubusa. Ndakwinginga ntumpiteho! Arik’ umpire none.
Ntunsige mubyeyi mwiza, Ibyaha byandembeje; Nkwiriye gucibwa rwose, Arik’ umbabarire.
Niba natinze mu byaha, Njya nkubabaza cyane; Niba ngoswe n’ iby’ iyi si, Ubinkuremo rwose.
Ntumpiteho Mwuka Wera! Niw’ uhumur’ impumyi. Unyemez’ uhamya Yesu! Mbwir’ ibimpumuriza.
hymns.refrain: Umpire! Umpire! Ngo ntatahan’ ubusa.
hymns.author: W. B. Bradbury

hymns.title: Untambe Hejuru Mwuka Wera
verses: Untambe hejuru Mwuka Wera, Ngo mpirwe nawe! Nyuzuz’ umugisha wawe, Ngwino ngwin’ unyuzure!
Ushobora kunyuzura, Ariko sinz’ uburyo. Ndagushaka Mwuka Wera, Ngwino ngwin’ unyuzure!
Sinkomeye ndababaye, Ndunam’ imbere yawe. Mwuka mwiza wo mw ijuru, Mp’ urukundo nyuzura.
Ngwin’ unyeze kand’ unkize! Tuz’ umutima wanjye! Niw’ umpumuriz’ unkiza, Unyuzure rwos’ ubu.
hymns.refrain: Nyuzura! nyuzura! Yesu ngwin’ unyuzure! Nyuzuz’ umugisha wawe! Ngwino ngwin’ unyuzure!
hymns.author: Jno. R. Sweney

hymns.title: Ndagushak’ Iteka
verses: Ndagushak’ iteka, Mwami mwiza cyane, Ijwi ryawe ryiza, Rizan’ amahoro.
Ndagushak’ iteka, Jy’ ungum’ iruhande. Ntsind’ amoshya yose, Iyo turi kumwe.
Ndagushak’ iteka, Ntuje n’ iyo nganya. Ngwin’ ubu tubane! Mbone gutungana.
Ndagushak’ iteka, Nyigish’ iby’ ushaka! Nkwinging’ unsohorez’ amasezerano!
Ndagushak’ iteka, Mwami Wera rwose, Nyobora mb’ uwawe, Wowe munyahirwe!
hymns.refrain: Ku manywa na n’ ijoro, Ndagushak’ iteka. Mpir’ ubu Mukiza we! Twigumanire.
hymns.author: Rev. R. Rowry

hymns.title: Yesu Nd’ Uwawe Nyakira
verses: Yesu nd’ uwawe nyakira, N’ ibyanjye mfite byose! Njye ngukunda nkwizigire, Nkomeze nkuyoboke.
Yesu nd’ uwawe nyakira! Niyoroshye nkuramye. Mpaz’ ibyishimo byo hasi, Ubu Yesu nyakira!
Yesu nd’ uwawe nyakira! Mukiza ngir’ uwawe! Tum’ Umwuka Wer’ ambwire, Kuko naw’ ur’ uwanjye!
Yesu nguhaye byos’ ubu, Umwuk’ ampay’ umwete! Nsingiz’ imbabazi zawe, Nkuramye bihimbaje.
hymns.refrain: Nguhaye byose, Nguhaye byose. Mucunguzi wanjye mwiza,Nguhaye byose.
hymns.author: W. S. Weeden

hymns.title: Ubu Nj’ Uko Ndi
verses: Ubu nj’ uko ndi nta kindi cyankiza. Ndokoresh’ amaraso yawe. Nitaby’ ijwi ryawe rimpamagaye, Ndaje, Ntama y' Imana ndaje.
Nj’ uko ndi nyakir’ ubu ngubu Yesu! Nyez’ umutima nkir’ ibyaha! Wowe Nyir’ amaras’ akiza rwose, Ndaje, Ntama y' Imana ndaje.
Nj’ uko ndi mbuyerezwa n’ ubugome. Njya nanizwa nuko nd’ intebyi, Mfit’ ibindwanya byinshi bincogoza, Ndaje, Ntama y' Imana ndaje.
Nj’ uko ndi nd’ umuhanya, ndi n’ impumyi. Gutungana mbikesha wowe, Ibyamboneza nabibon’ iwawe. Ndaje, Ntama y' Imana ndaje.
Nj’ uko ndi nizigiye k’ unyakira, Nizey’ isezerano ryawe; Yuk’ uzankiza kand’ uzamboneza. Ndaje, Ntama y' Imana ndaje.
Nj’ uko ndi guhamy’ urukundo rwawe, Ko rwambohoy’ ingoyi zose. Uherey’ ubu mbay’ uwawe rwose. Ndaje, Ntama y' Imana ndaje.
hymns.author: W. B. Bradbury

hymns.title: Dushim’ Imana
verses: Dushim’ Imana kubw’ Umwana wayo, Kubw’ Umukiza waducunguye twese.
Dushim’ Imana kubw’ Umwuka Wera; Atubwiriza kumvir’ Iyaturemye.
Dushim’ Intama yatambwe ku bwacu, Yatway’ ibyaha byac’ adukiza rwose.
Dushimir’ Iman’ imbabazi zayo, Yaratuguz’ itugir’ abana bayo.
Twonger’ umwete, Twuzuz’ urukundo; Umuntu wes’ akuyobokan’ ubwira.
hymns.refrain: Haleluya Nyirigira, Haleluy’ amina; Haleluya Nyirigira, Twonger’ umwete.
hymns.author: J. J. Husband

hymns.title: Shaka Gutungana
verses: Shaka gutungana, Jy’ uhor’ usenga; Bana n’ Uwiteka, Ujy’ umwumvira; Jy’ ukund’ Abakristo, Fash’ abarembye; Ntuhuge na hato, Gushak’ ihirwe.
Shaka gutungana, Hagomye benshi; Horana na Yesu, Mu rwiherero. N’ umwitegereza, Uzaba nka we; Bose bazamenya, K’ umeze nka we.
Shaka gutungana, Akuyobore. Ty’ itond’ imbere ye, N’ ugir’ ibyago, Uk’ umera kose, Jy’ umwiyambaza. J y’ uyoboka Yesu, Mwumvire rwose.
Shaka gutungana, Tuz’ umutima. Tekerez’ ibyiza, Wihutiraho. Jya wumvir’ Umwuka, Gwiz’ urukundo; Uzatunganira, Kuba mw’ ijuru.
hymns.author: Geo. C. Sebbins

hymns.title: Ungumane
verses: Ungumane ko bugiye kwira, Haj’ umwijima Mwam’ ungumane. Ubwo bagenzi banjye bansiga, Nkaba jyenyine, Mwam’ ungumane.
Mur’ iyi si byose birashira, Nta munezer’ uhaba na hato; Nta kidapfa, nta kidahinduka; Wow’ udahinyuka, ungumane.
Mwami niwe nshak’ iteka ryose, Nta moshya ntsinda tutari kumwe. Nta wabasha kunyobora nkawe. Mwam’ iteka ryose, ungumane.
N’ ungumana, nta mubisha ntinya; Ishavu rizab’ umunezero; Imbori z’ urupfu zizashira; Ntabwo ntazanesha n’ ungumana.
hymns.author: Wm. H Monk

hymns.title: Ngah’ Umuns’ Urakuze
verses: Ngah’ umuns’ urakuze, Burije turuhuke; Kand’ ubw’ imuri z’ ijoro zaka turamy’ Uwiteka, Twebwe twese.
Mwami nyir’ ubugingo, Terany’ abagushaka; Buzuze bos’ urukundo, Ubagir’ ubwoko bwawe, Bakuramye.
Umwijima n’ ugwira, Dukingir’ imbabazi; Tukwegerez’ imitima, Hirya y’ ubwiza bw’ ijuru, Ngo duhirwe.
Duhe kukwiringira, Ng’ ubwo tuzapfa Mwami, Twongere kubon’ umucyo, Ijoro rishir’ iteka, Tugushime.
hymns.refrain: Wera, Wera, Wera, Mwam’ Imana. Wigwij’ ahantu hose, Nta kitaguh’ ishimwe, Mwam’ Imana.
hymns.author: W. F. Sherwin

hymns.title: Mukiza We Niwe Mucyo Waka
verses: Mukiza we! Niwe mucyo waka. Ntabw’ umwijim’ uhangar’ ah’ uri, Nyamururahw ibinyoshya, Bituma nanduranya nawe.
Mukiza mu gihe njya kuryama, Ngo nduhuk’ imirimo nakoze, Umpe kugutekereza, Ngo nsinzire ndi kumwe nawe.
Umpagarik’ umunsi n’ ijoro; Ntabwo nabaho tutari kumwe; Ungumane mu makuba, Kuko ntinya gupf’ utahari.
N’ ubwo nkanguk’ ungume bugufi; N’ aho ndibujye gukora hose, Kugez’ ubwo nzaz’ iwawe, Meny’ urukundo rwawe rwose.
hymns.author: Peter Ritter

hymns.title: Yesu N’ Urutare Rwacu
verses: Yesu n’ urutare rwacu, N’ ubwugamo bw’ umugaru; Niw’ udukiz’ amakuba, N’ ubwugamo bw’ umugaru.
Ankiz’ amakub’ iteka, N’ ubwugamo bw’ umugaru. Ntacyo ntinya turi kumwe, N’ ubwugamo bw’ umugaru.
Imivu n’ isum’ itera, N’ ubwugamo bw’ umugaru. N’ Umukiza wacu mwiza, N’ ubwugamo bw’ umugaru.
Rutare rwiza rushimwa! Ubwugamo bw’ umugaru! Jy’ utuvuna mu makuba! Ubwugamo bw’ umugaru.
hymns.refrain: Rutare rwisungwa n’ abantu! Gicucu cy’ uburuhukiro! Muyobozi mwiz’ utayobya! Ubwugamo bw’ umugaru.
hymns.author: F.E. Belden

hymns.title: Ndanezerwa Kw’ Anyobora
verses: Ndanezerwa kw’ anyobora, Arampumurish’ Ijambo rye. Mu byo nkora, n’ aho ngenda, N’ukoboko kwa Yesu kunyobora.
Niba ngir’ ishavu ryinshi, Cyangwa nubwo nezerwa cyane. Mu mahoro n’ amakuba, N’ ukuboko kwa Yesu kunyobora.
Mwami nshaka ko tubana; Ntabwo nzinuba nitotomba; Nzagumya nishime cyane, K’ ukuboko kwa Yesu kunyobora.
Ndangij’ imirimo yanjye, Nesheje kubw’ imbabazi ze; Ntacyo nzatinya n’ urupfu, K’ ukuboko kwa Yesu kunyobora.
hymns.refrain: Aranyobora nkanezerwa, N’ ukw’ anyoboresh’ ukuboko kwe. Nshaka kumukorera neza, Yuk’ ukuboko kwe kunyobora.
hymns.author: Wm.B. Bradbury

hymns.title: Nimbon’ Amahoro
verses: Nimbon’ amahoro yomboka nk’ uruzi, Naho naba mfit’ ishavu, Uko mba kose, Njya nkunda kuvuga Nti: Nguwe neza mu mutima.
Satani n’ antera, Nkagira n’ ibyago, Nkomezwa no kwiringira, Kuko Kristo yabonye ko nd’ intebyi; Ni ko kumvir’ amaraso ye.
Nshima cyane kuko mbabariw’ ibyaha, Nta na kimwe cyasigaye; Byabambanywe nawe ku musaraba; Mutima wanjye shim’ Umwami.
Mwami tebuts’ umuns’ uzagarukaho, Ubw’ ibicu bizarundwa, Impand’ ivuze, Umwam’ amanuke Nti: Nguwe neza mu mutima.
hymns.refrain: Ni neza (ni neza) ndatuje (ndatuje); Ko nguwe neza mu mutima.
hymns.author: P.P. Bliss

hymns.title: Nkund’ Ubucuti
verses: Nkund’ ubucuti buva mw’ ijuru, Nisung’ amaboko y’ iteka. Ngiz’ amahirwe, mbony’ amahoro, Nisunz’ amaboko y’ iteka.
Nezerwa n’ uko Yes’ anyobora; Nisung’ amaboko y’ iteka. Nunguk’ ishimwe, Ngakiranuka; Nisunz’ amaboko y’ iteka.
Nta bwoba mfite, Nshiz’ agahinda, Nisunz’ amaboko y’ iteka. Nguwe nez’ ubu, Ndatunganiwe. Nisunz’ amaboko y’ iteka.
hymns.refrain: S. na A.: Nkiza! Nkiza! Ndokor’ amakuba yose! Nkiza! Nkiza! Nisunz’ amaboko y’ iteka. T. na B.: Nkiza Yesu! Nkiza Yesu nkiza! Ndokor’ amakuba yose! Nkiza Yesu! Nkiza Yesu nkiza! Nisunz’ amaboko y’ iteka.
hymns.author: A. J. Showalter, by Per

hymns.title: Ni Wowe Nizeye
verses: Ni wowe nizeye, Ntama y’ i Kalwari, We Mukiza! Ngusab’ unyumvire, Nkiz’ ibicumuro, Mperey’ ubu Mwami, Nkuyoboke.
Nyuzuz’ imbabazi, Ngir’ inama nziza, Nter’ umwete; Kuko wampfiriye, Nkwerek’ urukundo, Rudatuba rwaka, Nk’ umuriro.
Ni ngotwa n’ ibyaha, Nkagira n’ ishavu, Unyobore. Nkura mu mwijima, Ntsembahw’ amaganya, Kandi ntundekere, Kure yawe.
hymns.author: Lowell Mason

hymns.title: Nkuyoboke Mwami
verses: Nkuyoboke Mwami, Nkuyoboke. N’ aho natendekwa ku musaraba, Naba nkiririmba: Nkuyoboke Mwami, Nkuyoboke Mwami, Nkube bugufi.
Nkuyoboke Mwami, Nkuyoboke. Mu makuba yose, Mpagarikira! Ni nterwa n’ ibyago, Umpe kwihangana, Nkuyoboke Mwami, Nkube bugufi.
Nkuyoboke Mwami, Nkuyoboke. Jy’ untabar’ iteka ngumye nkwizere! Umwanzi n’ antera, Ujy’ undwanirira! Nkuyoboke Mwami, Nkube bugufi.
Nkuyoboke Mwami, Nkuyoboke. Wakinguy’ ijuru, Nyobor’ ah’ uri. Mugenzi komera, Urenda gukira! Nkuyoboke Mwami, Nkube bugufi.
hymns.author: Lowell Mason

hymns.title: Unambe Ku Mana
verses: Unambe ku Mana, ntuyimure; Bona n’ uterwa n’ impagarara, Uzagarukirwa na Rutare, Iyo tugoswe n’ ibyaha.
Nambir’ ukuri jya wihangana, Komez’ ubutwari no kwizera! Rutar’ aduha kuganziriza, Mur’ iy’ isi y’ igomero.
Nambir’ ukuri birakwiriye, We kurambirw’ uzagororerwa. Rutare niw’ uduh’ amahoro, Tumaze gutsind’ ibyago.
hymns.refrain: Dukomerera kuri Kristo Rutare, Niwe Rutare twisunga. Nitwihangana tuzab’ amahoro, Tugez’ imbere y’ Imana.
hymns.author: W.H Doane

hymns.title: Nkomeze Njye Niringira
verses: Nkomeze njye niringira, Amaraso y’ Umukiza. Sinagir’ undi niganana, Keretse Yesu wenyine.
Umwijima n’ umpumisha, Niringir’ imbabazi ze. Mu makuba no mu byago, Ntagir’ ubw’ anzibukira.
Mbonezwa n’ amaraso ye, Ampa kumukurikira. Niyo nababaye rwose, Aramfasha ngakomera.
N’ aza kw’ ijwi ry’ ikondera, Azasanga mwiteguye; Nambaye gukiranuka, Nta nenge nzaba ngifite.
hymns.refrain: Nikomeze ku Rutare, Nahw’ ahandi n’ umusenyi; Nahw’ ahandi n’ umusenyi.
hymns.author: Wm.B. Bradbry

hymns.title: Tubane N’ Uwami
verses: Tubane n’ Umwami, Twumvir’ ijambo rye; Atujyana mu nzira nziza, Tumwumviye rwose. Akabana natwe, N’ abamwizer’ uko bangana.
Ntihakingirizwa, Nta gicu gikuba, Byeyurwa no kumwenyura kwe. Nta shiti n’ ubwoba, Bona n’ igishyika, Bimarwa n’ uko tumwizeye.
Nta kitubabaza, Nta shavu tugira; Niw’ uduhembur’ imbu zose; Nta bworo n’ isari, Nta n’ umubabaro; Tuzahirwa ni tumwizera.
Ntabwo twiyungura, Kugir’ ibyishimo, Kugeza ko tureka byose, Kubw’ imbabazi ze; Impan’ ajy’ atanga, N’ ingororano z’ abizeye.
Tuzajya twishima, Turi kumwe nawe. Tuzagendana naw’ iteka, Tumwumvira rwose; Azajy’ adutuma, Ntacyo tuzaba tugitinya.
hymns.refrain: Jy’ umwumvira, Nta kandi gakiza, Keretse Yesu gusa; Mwizigire rwose.
hymns.author: D.B. Towner by Per

hymns.title: Yes’ Abe Hamwe Nawe Hose
verses: Yes’ abe hamwe nawe hose! Akugir’ inama nziza! Agucyure mu bushyo bwe! Yes’ abe hamwe nawe hose!
Yes’ abe hamwe nawe hose! Akurinde mu makuba! Akwongere man’ iteka! Yes’ abe hamwe nawe hose!
Yes’ abe hamwe nawe hose! Ubuyerezwa n’ ibyaha, Agukingir’ ukuboko! Yes’ abe hamwe nawe hose!
Yes’ abe hamwe nawe hose! Jy’ uguman’ urukundo rwe! Tsind’ urupf’ imbere yawe! Yes’ abe hamwe nawe hose!
hymns.refrain: Kugez’ ubwo (ubwo) tuzabonana, Ubwo tuzabana na Yesu (na Yesu). Kugez’ ubwo (ubwo) tuzabonana, Yes’ abe hamwe nawe hose.
hymns.author: W.G. Tomer

hymns.title: Iyo Turi Kumwe N’ Inshuti
verses: Iyo turi kumwe n’ inshuti, Nta kitubabaza, Arikw’ iyo dutandukanye, Tugir’ agahinda.
Iyo twibuts’ inshuti zacu, Turishima cyane. Nitumar’ imirimo yacu, Tuzaban’ iteka.
Ntabwo tuzasezeranaho, Tugeze mw’ ijuru; Tuzahahoran’ ibyishimo, Turirimb’ iteka.
hymns.refrain: Mw’ ijuru ntituzatana, Tuzahahorana. Mur’ iyo si y’ amahoro, Ntabwo tuzatana.
hymns.author: J.H. Tenney

hymns.title: Gupfa Twiringiye Yesu
verses: Gupfa twiringiye Yesu, Kubera n’ ugusinzira. Nta wukangurwamw arira, Ntaw’ umwanz’ ashukirayo.
Gusinzira muri Yesu, N’ uburuhukiro bwiza, N’ amahirwe y’ abizeye, Ko bazahabw’ ubugingo.
Gusinzira muri Yesu, No gukangurwamo nawe, N’ imbaraga y’ Umukiza; Ntabw’ izabuzwa n’ ibyago.
Gusinzira muri Yesu, Kuzurwa n’ ijwi ry’ impanda. Maz’ ibituro bivemo, Abera bose barame.
hymns.author: Wm.B. Bradbury

hymns.title: Ibyo Nkora Nkiriho
verses: Ibyo nkora nkirihw’ aho bizarangirira, Ubwo kudapfa kuzakura gupfa; Ni mara gukira nzabon’ U mukiza wanjye, Kand’ azab’ anyakiran’ ibyishimo.
Nzanezerwa mbony’ uburanga bwe buhebuje, N’ amaso y’ akey’ arabagirana; Nzajya musingiza mpimbawe n’ urukundo rwe, Ko yambonerej’ aheza mw’ ijuru.
Ntabwo mpug’ abadusezeyeho bajya kure, Ubwo twatandukaniye ku cyambu. Ni tujya mw’ ijuru nta kizadutandukanya, Cyane nifuza kubon’ Umukiza.
Azanjyana mu mudugudu utabamw’ ishavu, Niho nzambarir’ imyambaro yera, Nzaririmbana n’ aber’ indirimbo ya Mose; Cyane ndifuza kubon’ Umukiza.
hymns.refrain: Nzamumenya, Nzamumenya; Nzahagarar’ imbere Ye nkize. Nzamumenya, Nzamumenya, Mbony’ inkovu zo mu biganza bye.
hymns.author: John R. Sweney

hymns.title: Umpe Bibiliya
verses: Umpe Bibiliya kukw’ ari y’ inezeza, Uyinyoboresh’ iteka Mwami. Nta kibasha kuzimy’ umucyo wayo, Ko Yesu yaje kuyitwumvisha.
Umpe Bibiliya mu kababaro kanjye, Igihe mpigwa n’ ibyaha byanjye. Umpe n’ amagambo Yesu yavuze, Kukw’ ariyo mez’ ampumuriza.
Umpe Bibiliya ngw’ imurikir’ iteka; Kand’ indind’ imitego yo hasi; Niyo rumuri rwaka mu mwijima, Runyerek’ inzira y’ amahoro.
Umpe Bibiliya ngw’ imbwir’ iby’ ubugingo, Kand’ udukomerez’ uwo mucyo. Ngo tumeny’ inzir’ igana mw’ ijuru, Unyerek’ ubwiza bwawe Data.
hymns.refrain: Umpe Bibiliya kukw’ ariy’ inezeza, Nyoborwe nayo mu nzira ntoya. Amategeko yawe niyo meza, Agaragaz’ inzira y’ ukuri.
hymns.author: E. S. Lopenz

hymns.title: Jy’ Uhor’ Undinganirije
verses: Jy’ uhor’ undinganirije, Amagamb’ atunganye. Umpugure meny’ ukuri, Kw’ amagambo yawe. Nkund’ amagambo yawe, Kw’ ampa kukwizigira.
Krist’ ahet’ abantu bose, Amagamb’ atunganye. Nimwitabe banyabyaha! Mwumv’ iby’ ubugingo! Abayoboz’ ituza, N’ amagamb’ atunganye.
Menyesha bos’ ubutumwa! N’ amagamb’ atunganye! Nimuze mubabarirwe! Mwumv’ iby’ ubugingo! Yesu niwe Mukiza, Utwonger’ ubugingo.
hymns.refrain: Amagambo meza cyane, Anter’ ibyishimo byinshi; Niyo meza, ndayakunda; Ntabw’ atanezeza.
hymns.author: P.P. Bliss

hymns.title: Mpagaze Ku Nkengero Ya Yorodani
verses: Mpagaze ku nkengero ya Yor’dani nubur’ amaso, Ndor’ igihugu cyiza cy’ i Kanani, nihw’ ibyanjye biri.
Hakurya mur’ ibyo bibaya, Hahor’ umucy’ iteka. Yesu Kristo niw’ uzahaber’ umucy’ ahakur’ ijoro.
Aho heza nzahagera ryari ngo mpabe mpiriwe? Nzareba Data mu maso ryari nduhukiy’ ibwami bwe?
Mfit’ ibyishimo mu mutima, Sinshaka kugum’ aha. Yor’ dan’ isumira hos’ ariko ntinyuka kuyambuka.
hymns.refrain: N’ igihugu cyiza cy’ amahoro, Hakurya ku nkengero haratoshye; Tuzahavugir’ indirimbo ya Mose, Tubane na Yes’ iteka.
hymns.author: T. C. O'Kane

hymns.title: Tuzishim’ Imirim’ Ishize
verses: Tuzishim’ imirim’ ishize, Abasarurir’ Imana, Bashohoj’ umusaruro, I Yerusalemu nshya.
Tuzishima no kuririmba, Tuzajya dushima Kristo. Tuzamuhimbariza rwos’ i Yerusalemu nshya.
Tuzahishimira by’ ukuri, Tuzaba mu mazu yera; Yesu yaduteguriye, I Yerusalemu nshya.
hymns.refrain: Ishimwe hazabahw’ ishimwe, Ntabw’ ishimwe rizahashira, Umunsi w’ ishimw’ uri hafi, Duteranir’ iwacu.
hymns.author: F.E. Belden

hymns.title: Ntabwo Ndatekereza
verses: Ntabwo ndatekereza, Kw’ iwac’ ari bugufi. Uko bukeye negereza, Gusohora mw ijuru.
Ku rurembo rwa Data, Hariy’ amazu menshi; Yateguriy’ abera bose, Ngo babane na Yesu.
Ninjya kuger’ iwacu, Nzururuts’ umutwaro; Nzoroherwa n’ umubabaro, Nambar’ ikamba ryiza.
Ningera ku nkengero, Nzaba ngeze bugufi; Nzaba negerey’ i muhira, Ngiye kuger’ iwacu.
hymns.refrain: Hafi y’ iwacu, Hafi yaho; Ubu ngeze hafi y’ iwacu, Ngiye gusohorayo.
hymns.author: Philip Phillips

hymns.title: Har’ Igihugu Cyiza Cyane
verses: Har’ igihugu cyiza cyane, Twasezeraniwe n’ Imana; Tugitegereze twizera, Ko Dat’ akitubonereza.
Tuzaririmbira mw’ ijuru, Indirimbo z’ abanyahirwe. Ntituzongera kubabara, Tuzaba dushiz’ agahinda.
Tuzasingiza Data cyane, Ku mbabazi yatugiriye, No ku buntu bw’ urukundo rwe, N’ umugisha yatwungukiye.
hymns.refrain: Aheza (aheza) mw’ ijuru (mw’ ijuru), Tuzahurirayo bagenzi. Aheza (aheza) mw’ ijuru (mw’ ijuru), Tuzahurirayo bagenzi.
hymns.author: J.P. Webstar

hymns.title: Tubatirish’ Umwuka Wera
verses: Tubatirishe Umwuka Wera, Mukiza twegere, duh’ urukundo.
Turatakamba, Twazize byinshi, Udukiz’ utweze, Twishwe n’ ibyaha.
Mwuka Wera we, Tumanukire! Duhire rwos’ ubu, Duh’ imbabazi.
Ngir’ ijwi ryiza, Ryavuze riti: Ur’ Umwana wanjye, ni wowe nkunda.
hymns.refrain: Ubu Mwami Yesu turakwinginga, Tubatirish’ Umwuka, Duh’ urukundo.
hymns.author: W.A. Ogden, by Per

hymns.title: Ngwino Soko Y ‘ Umugisha
verses: Ngwino soko y’ umugisha, Mp’ umutim’ ugushima. Migez’ idakama myiza, Tugusingize cyane. Unyigishe kukuramy’ iteka, Kandi meny’ ubwiza bwawe. Kwiringir’ ubwami bwawe, Kunyuzuz’ urukundo.
Nshyirahw’ icyibutso cyanjye, Niho ngeze kubwawe. Ndizeye yuk’ uzanjyana, Nger’ iwaw’ amahoro. Yesu yantaruye nazimiye, Nari ndi kure y’ Imana; Ashaka kunkiz’ urupfu, Yatanz’ ubugingo bwe.
Ndimw’ ubwishyu bwawe Mwami, Bw’ imbabaz’ ungiriye. Nyigiza bugufi bwawe, Meny’ urukundo rwawe. Ngoswe n’ ibingerageza byinshi, Ngo ndek’ iyo Mana nkunda. Akir’ umutima wanjye Undinde nkire rwose.
hymns.author: Nettleton

hymns.title: Mwuka Wera Muyobozi
verses: Mwuka Wera Muyobozi, Ube hafi y’ abakristo! Mfat’ ukuboko nyobora, Nd’ umugenzi ku gahinga. Abananiwe bishima, Ubwo bumv’ ijwi ryiza, Ribabwira: Bagenzi mwe, Nimuze mbagez’ iwanyu!
Ntuduhemukir’ iteka, Ntabwo wanga kudufasha. Dukomeze tukwizere, Dukabakabe hijimye. Amakuba n’ aboneka, Imitima nikuka, Ijwi riti: Bagenzi mwe, Nimuze mbagez’ iwanyu!
Tumaz’ imirimo yacu, Dutegereze gukizwa, Dusigarany’ iby’ ijuru, Twibaze ko twanditsweyo. Twikingir’ ibidutera, No kwiringira Yesu. Ijwi riti: Bagenzi mwe, Nimuze mbagez’ iwanyu!
hymns.author: M. M. Wells

hymns.title: Harihw’ Icyo Nkwaka Mwami
verses: Harihw’ icyo nkwaka Mwami, Nubwo mpora ngucumuraho, Unyejeshe, unyejeshe! Amazi cyangw’ umuriro.
N’ untunganiriz’ ubwenge, Nzanezerwa nzagusingiza; Arik’ umutima wera, Urutaho, urutaho.
Ninezw’ umutima wanjye, Niho nzunguk’ ubwenge bwose, Mbubwirijwe nawe Mwami, Bwo mw’ ijuru, bwo mw’ ijuru.
Njya nirind’ ibicumuro, Nkitonder’ ibyo ntekereza. Mwami n’ ibyo nkora byose, Ntabwo nera, Ntabwo nera.
hymns.refrain: Mpanagurwe hose Mwami! N’ umuriro nib’ ushaka. Nkir’ ibyaha, birimburwe. Nkir’ ibyaha, birimburwe.
hymns.author: Fred H. Byshe

hymns.title: Har’ Ubwo Wasanze Yesu?
verses: Har’ ubwo wasanze Yesu ng’ ukire? Se wuhagijw’ amaraso ye? Ubu wizeye rwos’ imbabazi ze? Se wuhagijw’ amaraso ye?
Mbes’ ugendana na Yesu iteka? Se wuhagijw’ amaraso ye? Mbes’ ujy’ ubana n’ uwari wabambwe? Se wuhagijw’ amaraso ye?
Umukwe n’ az’ uzab’ umwiteguye? Se wuhagijw’ amaraso ye? Mbes’ uzakundirwa kujya mw’ ijuru? No gukizwa n’ amaraso ye?
Hung’ ibyaha jy’ ukor’ ibitunganye! Wejeshw’ amaraso ya Yesu! Har’ isokw’ itemb’ ikiz’ imitima, Wejeshw’ amaraso ya Yesu!
hymns.refrain: Wogejwe (wogejwe) na Yesu (na Yesu)? Watunganijwe n’ amaraso (maraso)? Har’ ubwo yakwuhagij’ amaraso? Mbes’ imyambaro yaw’ irera?
hymns.author: Rev. E. A. Hoffman

hymns.title: Nahabiye Kure Y’ Imana
verses: Nahabiye kure y’ Imana, Ndahabuts’ ubu. Nari naratinze mu byaha, Noneho ndaje.
Narapfapfany’ imyaka myinshi, Ndahabuts’ ubu. Ndakwitwaraho cyane nkiza, Noneho ndaje.
Ndembejwe n’ ibyaha no kugwa, Ndahabuts’ ubu. Niringiy’ urukundo rwawe, Noneho ndaje.
Yesu yamviriy’ amaraso, Ndahabuts’ ubu. Ubwe niwe wankiza gusa, Noneho ndaje.
Wumv’ amaganya yanjy’ unkize, Ndahabuts’ ubu. Nyeza Mwami nse n’ urubura, Noneho ndaje.
hymns.refrain: Reka nze, reka nze! Ntabwo nzongera. Nyemerer‘ umbabarire! Mwami nyakira!
hymns.author: Wm. J.Kirkpatrick

hymns.title: Bayoboke Nimurangurure
verses: Bayoboke nimurangurure, Mwamamaz’ ubutumwa mw’ isi yose! Nimukwiz’ ayo makuru mu bantu! Abashaka nibaze.
Ushaka kuza yitindiganya, Niyinjir’ irembo riruguruye. Umwami niwe nzira y’ ubugingo, Abashaka nibaze.
Ushaka wese n’ agire bwangu! Kand’ agir’ ubutwari yihangane. Ushaka wes’ azahabw’ ubugingo, Abashaka nibaze.
hymns.refrain: Uwemey’ aze! Uwemey’ aze! Nimubimenyesh’ abatuye hasi! Umubyey’ aratarur’ abana be, Abashaka nibaze.
hymns.author: P.P. Bliss

hymns.title: Jy’ Uganza Mwami W’ Iteka
verses: Jy’ uganza Mwami w’ iteka, Bose bakuramye! Nimuzan’ ikamba ry’ ubwami bwe, Ab’ Umwami wa bose! Nimuzan’ ikamba ry’ ubwami bwe, Kw’ ariwe Mwami wa bose.
Batowe mwe b’ Israeli, Mwa nkehwe mwe nkeya, Muramy’ ubakirish’ imbabazi, Ab’ Umwami wa bose! Muramy’ ubakirish’ imbabazi, Kw’ ariwe Mwami wa bose.
Amoko yose yo hasi, N’ imiryango yose, Bose bajye bamwubaha cyane! Ab’ Umwami wa bose. Bose bajye bamwubaha cyane! Kw’ ariwe Mwami wa bose.
Muze tumuririmbire, Tumupfukamire, Tumusingize no kumushima, Ab’ Umwami wa bose. Tumusingize no kumushima, Kw’ ariwe Mwami wa bose.
hymns.author: Oliver Holden

hymns.title: Yesu Mukunzi Wanjye
verses: Yesu mukunzi wanjye, Mpa kuguhungiraho. Ubw’ umurab’ usuma, N’ umugar’ ugwa cyane, Umpishe Mukiza we! Kugez’ ah’ uhitira. Unyobor’ ahikinze, Nuk’ unkiz’ unyakire!
Nta bundi buhungiro, Mwam’ unyirokorere! Ntunzibukire rwose, Komez’ ujy’ undengera! Nkwizigire wenyine! Ni wow’ ump’ imbaraga, Uhashy’ abanzi banjye, Simpugane na hato.
Ngushime Mwami Yesu, K’ utagir’ icy’ unyima, Usindagiz’ urushye, N’ urway’ uramukiza; Urera bihebuje, Ntabwo ngutunganiye, Ndi mubi bikabije, Wow’ urakiranutse.
Ubabarira cyane, Kand’ imbabazi zawe, Zirut’ ibyaha byanjye. Nyeza nkomeze nere, We soko y’ ubugingo! Nkundira nkuvomemo! Unyuzur’ umutima, Nzagere ku bugingo.
hymns.author: Martyn

hymns.title: Yesu Utunezeza Twese
verses: Yes’ utunezeza twese, Soko y’ ubuging’ ur’ umucyo w’ abantu; Ibyishimo byose byo hasi, Tubicitseho tugukurikire.
Tuvune turakwisunze. Ukuri kwawe ntikugir’ impinduka; Dutabare turakwizeye, Tukwiyeguriye tumaramaje.
Mutsima w’ ubugingo we! Dushaka guhazwa naw’ iteka ryose. Soko nziz’ idakam’ iteka! Tumar’ inyota mu mitima yacu!
Mu midugararo yacu, Tukwifuz’ iteka, Mwami mwiza rwose. Tunezerwa cyan’ umwenyuye; N’ amahirwe yac’ ubwo duhorana.
Yesu bana natw’ iteka! Duh’ amahoro twishim’ iteka ryose! Dukiz’ ibibi bitugota! Murika kw is’ umucyo wawe wera!
hymns.author: Lowel Mason

hymns.title: Nkunda Kunguk’ Ibya Yesu
verses: Nkunda kunguk’ ibya Yesu, Kwerekan’ imbabazi ze; Kwunguk’ ubwenge bw’ ukuri, N’ urukundo rw’ Umukiza.
Nshishikarir’ ibya Yesu, Mmeny’ iby’ ashaka binkwiye, Mwuka Wera mfuturira! Mbwir’ uko Yesu yankunze!
Nunguk’ ijambo rya Yesu, Mbane n’ Umwam’ antoneshe; Numvir’ iby’ ambwira byose, Mpuze nawe muyoboke.
Meny’ iby’ ingoma ya Yesu, Menye n’ ubwiza bwe bwose, Menye n’ ukw’ agiye kwima, Niwe Mwami w’ amahoro.
hymns.refrain: Nunguk’ ibya Yesu, Nunguk’ ibya Yesu. Kwunguk’ ubwenge bw’ ukuri, N’ urukundo rw’ Umukiza.
hymns.author: Jno. R. Sweney

hymns.title: Yesu Ndagukunze Rwose
verses: Yesu ndagukunze rwose, Ndakwihaye. Ingeso mbi zose, Nzanz’ uko zingana. Ni wowe Mukiza wanjye mwiza, Nkuyoboke. Ntabwo nigeze kugukunda, Nk’ ubu ngubu.
Ndagukunze kuko wabanje, Kunkunda, Waranyiguriy’ unkiriz’ i Kalwari. Ngukundiy’ ikamba ry’ amahwa, Wahambikiwe, Ntabwo nigeze kugukunda, Nk’ ubu ngubu.
Mperey’ ubu ngukunda, Nzageza gupfa. Nzajya ngusingiz’ iteka Ngihumeka; Nah’ urupfu ruzanyegurira, Nzavuga nti: Ntabwo nigeze kugukunda, Nk’ ubu ngubu.
Ubwo nzager’ aho, Waduteguriye, Nzajya mpaguhamiriz’ itek’ iteka. Nzaguhimbaza nambay’ ikamba, Ritunganye; Ntabwo nigeze kugukunda, Nk’ ubu ngubu.
hymns.author: A. J. Gordon

hymns.title: N’ Iki Cyankiz’ Ibyaha?
verses: N’ iki cyankiz’ ibyaha? N’ amaraso yawe Yesu. N’ iki cyanyeza rwose? N’ amaraso yawe Yesu.
Nta kindi cyantunganya, N’ amaraso yawe Yesu. Nta kindi cyiru mfite, N’ amaraso yawe Yesu.
Nta cyantsembahw ibyaha, N’ amaraso yawe Yesu. Nta byanjye byamboneza, N’ amaraso yawe Yesu.
Ni wowe niringira, N’ amaraso yawe Yesu. Ni wow’ ump’ amahoro, N’ amaraso yawe Yesu.
Njye ngusingiza cyane, Ku maraso yawe Yesu. Mukiz’ urakarama, Ku maraso wamviriye.
hymns.refrain: Maras’ atunganye, Niy’ amboneza rwose. Nta cyampa gukira, Nk’ amaraso y’ Umukiza.
hymns.author: Rev. Robert Lowry

hymns.title: S’ Uhagarik’ Ik’ Umutima?
verses: S’ uhagarikiy’ ik’ umutima? Bibwire Yesu! Bibwire Yesu! Ubabajwe no kubur’ ituza? Ihererane Yesu!
Mbes’ ub’ urabogoz’ amarira? Bibwire Yesu! Bibwire Yesu! Utotezwa n’ ibyaha wahishe? Ihererane Yesu!
Ujy’ utinya guterwa n’ ibyago? Bibwire Yesu! Bibwire Yesu! Mbes’ ub’ uraganyishwa n’ iby’ ejo? Ihererane Yesu!
Mbes’ ujy’ ugir’ ubwoba bwo gupfa? Bibwire Yesu! Bibwire Yesu! Mbes’ urashak’ ingoma ya Kristo? Ihererane Yesu!
hymns.refrain: Bibwire Yesu! Bibwire Yesu! Niwe nshuti y’ ukuri; Ntugir’ indi nshut’ ihwanye nawe, Jy’ ubana nawe cyane.
hymns.author: E. S. Lorenz

hymns.title: Nkunda Kwiringira Yesu
verses: Nkunda kwiringira Yesu, Nkajya mwumvira rwose, No kwizer’ umurage we, N’ amateka y’ Imana.
Nkunda kwiringira Yesu; Nkizwa n’ amaraso ye. Ansendahw ibicumuro, Niy’ antunganya rwose.
Nimenya kumwiringira, Sinzaba ngicumura. Niho nzagir’ ubuhoro, N’ ubugingo bw’ iteka.
Mpimbawe no kukumenya, Yesu Mukiza nkunda. Nizeye k’ umpora hafi, Nuko nguman’ iteka.
hymns.refrain: Nkoyoboke Mwami rwose; Najyaga nshidikanya, Yesu Yesu mwiza nkunda, Mfasha nkwumvire rwose!
hymns.author: W.J. Kirkpatrick

hymns.title: Nshim’ Umunsi Nakwemeye
verses: Nshim’ umunsi nakwemeye, Mwami Yesu Mukiza we! Nshima cyane n’ umutima, Ndabwiriz’ ibinezeza.
Biramaze, napfiriwe, Nd’ uwa Yesu wandokoye; Yangiz’ uwe, Nkurikire, Nshima yuko ntowe nawe.
Mutima wanjye ruhuka; Reba mw ijur’ ahejejwe, Ntugasig’ Umwami wawe, Bana nawe mwumvikane.
Iteka nzagukorera, Iby’ isi ndabizinutswe. Nkugarutseho noneho, Sinzarorera kwishima.
Ubw’ umucyo wo mw’ ijuru uzamurikir’ iyi si. Nsanganir’ Umwami wanjye, Tuzibanire mw’ ijuru.
hymns.refrain: Mpimbaze, mpimbaze; Yesu wankijij’ ibyaha. Anyigisha kumuramya, Ngo nezerw’ iminsi yose; Mpimbaze, mpimbaze Yesu wankijij’ ibyaha.
hymns.author: E. F. Rimbault

hymns.title: Abatoni B’ Umwami
verses: Abatoni b’ Umwami! Nimuze dusakaze hos’ umunezero wacu, Turangururire rimwe, Dukikij’ intebe, Dukikij’ intebe.
Murek’ ibyigomeke, Byanga gushim’ Umwami. Arikw’ abana b’ Imana, Arikw’ abana b’ Imana, Muhore mwishima, Muhore mwishima.
Twishimir’ i Siyoni, N’ umudugudu wera; Tuzahahurira twese, Tuzahahurira twese. Hazahor’ ituza, Hazahor’ ituza.
Turirimbe cyan’ ubu, Hataba n’ umw’ urira. Tugiye kuger’ iwacu, Tugiye kuger’ iwacu, Mu gihugu cyiza, Mu gihugu cyiza.
hymns.refrain: Turajy’ i Siyoni, Ku murwa mwiz’ utunganye. Turajy’ i Siyoni, Ku murwa mwiz’ utunganye w’ Imana.
hymns.author: Robert Lowry

hymns.title: Naguzw’ Amaraso Y ‘ Intama
verses: Naguzw’ amaraso y’ Intama, Ncunguzw’ imbabazi zayo. Ubu nd’ umwana wayo rwose, Ntaho ntazabyamamaza.
Mpimbaze Yesu wankijije, Nta wuz’ uko nezerewe. Niwe mucyo mwiz’ unyobora, Ahorana nanjy’ iteka.
Ntabwo mpung’ Umukiza wanjye, Njya mutekerez’ iteka. Ntabwo ndambirwa kumurata, Njya nsingiz’ urukundo rwe.
Nzi ko nzamubonan’ ubwiza, Nezerwa n’ amateka ye. Andinda nez’ aho njya hose, Mmutaramira ndirimba.
Nizeye kw’ ambikiy’ ikamba, Mu rugo rwe rwo mw’ ijuru. Maze tuzahoran’ iteka, N’ abamuyobotse bose.
hymns.refrain: Nkiza (nkiza), nkiza (nkiza), N’ amaraso yawe Yesu. Mboneza, mboneza! Nd’ umwana wawe rwos’ ubu.
hymns.author: W. J. Kirkpatrick, by Per

hymns.title: Tuzaramban’ Amazi Yera
verses: Tuzaramban’ amazi yera, Y’ isokw’ ibeshaho. Niho Yes’ azadutegera, N’ ihuriro ryiza.
Imirimo n’ iducogoza, Turuhuke hato! Ku mazi y’ urubogobogo, Ku masoko meza.
Tyo nimuze mwisunge Kristo! Abah’ imbaraga, Kandi mumeny’ ubury’ akiza! Munywe mwic’ inyota!
hymns.refrain: Tuzaramban’ amazi yera, Kuramban’ amazi yera, Kuramban’ amazi yera, Tuzatinda kw isoko.
hymns.author: F.E Belden

hymns.title: Igihe Yes’ Azakorany’ Amoko
verses: Igihe Yes’ azakorany’ amoko, Ngw’ ahagarar’ imbere Ye, Twese tuzagenzwa dute mu manza, Dutumiwe gutegekwa?
Nind’ uzumv’ Umukiz’ amubwir’ ati: Ur’ umugaragu mwiza? Cyangw’ uzamarwa n’ ubwob’ ubwiwe ngo: Hoshi genda ndaguciye?
Azamwenyur’ abonany’ abana be, Icyitegererezo Cye, Azabambik’ ibyiza byo mw’ ijuru, Ubwo bamupfukamire.
Tube maso dutegerez’ Umwami, N’ imuri zigumye zake! Kugira ng’ Umukwe n’ az’ azasange, Tumaze kumwitegura.
Tujye dutekerez’ ibyo mw’ ijuru, Urugendo nirushira, Tuzahagarar’ imbere y’ Imana, Niba tutagamburura.
hymns.refrain: Azahunik’ ingano mu bigega, Arik’ umuram’ azawusesa. Twese tuzagenzwa dute mu manza, Z’ uwo munsi wo kuzurwa?
hymns.author: Jno. R. Sweney

hymns.title: Sinita Ku Butunzi
verses: Sinita ku butunzi, Feza na zahabu. Ndashak’ ibyo mw’ ijuru; Nzajyane n’ abera. Yesu Mukiza mbwira: Igitabo cyawe, Cyera cy’ ubwami bwawe, Mbese nanditswemo?
Ibyaha byanjye Mwami, Birut’ umusenyi. Ngwino Mwam’ ubinkirish’ amaraso yawe! Wadusezeraniye, Yukw ibyaha byacu, Nibisa n’ umuhemba, Ng’ uzabyeza rwose.
Mu mudugudu mwiza, N’ amazu yera de, N’ abera bawurimo, Barimban’ ibyera, Nta bibi biwegera, Byakwanduz’ ibyiza, Niho hab’ amahoro, Mbese nanditswemo?
hymns.refrain: Mbese nanditswemo, Ku mpapuro zera? Mu gitabo cy’ ubwami, Mbese nanditswemo?
hymns.author: Frank M. Davis

hymns.title: Har’ Imanz’ ubu
verses: Har’ imanz’ ubu; Nta kitarondorwa, Mbese tuzamera dute? Tugez’ imbere y’ umucamanza, Abony’ ibyo twakoze byose?
Zatangiriye mu basinziriye, Zizaza no mu bariho. Tuzasuzumirwa mu byanditswe, Nibyo bizaduhamya rwose.
Tuzavug’ iki tugeze mu manza, Ibitabo bibumbuwe, Umuntu wes’ abwirw’ imanza ze, Atakibon’ umurokora?
hymns.refrain: Tuzakizwa n’ ik’ uwo munsi? Tuzakizwa n’ ik’ uwo munsi? Mbese tuzaba twiringanije? Cyangwa tuzatsindwa n’ ibyaha?
hymns.author: F.E. Belden

hymns.title: Umwami Yaradutumiye
verses: Umwami niw’ udutumira, Ngw’ aduteranye n’ ubwoko bwe. Azasanga tumeze dute, Ahw’ azazira?
Tuzatamirizw’ amakamba, Uwaducunguye yimitswe, Tuzahorana naw’ iteka, Ahw’ azazira.
Nkuk’ umuraby’ ugaragara, Nikw’ azagaragaza byose; Azerekan’ ibyo twakoze, Ahw azazira.
Azishim’ ubw’ azabon’ abe, Bambay’ imyambaro yera de. Nituganza tuzanezerwa, Ahw’ azazira.
Ntabwo tuzongera gutana, Abanga kumwumvira bose, Bazataka no kuboroga, Yes’ agarutse.
Mwami ni wowe twiringiye; Twigishe kugutegereza, Tutazatinya kukubona, Ah’ uzazira.
hymns.refrain: Mwana wa Data we tyo se: Ubw’ Umwam’ azaza, Twebwe tuzamera dute? Umwami n’ aza?
hymns.author: Rev. E.S. Lorenz

hymns.title: Biba Mu Gitondo
verses: Biba mu gitondo, Imbuto z’ ineza! Jy’ ubiba ku manywa n’ ikigoroba! Rindira ko zera! Hazaz’ usarura, Tuzishima cyane, Dutund’ imiba.
Bib’ izuba riva! Biba mu gitundwe! Ntugatiny’ ibihu, N’ imbeho nyinshi! Maz’ umusaruro, N’ imirim’ ishize, Tuzishima cyane, Dutund’ imiba.
Tugende turira, Tubibir’ Umwami, Niba tubabazwa N’ abazimira, Ubwo tuzahozwa, Tuzakizwa nawe. Tuzishima cyane, Dutund’ imiba.
hymns.refrain: Dutund’ imiba, Dutund’ imiba. Tuzishima cyane, Dutund’ imiba.
hymns.author: George A. Minor

hymns.title: Ni Ijwi Ry’ Umwungeri Numva
verses: N’ ijwi ry’ Umwungeri numva, Ritabariza mw ishyamba; Kw intama ze zazimiye; Mu bushyo niho zavuye.
Dutabar’ uwo Mwungeri, Dushakan’ izo nzimizi! Tuzigarure mu bushyo, Niho zikirir’ imbeho!
Ziratakira mw’ ishyamba, Zigeze habi mu manga. Umwam’ arababwir’ ati: Munshakir’ intama zanjye!
hymns.refrain: Dutund’ imiba, Dutund’ imiba. Tuzishima cyane, Dutund’ imiba.
hymns.author: W. A. Ogden

hymns.title: Kiz’ Abanyabyaha
verses: Kiz’ abanyabyaha, Rwaz’ abarwayi! Ubarokor’ ibyago n’ urupfu! Habur’ abahabye! Byuts’ abaguye! Babwire ko Yes’ azi gukiza!
Abamushungera, Nabo ntabanga. Ategerez’ abicuza rwose, Bahate bihane, Jy’ ubasabira! Nibizer’ azabababarira.
Toz’ abazimiye! Be kuzuyaza. Barek’ irari ry’ ibidakwiye! Buzur’ urukundo, Bagire neza. Bagarukir’ uwabacunguye!
Kiz’ abanyabyaha! Biragukwiye. Umwam’ azaguhet’ imbaraga, Bos’ ubayobore mu nzira ntoya! Menyesh’ indushyi ko zarokowe!
hymns.refrain: Kiz’ abanyabyaha, Rwaz’ abarwayi! Yes’ umunyambabaz’ arakiza.
hymns.author: W. H. Doane

hymns.title: Nkunda Kwogez’ Amagambo
verses: Nkunda kwogez’ amagambo, Y’ ubwami bwo mw’ ijuru; Ya Yesu n’ ishimwe rye, Ya Yesu n’ urukundo rwe. Niyo nkunda kwogeza, Kuko nzi kw’ ar’ ukuri; Niy’ amp’ ibyo nifuza, Nta handi mbibona.
Nkunda kwogez’ amagambo, Arut’ ibintu byose; Ahebuz’ umurimbo; N’ ibyo turigira byose, Niyo nkunda kwogeza. Yangiriy’ umumaro; Simpwema kuyarata, Ngw abakize namwe.
Nkunda kwogez’ amagambo, Nkomeze njye nyavuga; Aranogera cyane, Kukw’ ambwiriz’ iby’ ijuru; Niyo nkunda kwogeza, Nyabwir’ abatayazi, Bameny’ ako gakiza, Kava mu nzandiko.
Nkunda kwogez’ amagambo, Nyabwira n’ abayazi, N’ abayakennye nabo, Bose bashaka kuyumva. Ubwo nzaba mw’ ijuru, Ndirimb’ indirimbo nshya, Nay’ izab’ impimbaye, Nk’ amagambo nkunda.
hymns.refrain: Niyo nkunda kwogeza; Nkize nzaba nkivuga, Ukw’ ab’ isi bahoranye, Impuhwe za Yesu.
hymns.author: W. G. Fischer

hymns.title: Tujye Dusabir’ Abazimiye
verses: Tujye dusabir’ abazimiye, Bahabiye kure y’ Imana! Tubahinduz’ ubutumwa bwiza, Bamenye k’ Umwam’ abakunda!
Tugarurire Yes’ abahabye, Intebyi zidafit’ intege! Tuzerek’ aho zizakirira, Zimeny’ inzira y’ ubugingo!
Tugend’ uko Yesu yadutoye, Tujye tumuyobok’ iteka! Rwaz’ abarwayi byuts’ abaguye! Yobor’ abahabye kwa Yesu.
hymns.refrain: S., A. na T :Tujye hose dusang’ abantu bose! Tugarurir’ Iman’ abazimiye! Tubane mu bushyo bw’ Umucunguzi, Yesu watambiy’ abanyabyaha. B. :Tujye hose …sang’ abantu bose! Tugarurir’ …man’ abazimiye! Tubane mu …shyo bw’ Umucunguzi, Yesu watambiy’ abanyabyaha.
hymns.author: W. A. Ogden

hymns.title: Imirim’ Irez’ Ahantu Hose
verses: Imirim’ irez’ ahantu hose; N’ igihe cyo gusarura. Ubu n’ igihe cyo gusarura, Mu bibaya n’ imusozi.
Bohereze mu gitondo kare! Ubohereze ku manywa! N’ igih’ izuba ryenda kurenga, Bategeke basarure!
Tyo ntumwa y’ Umwami gir’ umwete! Uterany’ ibisarurwa! Maz’ ah’ uzarangiriza rwose, Uzishimira mw ijuru!
hymns.refrain: Mwam’ oherez’ abasaruzi! Tuvune turagutabaza! Bohereze baterany’ imiba! Igihe kiracyariho.
hymns.author: J. B. O. Clemm

hymns.title: Dukoran’ Umwete
verses: Dukoran’ umwete, dukorer’ Imana! Twihute dukurikiz’ Umwami wacu! Ijambo rye niryo riduh’ imbaraga; Tugir’ umwete mwinshi tumuyoboke!
Dukoran’ umwete! duhaz’ abashonje! Tuyobor’ abaremby’ aho bakirira. Niko kwamamaz’ inkuru y’ Umukiza, Dukomeze twiratan’ umusaraba.
Dukoran’ umwete, dutarure bose! Kukw’ ingoma zo hasi zizahanguka. Kand’ Uwitek’ azasingizwa na bose, Abera bazaririmba ko bakize.
Dukoran’ umwete, Dutebuts’ Umwami! Kukw’ igihe cy’ isarura kiri hafi. Tujye gutur’ iwabo w’ abacunguwe, Tuzahora turirimb’ uko twakize.
hymns.refrain: Dukore (dukore), dukore (dukore), dukore (dukore), Dukore (dukore). Twizere (twizere), twitonde (twitonde), Duhore twitez’ Umwami!
hymns.author: W. H. Doane

hymns.title: Kor’ Ugifit’ Uburyo
verses: Kor’ ugifit’ uburyo, Kora hakibona! Jy’ ukora no mu kime, Jy’ ushir’ ubute! Kora no ku manyw’ akaze! Ntucogore rwose! Kora bugiye kwira, Mar’ imirimo!
Kora bugiye kwira! Kor’ amanywa yose! Komez’ ukor’ iteka, Ntukaruhuke! Mu bihe byos’ ukiriho, Ntugahweme rwose! Komeza butarira, Mar’ imirimo!
Kora bugiye kwira! Ubu harabona. Bugiye kugoroba, Gira n’ ingoga! Ugeze ko bwira rwose, Izuba rirenze, Ntugatuze gukora, Mar’ imirimo!
hymns.author: Lowell Mason

hymns.title: Mu Gitondo Njya Ndirimba
verses: Mu gitondo njya ndirimba, Nguhimbaza Mwami, Nguh’ amasengesho, Kuko nkwiringiye.
Ku misozi niho Yesu, Yajyag’ asabira; No gutakambira Data, Ngw adukiz’ ibyago.
Mwam’ unyoboresh’ Umwuka. Mu nzir’ itunganye. Untunganiriz’ ubwenge, Meny’ ibikwiriye.
Abubah’ izina ryawe, Urajy’ ubumvira. Ubakingir’ imbabazi. Bakir’amakuba.
hymns.author: Aaron Williams

hymns.title: Mwese Musingiz’ Umwami
verses: Mwese musingiz’ Umwami muti: Izina ryawe ryubahwe. Mwami niw’ ugir’ ishimwe ryose, Izina ryawe ryubahwe.
Yesu zina ritumar’ ubwoba, Mwubah’ izina ry’ Umwami! Ni nk’ inanga ku bafit’ ibyaha, Mwubah’ izina ry’ Umwami!
Adukiz’ imbaraga y’ ibyaha, Mwubah’ izina ry’ Umwami! Amaraso y’ adukiza rwose. Mwubah’ izina ry’ Umwami!
hymns.refrain: Mwubah’ izina, Mwubah’ izina! Mwubah’ izina ry’ Umwami! Mwubah’ izina, Mwubah’ izina! Mwubah’ izina ry’ Umwami!
hymns.author: R. E. Hudson

hymns.title: Dushime Nyir’ Umugisha
verses: Dushime Nyir’ Umugisha, Tumushime hasi twese; N’ abo mw’ ijuru dushime, Dat’ Umwan’ Umwuka Wera.
hymns.author: Guillaume Franc

hymns.title: Nsingiz’ Imana Rurema
verses: Nsingiz’ Imana Rurema, Yaremy’ imisozi; Yadendej’ inyanja zose, Yahanits’ ijuru; Nsingiz’ iyahay’ izuba, Kumurika mu munsi. Ih’ ukwezi kubonesha, N’ inyenyer’ umucyo.
Nsingiz’ ibambe ry’ Umwami, Wujuj’ is’ imyaka; Yaremeshej’ ijambo rye, Ibizima byose. Mwami mbon’ ibitangaza, Byaw’ aho ndeba hose, Hano hasi no hejuru, Ntabwo bihinyuka.
Nta kiriho na gitoya, Kitakwerekana. Imvura n’ izuba biba, Kw’ itegeko ryawe. Uh’ ibizima kubaho, Kand’ ubitunga byose. Ntaho twahungir’ Imana, Kuko ntahw’ itaba.
hymns.author: Arr. F. Root

hymns.title: Muramy’ Umwami
verses: Muramy’ Umwami waremye byose, Nimuhimbaze mwes’ urukundo rwe, N’ umuvunyi wacu niw’ uhoraho, Agoswe n’ ibyiza birabagirana.
Mumwamamaze! Nyir’ imbabazi! Yihunz’ umucyo, Akwiriye hose, Ibicu bikoranywa, N’ icyusa cye, Acyahish’ abant’ urusaku rw’ inkuba.
Agir’ ubuntu bukwira hose, Bwuj’ ikirere, Buba no mu mucyo, Butemba mu misozi n’ ibisiza, Nibw’ ikime n’ imvura biturukamo.
Tur’ igitaka, Tworoshye twese. Turakwizera kuk’ udahemuka; Imbabazi zawe n’ akamenyero. Mubyey’ ugir’ ibambe, Mukiza mwiza.
hymns.author: F.J. Haydn

hymns.title: Data Tuj’ Ah’ Uri
verses: Data tuj’ ah’ uri, Ko tudafit’ undi, Ni wow’ udukiza, Niko kuza. Niba tutabana, Is’ irimw’ ishavu. Uduhumurize, Data mwiza.
Dukiz’ ababisha, Dukize n’ ibyago, Dutuz’ imitima, Mu makuba. Ntitugir’ intege, Twuzuz’ imbaraga, Dutiz’ amaboko, Ngo tuneshe.
Twuzuz’ imbabazi, Tur’ abawe rwose, Tuyobor’ iteka, Twang’ ibyaha. Tugumane Mwami, Kand’ ubwo tuzapfa, Ntuzatwibagirwe, Tuzabane.
hymns.refrain: Data tuj’ ah’ uri, Ntutubuze. Niw’ uzi gukiza, Twumvir’ ubu.
hymns.author: W.J. Bostwick

hymns.title: Ntumpiteho Mukiza We
verses: Ntumpiteho Mukiza we! Wumv’ uko nganya. Ubw’ ugenderer’ abandi, Nanjye ntunsige.
Njye neger’ intebe yawe, Mpabw’ imbabazi. Ngupfukamire, mbabaye, Mpa kukwizera.
Ntaw’ undi nakwiringira, Ni wowe nshaka. Mvur’ ibikomere byanjye, Umbabarire.
Ur’ isoko y’ amahoro, Nyir’ ubugingo. Singir’ undi niyambaza, Keretse wowe.
hymns.refrain: Yewe Mukiza! Umv’ uko nganya. Ubw’ ugenderer’ abandi, Nanjye ntunsige.
hymns.author: W. H. Doane

hymns.title: Gihe Cyiza Cyo Gusenga
verses: Gihe cyiza cyo gusenga, Kintarura mu mpagarara; Ngo nigir’ aho Dat’ ari, Muganyir’ ibyo nkennye byose. Mu bihe by’ umubabaro, Nabony’ ibimpumuriza. Ntsind’ ubukana bw’ Umwanzi , Mu bihe byiza byo gusenga.
Gihe cyiza cyo gusenga, Jy’ unsohorez’ amasengesho, K’ Uwiteka ntahemuka , Aratwiteze ngw aduhire, Ndamwihereje rwos’ ubu, Y ‘ uk’ ubwe yampamagaye, Niringiy’ imbabazi ze, Nogez’ ibihe byo gusenga.
Gihe cyiza cyo gusaba, Urajy’ uhor’ umpumuriza, Ugez’ aho nger’ iwacu, Nzataha nzamuwe mu bicu, Mpembw’ ibihembo by’ abera, Nibyo bizaramb’ iteka. Ubwo nibwo nzasezera ku bihe byiza byo gusenga.
hymns.author: W. B. Bradbury

hymns.title: Imins’ Itandat’ Ishize
verses: Imins’ itandat’ ishize, Indi Sabat’ itangiye. Nezezwa no kuruhuka, Mur’ uyu muns’ uhiriwe.
Nimuze mushim’ Umwami, Wabahaye kuruhuka. Umugisha w’ uyu munsi, Urut’ uw’ iyindi yose.
Tunezerwe mu mitima, Twishimir’ ibyo mw’ ijuru. Mu buruhukiro bwacu, Ku Mwami nyir’ Isabato.
Ituza riva mw’ ijuru, Ritwuzure twebwe twese, Hos’ itorero ry’ Imana, Rikir’ imitima myinshi.
hymns.author: L. Mason

hymns.title: Wicogora Muri Gihe
verses: Wicogora mur’ iki gihe, Ba maso n’ imperuka. Rind’ udatsindwa n’ iby’ iyi si, Mukristo jy’ usaba. Uz’ uk’ umubir’ uremba, Kand’ umwanz’ arakaze. Utegereze nyir’ ubukwe, Ba mas’ utarambirwa.
Tsemb’ ibishukw’ imbere yawe, Rek’ imitima myinshi. Uzaruhukira mw’ ijuru, Nihw’ uzaturiza. Jy’ uhor’ usaba Mukristo, Umwam’ arakwiteze. Ibuk’ uko yaguhorewe, Bamuvush’ amaraso.
Ntugahweme kwambaza Yesu, Jy’ ubana naw’ iteka Ntugahug’ ibitum’ utsinda, Tegerez’ Umwami. Wirushy’ uzuyaza rwose, Reka gushidikanya. N’ igihe cyo kumwitegura, Ntugahweme kwambaza.
hymns.refrain: Komez’ ujy’ usaba, Komez’ ujy’ usaba. Jya wirind’ iteka ku manywa na n’ ijoro, Ntugahweme gusaba.
hymns.author: R. Lowry

hymns.title: Wibuk’ Isabato
verses: Wibuk’ Isabato, Umwami yahiriye. N’ umus’ urut’ iyindi, N’ umuns’ unezeza. Turuhukamw’ imirimo, Tubwirwamw iby’ ijuru. Niwo mucy’ umurika, Uva ku Mwam’ Imana
Jya wez’ Isabato, Maz’ uramy’ uwo Mwami, Wabwiy’ intumwa z’ ati: Ndi nyir’ ubugingo. Niba twicisha bugufi, Dukorer’ Umukiza, Tuzajyanwa kw’ isoko, Y’ amazi y’ ubugingo.
Twishime, twezwemo, Turirimbire Yesu, Inshuti yacu nziza, Tumutekereze. Mukiza mwiz’ udukunda, Isezerano ryawe, Ng’ uzaba muri twebwe, Niryo ritunezeza.
hymns.refrain: Utuzanir’ amahoro, Sabato nziza rwose. Utuzanir’ amahoro, Sabato nziza.
hymns.author: Wm. B. Bradbury

hymns.title: N’ Umunsi Wera Wo Kuruhuka
verses: N’ umunsi wera wo kuruhuka, Muns’ uhiriwe w’ amahoro; Ukiz’ intebyi n’ ufit’ ishavu, Mwiz’ ushimwa mu yindi yose. Mwami mur’ uwo munsi, Bose bagusingiza, Ngo weze, weze, weze, Kukw’ ariw’ uhorahw’ iteka.
N’ icyambu kibamw’ ituza ryinshi, Ntikibamw’ imidugararo. Ni nk’ umurima w’ Iparadiso, Imigezi myiz’ inyuramo. Usa n’ isokw’ ifuka, Iy’ amapfa yacanye. Ni nkaho tubonera, Igihugu cy’ isezerano.

N’ umunsi twongerwamw’ imbaraga, N’ umuns’ uduter’ urukundo. Ni w’ utuma turek’ iby’ iyi si, Tukegukir’ ibyo mw’ ijuru. Tuboner’ imbabazi, Mur’ uyu munsi mwiza. Dushake kuruhuka, No ku rurembo rwo mw’ ijuru.
hymns.author: German

hymns.title: Nkunda Guterana Kw’ Isabato
verses: Nkunda guterana kw’ Isabato, Kwig’ Ijambo ry’ Imana. Teraniro ryiza ry’ abigishwa, Undutira byose.
Niho namenyey’ iby’ ubugingo, Mbon’ uburyo nihana, Nitoraniriz’ ibitunganye, Nibyo binnezeza.
Aho niho Yesu yantoreye, Ambwiz’ ijwi rye ryiza. Ubwo nibwo namwitoraniye, Mw’ ihuriro ryiza.
hymns.refrain: Huriro (huriro) rishimwa (rishimwa), Huriro (huriro) rishimwa (rishimwa). Teraniro ryiza ry’ abigishwa, Undutira byose.
hymns.author: W. H. Doane

hymns.title: Dukoze Gatandatu
verses: Dukoze gatandatu, Tubwirizwa n’ Imana. None dushak’ ihirwe, Mu rusengero rwayo. N’ umuns’ urut’ iyindi, Unshuz’ ibyo mw’ ijuru. N’ umuns’ urut’ iyindi, Niw’ unshuz’ ibyo mw’ ijuru.
Tugusab’ umugisha, Mw’ izina ry’ Umukiza. Tugirir’ imbabazi, Udutsembehw’ ibyaha. Ducike ku by’ iyi si, Turuhukane nawe. Ducike ku by’ iyi si, Uruhukire muri twe.
Twaje kugusingiza, Ngwino dusaban’ ubu, Tubon’ ubwiza bwawe, Mu rusengero rwawe. Mwam’ uduhe kumenya, Ibyiza byo mw’ ijuru. Mwam’ uduhe kumenya, Uko bizaba mw’ ijuru.
Ubutumwa bugwire, Bukiz’ abanyabyaha. Imbabazi zihoza, Abagutakambira. Duhe kugusingiza, Twez’ Isabato nziza. Duhe kugusingiza, Tuguman’ itek’ iteka.
hymns.author: L. Mason

hymns.title: Nshim’ Isabato Yera
verses: Nshim’ Isabato yera, Imana yaduhaye. Ngo tujye turuhuka, Tuwunezererwemo.
N’ umuns’ ubamw’ ituza, Uhoramw’ ibyishimo. Biduhuz’ agahinda, Kugeza ku mperuka.
N’ umuns’ uduhimbara, Tukawizihirwamo, Twongerwamw’ imbaraga, Tukuzuzw’ umugisha.
Kaze Sabato nziza, Munsi w’ ikiruhuko, Duhabwamw’ umugisha, Tukamererwa neza.
hymns.author: Ignace Pleyel

hymns.title: Twumvis’ Inkuru Nziza
verses: Twumvis’ inkuru nziza, Ko Yesu akiza. Kwiz’ uwo munezero, Ko Yesu akiza. Bibwir’ abantu bose, Uzambuke n’ inzuzi. Umwami ngo jya hose, Ni Yesu ukiza.
Ukwize no mu nyanja, Ko Yesu akiza. Tyo bwir’ abacumuye, Ko Yesu akiza. Himbaz’ abo mu birwa, Kukw’ amakuru meza. Azumvikana hose, Ko Yesu akiza.
Mw irasaniro muti: Ni Yesu ukiza. Yaducunguye twese, Ni Yesu ukiza. Ririmbir’ abatebye, Bashak’ ubatabara. Ririmba ku bituro, Ko Yesu akiza.
N’ imiyag’ ivug’ iti: Ni Yesu ukiza. Amoko yos’ ashime, Ko Yesu akiza. Jy’ urangurur’ ijw’ uti: Mwese muze mukizwe! Dusingiz’ ubutwari, Ko Yesu akiza.
hymns.author: W. J. Kirkpatrick

hymns.title: Ndagushaka Mukiza We
verses: Ndagushaka Mukiza we! Ntabwo mbasha kwigenza. Ndifuza k’ umpora hafi, Gumy’ unyikomereze.
Ndagushaka Mukiza we! Kuko noroshye cyane. Niw’ umbwir’ ibinkomeza, Nta wundi mbitezeho.
Ndagushaka Mukiza we! Aho ndi mur’ iyi si. Mu muvumbi no ku zuba, Mu bimbabaza byose.
Ndagushaka Mukiza we! Mbwiriz’ ibitunganye. Ungeze kuri Yor’dani, Umpe no kuyambuka.
hymns.refrain: Sinzagir’ icyo ntinya, Umbwiriz’ iby’ ushaka. Nta cyambuza kuz’ ah’ uri, Ngukurikir’ ah’ ujya.
hymns.author: Jno. R. Sweney

hymns.title: Iyo Nibuts’ Umusarab’ Utangaza
verses: Iyo nibuts’ umusarab’ utangaza, Umwami nyir’ ishema yatangiyeho, Ibyo nungukaga, ntabwo mba nkibyitayeho. Nzinukw’ ibyo niratanaga.
Reb’ inkovu zo ku mubiri we wose, Zituma ngir’ ishavu n’ umunezero. Har’ ubw’ ishavu n’ ibyishimo bijya bihura. Har’ utak’ ikamba mu mahwa?
Nari narazimiye meze nk’ impabe. Ariko narokotse kubw’ ibyago bye; Ntunzibukira ntagir’ ikindi niratana, Kerets’ umusaraba wawe.
Nahw’ ibyaremwe byose byab’ ar’ ibyanjye, Ntacyo nabona nakugereranyaho; Urukundo, n’ ubuntu byaturutse mw’ ijuru, Bituma ndek’ ibyanjye byose.
hymns.author: E. S. Widdemer

hymns.title: Nta Nshuti Nziza Nka Yesu
verses: Nta nshuti nziza nka Yesu, Atsemb’ ibyaha byacu. N’ amahirwe kumwizera, Kukw’ atwuzuza na Se. Iyo tubabaye rwose, Dufit’ ishavu ryinshi, Adusohoza ku Mana, Yumv’ amaganya yacu.
Nitugir’ ibyago byinshi, Tugatotezwa cyane, Byoye kuduter’ ubwoba, Tumwiringire rwose; Nta wundi wabidukiza, Abiduhemuraho. Yes’ az’ intege nke zacu, Jya wisung’ Uwiteka.
Nitugir’ ishavu ryinshi, Tukababara rwose, Yesu niw’ uturokora; Komez’ umwizigire. Nibakugira ruvumwa, Wisung’ Umwami Yesu. Ntazagir’ ubw’ aguhana, Jy’ uhor’ umwizigiye.
hymns.author: C. C. Converse

hymns.title: Yesu Araguhamagara None
verses: Yes’ araguhamagara none, Arakwifuz’ uyu munsi; N’ iki gituma wanga kwitaba, Ukayobagurika?
Yes’ arahamagar’ abarushye, Ngw’ abaruhur’ uyu munsi; Umwikorez’ umutwaro wawe; Ntazagushor’ inshucu.
Yes’ aragutegereje none, Musange non’ uyu munsi; Zan’ ibyaha byaw’ ubyicujije, Ngwino witindiganya.
Yes’ arakwinginga, wumv’ ijwi rye; Mwumvire non’ uyu munsi. Abamwiringira bazishima; Haguruk’ umusange!
hymns.refrain: S. na A.: Uyu munsi, uyu munsi ; Yes’ araguhamagaran’ imbabazi ze. T. na B.: Uyu munsi, none, none; Uyu munsi, none, none; Yesu Yes’ Umwami ni w’ Uguhamagaran’ imbabazi ze.
hymns.author: Geo. C. Stebbins

hymns.title: Hanze Har’ Umushyitsi
verses: Hanze har’ umushyitsi, Kingura! ( Mukingurire, mukingurire! ) Yahoz’ ategereje, Kingur’ ubu! ( Mukingurire, mukingurire! ) Kingurir’ Umukiza, Ataraguhitaho; Yes’ Umwana w’ Imana; Kingur’ ubu ! ( Mukingurire, mukingurire! )

Ugurur’ umutima, Kingura ! ( Mukingurire, mukingurire! ) N’ uzuyaz’ aragenda, Kingur’ ubu! ( Mukingurire, mukingurire! ) Niwe nshuti - magara; Azajy’ akurengera, Kand’ akurind’ iteka: Kingur’ ubu! ( Mukingurire, mukingurire! )

Ntiwumv’ ukw’ akwinginga? Kingura! ( Mukingurire, mukingurire! ) Muhitemw’ ubu ngubu, Kingur’ ubu! ( Mukingurire, mukingurire! ) Ahagaze ku rugi; Azaguhesh’ ihirwe, Maz’ ujy’ umuhimbaza; Kingur’ ubu! ( Mukingurire, mukingurire! )

Akir’ uwo mushyitsi, Kingura! ( Mukingurire, mukingurire! ) Azasangira nawe, Kingur’ ubu! ( Mukingurire, mukingurire! ) Azakubabarira; Iby’ isi nibishira, Akujyane mw’ ijuru; Kingur’ ubu! ( Mukingurire, mukingurire! )
hymns.author: E. O. Excel

hymns.title: Ubyarw’ Ubwa Kabiri
verses: Harih’ uwasanze Yesu n’ ijoro, Amubaz’ iby’ inzira y’ agakiza. Yes’ amusubiz’ amweruriy’ ati : N’ ukuri nkubwire :
Namwe nimwite kur’ iryo jambo rye, Kuko Yesu yarivuz’ aryeruye; Nibyo bizabagirir’ umumaro, Dor’ aravug’ ati :
Abashak’ uburuhukiro bose, No kuririmbana n’ abacunguwe, No guhabw’ ubugingo buhoraho, Mwite kur’ ibi ngo:
hymns.refrain: Ubyarw’ ubwa kabiri (rwose); Ubyarw’ ubwa kabiri (rwose); N’ ukuri, n’ ukuri, ndakubwir’ ubu Kw’ aribw’ uzarama (rwose).
hymns.author: Geo. C. Stebbins

hymns.title: Mucunguzi Wanjye
verses: Mucunguzi wanjye, wumv’ uko ntaka; Ngwin’ unyirokorere. Umutima wanjy’ ugoswe n’ ibyago; Ngwin’ unyirokorere.
Mwami, singira shinge na rugero; Ngwin’ unyirokorere. Kwitabwaho nawe nibyo byanyura; Ngwin’ unyirokorere.
Dore ndi jyenyine, nabay’ impabe; Ngwin’ unyirokorere. Nubuy’ amaso ngo mbeshweho nawe; Ngwin’ unyirokorere.
Ntuhinyur’ umutim’ ushenjaguwe; Ngwin’ unyirokorere, Nyamunek’ ita ku gusenga kwanjye, Ngwin’ unyirokorere.
hymns.refrain: Nahabiye kure, nd’ akahebwe; Nahabiye kure y’ iwacu. Nyakira none, maz’ ungez’ iwacu; Ngwin’ unyirokorere.
hymns.author: W.H Done

hymns.title: Ashobora Gukiza
verses: Ashobora gukiza! Mubyamamaze hose; Ashobora gukiz’ umwumvira wese, Akamwarura mu murir’ ugurumana. Yes’ ashobora gukiza ushaka wese.
Ashobora gukiza! Mbese n’ ukuri koko? Ahw’ afit’ imbarag’ ibasha kunkiza? Mbwira, nyamuna mbwira, Mbese Kristo wishwe, Yashobora kumbohora, akandokora?
Ashobora gukiza! Mugenzi we komera! N’ uyoboka Yesu azakurokora. Ntugatinye Satani, Jy’ ugundira Yesu; Reka kujy’ ushidikanya, Jy’ umwiringira.
hymns.refrain: Ashobora kugukiza, No kukurokor’ ubu; Mwene Data n’ umwizera, azagukiza.
hymns.author: Emma L. Morton

hymns.title: Twubake Ku Rutare Rw’ Iteka
verses: Twubake ku Rutare rw’ iteka, Nirwo Yes’ umucunguzi; Nibwo tuzabasha gushikama, Umugaru n’ utera.
Harihw’ abubaka ku musenyi, Barangamiy’ iby’ iyi si; Abandi bubaka ku muraba w’ ibyaha no kwikuza.
Twubake ku Rutare rw’ ukuri, Nirwo rushikam’ iteka. Kurwiringira kuzahoraho, Nirwo gakiza kacu.
hymns.refrain: Sop : Twubake kuri we, Twubake kuri we; Twubake ku Rutare rw’ iteka, Nirwo Yes’ Umwami. A.T.B : Twubake kuri we, Niwe Rutare; Twubake kuri we, Niwe Rutare; Twubake ku Rutare rw’ iteka, Nirwo Yes’ Umwami.
hymns.author: F. E. Belden

hymns.title: Menyesh’ Ibya Yesu Byose
verses: Menyesh’ ibya Yesu byose, Maz’ ubinyandikemo; Mbwir’ ibye by’ ingenzi byose, Nezezwa no kubyumva. Mbwir’ ukw’ abamarayika baririmbye yavutse, Ngw’ Icyubahiro ku Mana, Amahoro abe mu b’ isi.
Mbwira n’ ibyo mu butayu, N’ iminsi yahamaze; N’ uburyo yageragejwe, Agatsind’ ibishuko; Mbwira n’ iby’ imirimo ye, Vug’ uko yababajwe; Agahemurwa bamwanze, Agahinyurwa nk’ impabe.
Mbwir’ iby’ umusaraba we, Uwo bamubambyeho, Mbwira n’ aho bamuhambye, Mbwira n’ uko yazutse, N’ urukundo ruhebuje, Ntacyo narugeraho. Dore, ndababaye, mbwira iby’ urukundo rwancunguye.
hymns.refrain: Menyesh’ ibya Yesu byose, Maz’ ubinyandikemo. Mbwir’ ibye by’ ingenzi byose, Nezezwa no kubyumva.
hymns.author: Jno. R. Sweney

hymns.title: Yes’ Umwungeri Mwiza
verses: Yes’ Umwungeri mwiza, Aragutarura, Ngo winjire mw’ ishyo rye; Nih’ uzaruhukira. Ngwin’ ugif’ ubusore, Ngwin’ ukiri muto; Injir’ uzarindwa rwose, Ntuzagir’ icy’ uganya.
Yes’ Umwungeri mwiza, Yarakwitangiye; Araguhamagara ati: Nyabuna ngwino, Gira bwang’ uve mu kaga, Ntugumye, kwijyana. Injir’ uzarindwa rwose, Wibere mu mahoro.
Reka kuragiriza, Isega yateye, Ishak’ intama zose, Zazimiriye kure. Arik’ Umwungeri mwiza, Arakuburira; Injir’ uzarindwa rwose, Muban’ akaramata.
hymns.refrain: Aragutaruran’ urukundo, ati: Wa mpabe we, ngwino nsanga. Dor’ Umukiz’ arategereje, Yes’ Umwungeri wanjye.
hymns.author: W. A. Ogden

hymns.title: Naratuwe Mu Gipimo
verses: Umucamanza n’ agera, Akarondor’ ibyacu, Tuzamera nk’ izahabu, Cyangwa s’ inkamb’ itabwa?
Mbese tuzumv’ ishimwe ngo: Nuko, wakoze neza; Cyangw’ iteka ryo gupfa ngo: Mwasanzwe mudashyitse?
Nimutyo twite kw’ ijwi rye, Igihe kikiriho. Tureke gutindiganya, Tumaramaze rwose.
hymns.refrain: Naratuwe mu gipimo, Nsangwa ntashyitse; Naratuwe n’ ijambo rye, Nsangwa ntashyitse.
hymns.author: F. E. Belden

hymns.title: Wumv’ Amagambo Y’ Umukiza
verses: Wumv’ amagambo y’ Umukiza; Niy’ aguhesh’ ubugingo. Wa munyabyaha we, menya ko hahirw’ abakomez’ amategeko.
Kuyumva gusa nta kamaro, N’ukutugwabiza rwose; Kuyumva dutinya, ntibyadukiza, Hahirw’ abayumvira yose.
Bazinjiran’ umunezero mu mudugudu w’ Imana, Ahatab’ ishavu n’ umubabaro, Beger’ igiti cy’ ubugingo.
hymns.refrain: Hahirw’ abayakomeza yose, Nibo bahirwa, barahirwa; Hahirw’ abayakomeza yose, Barahirwa, barahirwa.
hymns.author: P. P. Bliss

hymns.title: Nta Nshuti Nziz’ Ihwanye Na Yesu
verses: Nta nshuti nziz’ ihwanye na Yesu; Nta n’ imwe! nta n’ imwe! Nta wundi wabasha kudukiza; Nta wundi! nta wundi!
Nta nshut’ ibahw’ ikomeye nka we; Nta n’ imwe! nta n’ imwe! Nyamara nta wiyoroshya nka we; Nta n’ umwe! nta n’ umwe!
Nta kanya na gato tutabana; Ye nta ko! ye nta ko! Nta joro ryira tutari kumwe; Ye nta ryo! ye nta ryo!
Mbese har’ uwo yigez’ ahana? Nta n’ umwe! Nta n’ umwe! Mbese har’ umunyabyah’ aheza? Nta n’ umwe! nta n’ umwe!
Harihw’ impano yahwana nawe? Nta n’ imwe! nta n’ imwe! Mbese har’ uwo yavuts’ ijuru? nta n’ umwe! nta n’ umwe!
hymns.refrain: Yes’ az’ ibiturushya byose; Azabana natw’ iteka. Nta ncuti nziz’ ihwanye na Yesu, Nta n’ imwe! nta n’ imwe!
hymns.author: Geo. C. Hugg

hymns.title: Kurabukw’ Umusaraba Wawe
verses: Kurabukw’ umusaraba wawe, Mwami nibyo byambeshaho; Sinita ku manjwe y’ iby’ isi, Ntez’ agakiza ku musaraba.
Ubwo nari nkibon’ Umukiza, Yanyakirany’ ibyishimo; Na n’ ubu ningir’ ibindwanya, Kumurabukwa nibyo byankiza.
Nzajya mpang’ amas’ umusaraba, Kandi mwiringire rwose. Nta wutumbir’ umusaraba, Wari wiger’ aneshwa n’ Umwanzi.
hymns.refrain: S. : Kurabukw’ i Golgota, Nibyo bizambeshaho. Mbeg’ amahirwe yanjye, Yo kurabukwa Yesu! A., T. na B. : Kurabu … Go… Golgota, Nibyo bi … mbe … mbeshaho. Mbeg’ amahirwe yanjye rwe yanjye, Yo kurabukwa Yesu! …rabukwa Yesu.
hymns.author: F. E. Belden

hymns.title: Yesu Araguhamagaran’ Ituza
verses: Yes’ araguhamagaran’ ituza, Ub’ arahamagara; Ategereje k’ umwiyegurira, We kuzuyaza; ngwino.
Twatinzwa n’ iki, kand’ ategereje kuturokora twese? Twahinyuzwa n’ ik’ imbabazi zose adufitiye twese?
Twakererew’ ibihe birahita, Aradutegereje; Turarindagirira mu mwijima; Nimutyo tumusange.
Zirikan’ urukundo ruhebuje, Yadusezeranije; N’ ubwo twagomye, Tuzababarirwa; Aradutegereje.
hymns.refrain: Ngwino ( ngwino); Ngwino (ngwino); Abarushye mwese nimuze. Yes’ araguhamagaran’ ituza, ati: Mukundwa, ngwino.
hymns.author: W. L. Thompson

hymns.title: Har’ Irembo Ryuguruye
verses: Har’ irembo ryuguruwe, Ryatumye mpishurirwa. Umusaraba wa kure, Yesu yatangiyeho.
Irembo ryugururiwe abashak’ agakiza; Ngw’ abakire n’ abakene bose barinyuremo.
Nshuti komez’ utwaran’ irembo ricyuguruwe. Ikorer’ umusaraba; Nibw’ uzahabw’ ikamba.
Tumaze kwambuk’ uruzi, Dute wa musaraba; Twambikw’ amakamba meza, Twitahire mw’ ijuru.
hymns.refrain: Mbeg’ ineza n’ imbabazi byatumye nugururirwa! Nugururiwe, Iman’ ihimbazwe!
hymns.author: S.J. Vail

hymns.title: Umukiz’ Ageze Hafi
verses: Umukiz’ ageze hafi, Yes’ Umukunzi wanjye. Yazanywe no guhembura; Mwese nimumwumvire.
Icyubahiro kib’ icye; Mutyo twizere Yesu. Nkund’ izina ry’ Umukiza; Nkund’ izina rya Yesu.
Izina rye rirankiza, Rikamar’ agahinda. Nta kinezeza nko kumva, Iryo zina rya Yesu.
N’ az’ azatugororera, Ikamba ry’ ubugingo. Ubwo nibwo tuzicara, Tuvug’ iby’ agakiza.
hymns.refrain: Nta wuhwany’ izina nawe, Rirut’ amazina yose. Nta wusingizwa nkawe; Yesu mwiza rwose.
hymns.author: Arr. J. H. Stockton

hymns.title: Ntacyo Wasigiye Yesu
verses: Dor’ umutima wawe, Wuzuyemw’ amaganya. Nta mwanya wasigiye Yesu ngo yinjiremo? Ub’ ahagaze ku rugi, Arakomanga yinginga. Nta mwanya wasigiye Yesu ngo yinjiremo?
Upfush’ igih’ ubusa, Kand’ ar’ ingenzi rwose. Mbese nta mwany’ ufite wo gukorera Yesu? Nturarushy’ ugerageza gutarur’ abazimiye; Mbese nta mwany’ ufite wo gukorera Yesu?
Mbese k’ umaranira kwishakir’ ubutunzi, Nta gih’ ufite washishikarir’ ibya Yesu? Dor’ uharanira kwikubir’ ibinezeza by’ isi; Nta gih’ ufite washishikarir’ ibya Yesu?
Wabay’ ingumba nk’ igiti cy’ ibibabi gusa. Mbese ntabwo wazerer’ Umwami Yes’ imbuto? Ntacy’ ufite cyo kuzamumurikira n’ agaruka; Mbese ntabwo wazerer’ Umwami Yes’ imbuto?
hymns.author: W. J. Kirkpatrick by Per

hymns.title: Mwami Ndumv’ Ijwi Ryawe
verses: Mwami ndumv’ ijwi ryawe, Rindarika ngo nze, Nuhagizwe ya maraso, Wamviriye kera.
N’ ubwo nje nahindanye, Ntunyirengagize; Ahubw’ umboneze rwose, Mb’ umweru waka de.
Yesu niw’ unkomeza, Niw’ umpa gutsinda; Ng’ urukundo n’ amahoro, Binsabemo rwose.
Mwese nimwishimire! Ya maras’ akiza, Yatwujuje na Rurema, Ngo tub’ abana be.
hymns.refrain: Mukiza ndaje, Ubu nj’ ah’ uri! Nyejesha ya maraso, Wamviriye kera.
hymns.author: Rev. L. Hartsough

hymns.title: Ndumv’ Umukiz’ Ambwira
verses: Ndumv’ Umukiz’ ambwira, Ko mbuz’ imbaraga; Ngo: Njye museng’ iteka, Ntacyo nzamuburana.
Niw’ ufit’ imbaraga, Zihagije rwose; Zo gukiz’ ababembe, Zikoroshy’ umutima.
Ubwo nta cyiza nkora, Nibesherejweho; N’ ubuntu bwawe gusa, Ni wowe nkesha byose.
Imbere ya ya ntebe, Nzahahagarara; Nzaba njyany’ iminyago, Nyishyikirize Yesu.
hymns.refrain: Yanndihiriye imyenda yose; Yambabariy’ ibyaha, Bihinduk’ umweru.
hymns.author: Rev. L. Hartsough

hymns.title: Harihw’ Isokw’ Itukura
verses: Harihw’ isokw’ itukura, Ivamw’ amaraso; Niy’ Umwami yamviriye, Ngw’ ayandokoreshe.
Mpinduts’ icyaremwe gishya, Mbyaw’ ubwa kabiri. Ntsinze kamere ya kera, Nzahora ndi mushya.
Nsigaye mvirwa n’ umucyo, Sinkirindagira; Nshitse ku ngoyi z’ umwanzi, Mbatuwe na Yesu.
Mbeg’ ubuntu butangaje! Kwejeshw’ amaraso! Byanyujuje n’ Umukiza, Yesu wambambiwe.
hymns.refrain: Nduz’ umuvu w’ amaraso; Ndayogamo nere rwose! Haleluya! Aranyeza, Aranyeza, Aranyeza!
hymns.author: Mrs Jos. F. Knapp by Per

hymns.title: Data Ndambuy’ Amaboko
verses: Data, ndambuy’ amaboko; Nta wundi wamfasha; Iy’ unyivumburiy’ ukamvaho, Mbes’ ahandi najya ni he?
Nizey’ Umwana waw’ ubu, Undem’ umutima; Ujy’ unkenur’ umar’ ubukene, Nkomeze nemerwe nawe.
Nyir’ ukwizera ni wowe, Nuburiy’ amaso; Icyamp’ ukangwiriza kwizera, Kuko ntagufite napfa.
Ntuzantererane ngo mpfe, Ahubw’ umbesheho; Nibwo nzacika ku kinyoma, Mbishobojwe n’ Umwuka wawe.
Nakwishima cyane rwose, Nibaniye nawe; Maze nkakumv’ umpumuriz’ umbwira ko nagiriw’ ubuntu.
Nizeye rwos’ ubu yuko, Yesu yampfiriye; Kandi kubw’ amaraso ye yeza, Nzabaturwa mve mu byaha.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Nzasingiz’ Urukundo Rwa Yesu
verses: Nzasingiz’ urukundo rwa Yesu, Wambambiwe; Yemeye kumanuka, Azanywe no kumpfira.
Yesu yambabarijwe, Ntararushya mbabara; Yahoze ansabira, Ntarameny’ iyo bijya.
Urukundo rw’ Imana, Mbega ngo rurankiza! Ibyaha byanjye byose, Bikantamururwaho!
Nta cyiza nakoreye, Umwami wankunz’ atyo; None maze kwemezwa, Mwami nguhaye byose.
hymns.refrain: Nzasingiz’ urukundo rwe; Mpimbaze, Yaramfiriye, Ashaka kumbeshaho; Nzahora muhimbaza.
hymns.author: F. E. Belden

hymns.title: Nyigiza Hafi
verses: Nyigiza hafi, mbane nawe; Nta cyandutira kubana nawe. Ngumisha mu gituza cyawe; Mpisha nibere mu buhungiro; Mpisha nibere mu buhungiro.
Nyigiza hafi, ntacyo mfite; Ntacyo nzanyehw’ ituro ry’ Umwami, Kerets’ umutim’ ushavuye; Mpa kuhagizw’ amaraso yawe; Mpa kuhagizw’ amaraso yawe.
Nyigiza hafi, Mwami wanjye; Nishimiye gucika ku byaha. Ndeke kwikuza n’ ubwibone; Umpe Yes’ Umwami wambambiwe; Umpe Yes’ Umwami wambambiwe.
Nyigiza hafi, ngihumeka; Kugez’ ubwo nzager’ i Budapfa; Maze mu bihe bidashira, Nzibere hafi y’ Umwami wanjye; Nzibere hafi y’ Umwami wanjye.
hymns.author: Mrs. C. H. Morris

hymns.title: Har’ Izina Rihebuje
verses: Har’ izina rihebuje, Rirut’ ayandi yose nzi; Ni ry’ Imana yaturemye yis’ Umwana way’ ikunda.
Niryo rimpesh’ umugisha; Nkunda kuryogez’ iteka. Simpwema kuriririmba, Mvug’ ukuntu rihebuje.
Icyampa nkaririmbana n’ abamarayika bera, Nkajya nsingiza rya zina rihebuj’ ayandi yose!
hymns.refrain: Ni ryo zina ryera (izina ); Ni ryo zina ryera ( ryera de ) ! Ryakomotse ku Mana, Riza mw isi, Maze riririmbwa ( izina ) n’ abamarayika ( ryera de ). Iryo zina n’ irya Yesu.
hymns.author: W. A. Ogden

hymns.title: Yesu Gusa
verses: Yesu gusa, niw’ ukwiriy’ ikuzo; Naho jyewe, ntacyo ndi cyo rwose; Sinkwiriye kub’ ari jyew’ uratwa; Yesu gusa, niw’ uzajy’ uvugwa.
Yesu gusa, niw’ umar’ agahinda; Naho jyewe nd’ uwo gushavura. Sinshobora kwikorer’ ibindushya; Naho Yesu nta kimushengura.
Yesu gusa, ab’ ari we wogezwa; Sinkwiriye kwiratan’ ibyanjye. Yesu gusa, niw’ uzambonekamo; Kugez’ ubwo nzahinduka nka we.
Yesu gusa niw’ umar’ ubukene; Niwe gusa nkesh’ ibyanjye byose. Yesu gusa, niw’ undutira byose; Yesu Mwami twibanir’ iteka.
hymns.author: Fannie E. Bolton

hymns.title: Nk’ Ukw’ Izuba Rituvira
verses: Nkukw’ izuba rituvira, Rikarabagirana, Nik’ umucyo wo mw’ ijuru wansabye mu mutima, Wawukuyemw’ iby’ amanjwe, Utangaz’ ibihishwe; Kuko mu mutima wanjye, Nahatuj’ Umukiza.
Natay’ agahinda kose; Ntabwo nkikitayeho; Kuk’ unyambik’ amahoro, Ameze nk’ umwitero, Nkwerekejeh’ umutima, Ndakwishimiye cyane. Nzagezw’ i wawe mw’ ijuru, Na rwa rukundo rwawe.
Mukiza warancunguye; Nd’ uwaw’ uko ndi kose. Nyemerera nguhimbaze, Nkuber’ umucyo waka. Nkwerekejeh’ umutima, Ndakwishimiye cyane. Nzagezw’ i wawe mw’ ijuru, Na rwa rukundo rwawe.
hymns.refrain: Mbeg’ umucyo w’ agatangaza, Wansabye mu mutima! Ineza y’ Umwami Yesu, Yambereye nk’ umucyo.
hymns.author: Melody by M. T. Haughey. Arr

hymns.title: Njya Nkunda Kuririmb’Indirimbo
verses: Njya nkunda kuririmb’ indirimbo, Ngo yarancunguye. Niwe waciy’ ingoyi z’ umwanzi, Maz’ arambatura.
Mfit’ Umukiz’ unogeye rwose, Niwe wancunguye. Mpimbazwa no gukor’ iby’ ashaka, Kuko yancunguye.
Nzahora mpamya ntacyo nikenga, Yuko yancunguye. Sinzashidikanya ngo ncogore, Kuko yancunguye.
Mfit’ aho yanteguriye heza, Kuko yancunguye. Niho nzibanira naw’ iteka, Kuko yancunguye.
hymns.refrain: Sop: Kuk’ ubwe yancunguye; Kuk’ ubwe yancunguye, Nzahimbaz’ izina rye. Kuk’ ubwe yancunguye, Nzaririmbir’ uwandokoye. A.T.B.: Kuk’ ubwe yancunguye; Kuk’ ubwe yancunguye; Kuk’ ubwe yancunguye, Nzahimbaz’ izina rye. Kuk’ ubwe yancunguye, Kuk’ ubwe yancunguye; Nzaririmbir’ uwandokoye.
hymns.author: E. O. Excell

hymns.title: Iman’ Ikund’ Utunyoni
verses: Iman’ ikund’ utunyoni, Tuba mur’ iyi si; Ubwo yita ku tunyoni, Nzi ko nanjy’ inkunda.
Niy’ irimbish’ uburabyo, Buhumura neza; Ubw’ ikund’ uburaby’ ityo, Nzi ko nanjy’ inkunda.
Imana yaremye byose, Ntigir’ icy’ isobwa. Nzi kw’ ikund’ abana bose, Nzi ko nanjy’ inkunda.
hymns.refrain: Sop: Kuk’ ubwe yancunguye; Kuk’ ubwe yancunguye, Nzahimbaz’ izina rye. Kuk’ ubwe yancunguye, Nzaririmbir’ uwandokoye. A.T.B.: Kuk’ ubwe yancunguye; Kuk’ ubwe yancunguye; Kuk’ ubwe yancunguye, Nzahimbaz’ izina rye. Kuk’ ubwe yancunguye, Kuk’ ubwe yancunguye; Nzaririmbir’ uwandokoye.
hymns.author: S. W. Straub

hymns.title: N’ Igihe Cyo Gusenga
verses: N’ igihe cyo gusenga, Twicishe bugufi, Duteraniye hamwe turamya Yesu, Nituza tumwizeye, Azajy’ aturinda; Mbeg’ ihumure ryiza, ryo kwibanira nawe!
N’ igihe cyo gusenga, Umwam’ ari hafi, Kand’ adufitiy’ ibambe rya kibyeyi. Tumuganyir’ ibyacu, Dushir’ agahinda; Mbeg’ ihumure ryiza, ryo kumvikana nawe!
N’ igihe cyo gusenga, no gushyikirana, N’ Imana yac’ ihor’ ituzirikana, Iturem’ agatima, tub’ indahangarwa; Mbeg’ ihumure ryiza, ryo kumvikana nawe!
N’ igihe cyo gusenga, twiringiye Yesu. Twizeye kw’ azaduh’ ibyo, tumusaba, Kukw’ atangan’ ubuntu, ataziganije. Mbeg’ ihumure ryiza, ryo gutabarwa nawe!
hymns.refrain: N’ igihe cyiza cyo kuramy’ Umwami, Mbeg’ ihumure ryiza, ryo kwibanira na we!
hymns.author: W. H Doane

hymns.title: Yesu Waduhay’ Isezerano
verses: Yesu waduhaye isezerano, K’ uzabana natwe, niduterana, Naho twaba babiri, Cyangwa batatu, Uzab’ uri kumwe n’ abana bawe.
Wateranye natwe, mu bindi bihe, Ariko na n’ ubu turakwifuza. Ngwino, Mubyeyi mwiza, Turakwinginze; Twumvir’ utwemere, Duhirwe nawe.
Wakir’ indirimbo z’ ishimwe ryacu, Uduhe gusenga tubyitayeho. Twongerere kwizera, No kwiringira; Dukundane rwose, Dushyire hamwe.
hymns.refrain: Yesu, ngwin’ uduhire, Tutarava hano; Yesu ngwin’ uduhire ubu, Tuban’ iteka.
hymns.author: Dr W. O Perkins

hymns.title: Nd’ Uwawe, Mwami
verses: Nd’ uwawe Mwami, Ubu nditanze; Numvis’ ubury’ udukunda. Nsingiriz’ amabok’ untabare, Njye nibanire nawe.
Nkwiyeguriye namaramaje, Nkoresh’ umurimo wawe; Nkwerekejeh’ umutima wanjye, Ng’ uhor’ ugengwa nawe.
Kubana nawe birahebuje, Nibyo bindutira byose. Iyo mpfukamye, nkakuganyira, Dusabana nk’ inshuti.
Sinashobora kukurondora, Ngo mmeny’ urukundo rwawe. Ruzahishurwa turi mw’ ijuru, Aho twateguriwe.
hymns.refrain: S.A : Hafi yawe, Nibyo nifuza, Ku musaraba wawe. Hafi yawe, Mwami, tuban’ iteka, Njye nibanira nawe. T.B : Hafi yawe cyane, ni byo nifuza, Ku musaraba wawe. Hafi yawe, Mwami, Tuban’ iteka, Njye nibanira nawe.
hymns.author: W. H. Doane

hymns.title: Ndusheho Gusa Nawe
verses: Ndusheho gusa nawe, Yesu Mukiza wanjye; Nyuzuz’ ubugwaneza, Mp’ urukundo ruhebuje. Ndusheho kumera nkawe, Aho ngenda hose, Mwami; Ndiyoroheje rwose, Mwami njye ngukurikiza.
Nib’ irind’ icyanira, Ikamenya n’ igishwi; Sinshidikanya rwose, Nanjy’ ihor’ inyitayeho. Izanyigisha kwitonda, Imbabarir’ amafuti; Ndiyoroheje rwose, Mwami njye ngukurikiza.
Ndusheho gusa nawe, Ndusheh’ uko bukeye; Nyigiza hafi yawe, Ahw’ amahor’ adashira. Uhor’ umpindura mushya, Kubw’ urukund’ ungirira; Ndiyoroheje rwose, Mwami njye ngukurikiza.
hymns.author: W. H. Doane

hymns.title: Yesu, Unkomereze Ku Musaraba
verses: Yes’ unkomereze, Ku musaraba wawe; Har’ isokw’ ibeshaho, Itemb’ i Kal’vari.
Hafi y’ umusaraba, Mpaboner’ iteka, Imbabazi n’ impuhwe, Bitarondoreka.
Hafi y’ umusaraba, Intama y’ Imana, Niyo yahangejeje, Ntsind’ ibimbabaza.
Hafi y’ umusaraba, Niho ntegereje; Niringiye kugera, Mu bwami bw’ Imana.
hymns.refrain: Umusaraba wa Yesu nzawirata, Kugez’ ubwo nzabona uburuhukiro.
hymns.author: W. H. Doane

hymns.title: Nyemerera Ngendane Nawe
verses: Nyemerera ngendane nawe, Mana, Nk’ ukw’ Enoki yagenje. Nyoboresh’ ukuboko kwawe, Unyerekez’ ah’ ushaka hose. Nubw’ inzir’ itagaragara, Nkomeze njyane nawe, Mwami.
Ntabwo nahangara kugenda, Ntari kumwe nawe, Mukiza; Nagoswe n’ abanz’ igihumbi; Dor’ imitegw’ intaye hagati. Burije rwose, ntihabona, Nkomeze njyane nawe, Mwami.
Ninguma mu maboko yawe, Sinzaba ncyitaye ku by’ isi; Nta kindi nziratana rwose, Keretse wa musaraba wawe, Ngez’ ubwo nzager’ i Siyoni, Nkomeze njyane nawe, Mwami.
hymns.author: Edwin Barnes

hymns.title: Icyampa Nkarangurura
verses: Icyampa nkarangurura, Ngahimbaz’ Umwami wanjye, Ariko ni nde wabasha kuririmb’ ishimwe rya Yesu?
Niwe munezero wanjye, Ni naw’ umpesh’ amahoro. Mu makuba no mu byago, Yesu niw’ umber’ ihumure.
Niwe byiringiro byanjye, Byo kuzahabw’ ubugingo. Mu mwijim’ amber’ umucyo, Yesu niw’ umber’ ihumure.
hymns.refrain: Urukundo ruhebuje! Urukundo rwa Yesu! Urukundo ruhebuje! Urukundo rwa Yesu!
hymns.author: E. S. Lorenz

hymns.title: Mwami Nzi Kw’ Ari We Nkunda
verses: Mwami, nzi kw’ ari We nkunda, Kurut’ iby’ iyi si; Kuko wampay’ amahoro, Atagir’ impinduka.
Nzi k’ uhor’ unzirikana, Undutira byose, Mwami, kugutekereza bindutir’ ibyiratwa.
Wanyujuj’ umunezero, Natay’ umuruho. Kumenya k’ unkunda cyane, Nibyo bimpumuriza.
Mucunguzi wanjye mwiza, Icyakunyereka! Ngo tuzabane mw’ ijuru, Ahatab’ agahinda.
hymns.refrain: Urukundo rwankijije (ngakira), Ntirurondoreka. Ntitwarusobanukirwa (na hato), Kuko ruhebuje (ruhebuje).
hymns.author: R. E. Hudson

hymns.title: Ahw’ Azanyobora Hose
verses: Ahw’ azanyobora hose, Niho nzishimira kujya; Kukw’ ari jye yapfiriye, Akanzir’ atacumuye.
Nishimira kw’ antegeka, Nishimira kw’ anyobora. Nishimira kumwumvira, Kukw’ ari jye yapfiriye.
Singishidikanya rwose, Kuko ndi kumwe na Yesu. Nizigiye ko vub’ aha, Nzamureba duhanganye.
hymns.refrain: Yes’ azanyobor’ iteka, Maz’ angez’ iw’ amahoro; Kukw’ ar’ inshuti y’ ukuri, Itigeze guhemuka.
hymns.author: J. M. Black

hymns.title: Isi Ndayihararutse, Mpisemo Yesu
verses: Isi ndayihararutse, Mpisemo Yesu gusa. Mpaz’ umunezero wayo, Uzashirana nayo.
Isi ndayihararutse, Mpisemo Yesu gusa. Mu kaga niwe humure; Nzahora nezerewe.
Isi ndayihararutse, Mpisemo Yesu gusa. Icyamp’ akamwenyurira, Nkamurikirwa nawe.
Isi ndayihararutse, Mpisemo Yesu gusa. Nzirat’ umusaraba we, Yatangiyeho kera.
hymns.refrain: Imbabazi zidashira, N’ urukundo rw’ iteka, Nibyo bijya binyemeza, Ko nzaramishwa nawe.
