hymns.author: Jno. R. Sweney

hymns.title: Mwami Wanjye, Nyakira
verses: Mwami wanjye nyakira, Ndakwiyeguriy’ ubu; Ngay’ amaboko yanjye, Yakoresh’ uk’ ushaka.
Ngib’ ibirenge byanjye, Byerekez’ ah’ ushaka. Ngir’ ijwi ryanjye na ryo, Rijye riguhimbaza.
Nguhay’ akanwa kanjye; Mwami, kakuvugire. Ngub’ ubutunzi bwanjye, Sinzagir’ icyo nkwima.
Nguhay’ igihe cyanjye, Sinzakiguteraho; Nguhay’ ubwenge bwanjye, Bukoresh’ uk’ ushaka.
Ngiy’ imigambi yanjye; Igengwe nawe, Mwami. Nguy’ umutima wanjye, Ube uwawe rwose.
Mwam’ urukundo rwanjye, Ni wowe nzarukunda; Nkwihaye nimazeyo, None n’ iteka ryose.
hymns.refrain: Nyuhagiz’ amaraso yawe ( nere rwose ); Maz’ anyezehw’ inenge yose ( nere rwose ); Ibyanjye byose ndabikweguriye, None n’ iteka ryose.
hymns.author: W. J. Kirkpatrick

hymns.title: Nabony’ Inshut’ Ihebuje
verses: Nabony’ inshut’ ihebuje! Yankunze ntarabaho; Yanyiyegereshej’ ineza, N’ urukundo rw’ iteka, Bituma dushyikirana, Ubudatandukana; Kuko nd’ uwe nawe n’ uwanjye, Ibihe bidashira.
Nabony’ inshut’ ihebuje! Yamberey’ impongano. Urets’ ibyo kump’ ubugingo, Yaranyitangiriye. Ntacyo mfite nit’ icyanjye, Kuko tubisangiye. Ndamwiyeguriye burundu; Ibihe bidashira.
Nabony’ inshut’ ihebuje! Nyir’ ubutware bwose! Nibw’ indindish’ uko bukeye; Izangeza mw’ ijuru. Ibyiza byanshyizw’ imbere, Binsubizamw’ intege; Reka nkore, noye kwiganda, Ngez’ ubw’ izanduhura.
Nabony’ incut’ ihebuje! Y’ impuhwe n’ urukundo. Niy’ indind’ ikanyunganira; Niy’ indenger’ iteka. Mbese n’ iki cyadutanya, Ko dukundana rwose? N’ iby’ iyi si, cyangwa s’ urupfu? Oya nzab’ uw’ iteka.
hymns.author: Geo C. Stebbins

hymns.title: Numvise Yesu Ambwira Ati
verses: Numvise Yes’ ambwir’ ati: Ngwino nkuruhure. Zan’ ibikurushya byose, Mbikwikorerere. Musanga, mez’ uko nari ndi, ndushye, mfite n’ ishavu; Amber’ uburuhukiro, Maz’ aranezeza.
Numvise Yes’ ambwir’ ati: Ndaguher’ ubuntu, Amaz’ azakubeshaho, Unyw’ uram’ iteka. Nuko nsanga Yesu maz’ ampa ya mazi y’ ubugingo, Nshir’ inyota, Ndahembuka; Nzahorana nawe.
Numvise Yes’ ambwir’ ati: Ni jye Mucyo w’ isi. N’ undeb’ uramurikirwa, Ntuzarindagira. Maze muhanz’ amaso koko, Mbon’ ar’ izuba ryanjye; Rizamvir’ iminsi yose y’ ubugingo bwanjye.
hymns.author: Louis Spohr

hymns.title: Mwami Mb’ Uwawe Maramaje
verses: Mwami, mb’ uwawe maramaje, Nyigisha, nyigisha. Nkor’ iby’ ukunda, Mwami wanjye; Komez’ umfashe.
Iby’ iyi si byamarir’ iki, Ntari kumwe nawe? Byose nzabihara kubwawe, Ntungishwe nawe.
Ndets’ umunezero w’ iyi si, Ngwino twibanire; Nibyo bizajya binogera, Bimpumurize.
hymns.refrain: Mb’ uwawe ( Mwami ) ; Mb’ uwawe ( Mwami ) ; Niyo migambi yanjye ; Mb’ uwawe ( Mwami ) ; Mb’ uwawe ( Mwami ) ; Mb’ uwawe Mwami, None.
hymns.author: F. E. Belden

hymns.title: Mbeg’ Umuns’ Urush’ Indi Kwera
verses: Mbeg’ umuns’ urush’ indi kwera; Niwo wa karindwi! Ng’ uratuma ndek’ iby’ isi, Nkibwir’ iby’ ijuru!
Mbeg’ uyu munsi wa karindwi, Turuhukiramo, Ng’ uradutera kuramya Data, Wo mw’ ijuru!
Ni mutyo turamy’ Uhoraho, Watuzirikanye, Agaherakw’ akaduha, Uyu munsi wera.
Niw’ utugobotor’ ibyaha, Bikaducikaho, Kukw’ atugirir’ ubuntu, Buvuye mw’ ijuru.
hymns.author: Kingsley

hymns.title: Udusezeresh’ Umugisha Wawe
verses: Udusezeresh’ umugisha wawe; Mwam’ utwuzuz’ amahoro; Urukundo rwawe rudusabemo, Tubone kunesha rwose. Ngwin’ uduhembure, Ngwin’ uduhembure; Tukiri mur’ iyi si y’ igomero.
Tuguhay’ ishimwe no kukuramya, Kubw’ ubutumwa bw’ imvaho, Bwagukomotseho bukadukiza, Bunyur’ imitima yacu; Tubushikamemo, Tubushikamemo; Tugundir’ ukuri, Tudacogora.
Mbeshwaho n’ imbabazi zawe nyinshi, None ndakwiyeguriye. Ngwin’ uduhumurish’ impuhwe zawe, Duhore turwan’ ishyaka; Tuzager’ i wawe, Tuzager’ iwawe; Tukubone nta kidukingirije.
hymns.author: Sicilian

hymns.title: Mukiza, Ndamaramaje
verses: Mukiza, ndamaramaje, Ndatwaranira kugera, Ku rugero runkwiriye; Mwami mfasha ngo ndusheho.
Ntabwo ngifit’ umutima, Wo kuguma mu by’ iyi si; N’ ubwo bamwe babikunda, Ngambiriye kujya mbere.
Ndashaka gusumb’ iby’ isi, Nubw’ umwanz’ anyibasiye; Kuko namaze kwizera, Yukw’ Iman’ izandengera.
Ndashaka kumaranira, Kurabukw’ ubwiza bwawe; Ariko nkomeze nsenge, Ngez’ ubwo nzager’ i wawe.
hymns.refrain: Nzamura maze nger’ aho wangeneye, Mwami wanjye; Ku rugero rusumbyeho; Mwami mfasha ngo ndusheho.
hymns.author: Chas. H. Gabriel

hymns.title: Ntushak’ Urwitwazo
verses: Ntushak’ urwitwazo, Harihw’ imirimo, Ahubw’ itegure gukorer’ Imana. Yakwinginze kenshi, Kand’ ikurarika; Witinda kwemera, Bizakunezeza.
Ntushak’ urwitwazo urahamagawe; Dor’ aho wangiye, Noneho witabe. Imirim’ ireze, Hagumy’ abakozi; Ngwin’ umukorere; Uzagororerwa.
Ntushak’ urwitwazo, Kuko nib’ utinze, Bizagukoraho, Izakwivumbura. Imbabazi zayo, Ntabwo zirashira; Haguruka bwangu, Ubibabarirwe.
hymns.refrain: Itaba! ( none ); Ntushak’ urwitwazo; Itaba! ( none ); Wigingimiranya. Ntushak’ urwitwazo, Udasubizwa ngo: Hoshi wampinyuye; Nkuvukij’ ubwami.
hymns.author: F. E. Belden

hymns.title: Yesu Mwami W’ Abami
verses: Yesu Mwami w’ abami, Ngwin’ ube muri jye! He kub’ ari jy’ uvuga, Ujy’ umvugiramo. Unsabe mu mutima, Ngengwe nawe rwose, Maz’ abajya bandeba, Bajye bakubona.
Ndakwiyeguriy’ ubu, Ez’ ibyaha byanjye; Ngaragareh’ ubwiza bwawe buhebuje. Ngir’ umutim’ utuje, Ne guteraganwa; Niyoroshye nganduke, Ngo nkoreshwe nawe.
Ingingo zanjye zose, Zijye zikumvira; Uzikoreshereze, Zikubahirize.Ne kujya nivovota, Ngo mpore ku nkeke.Y’ ibimbaho, nishama, Nta mahoro mfite.
Ni wowe ntegereje, Ungenz’ uk’ ushaka. Ubwanjye nditeguye, Simfit’ ikinziga. Yesu Mwami w’ abami, Ngwin’ ube muri jye! Maz’ ibyo nkora byose, Mbikoreshwe nawe.
hymns.author: Samuel Wesley

hymns.title: Data Mwiza, Nyigiza Hafi
verses: Data mwiza, nyigiza hafi; Nkube mu gituza; Ni wowe buhungiro bwanjye, N’ uburuhukiro.
Data mwiza, nyigiza hafi; Nkomeza ntundeke; Nakwishimira ko tubana, Ne kuraragira.
Data mwiza, nyigiza hafi; Ngez’ ubwo nsa nawe; Mpembur’ unyuhagir’ unyeze, Mb’ umuziranenge.
hymns.refrain: S. na A : Data, nyigiza hafi, Ndifuza ko tubana; Data, ndifuza ko tubana. T. na B : Data, data, nyigiza hafi, Ndifuza cyane ko tubana; Data, nyigiza hafi; ndifuza ko tubana, Ndifuza ko tubana.
hymns.author: J. H. Tenney

hymns.title: Aho Njyanye Na Yesu
verses: Aho njyanye na Yesu mb’ amahoro, Ahw’ anyobora hose mur’ iyi si. Aho njya tutajyanye nta kinyura, Iyo njyanye na Yesu ntacyo ntinya.
Aho njyanye na Yesu sinigunga, Nubw’ izindi nshuti zampemukira; Nubw’ anyobora mu nzir’ iruhije, Aho njyanye na Yesu ndanezerwa.
Njyanye na Yesu sinatiny’ urupfu, N’ iyo ngoswe n’ umwijima w’ icyago, Nzi ko nzakanguk’ ubutazongera, Kujarajarira mur’ iy’ isi mbi.
hymns.refrain: Aho njyanye nawe, nta kintinyisha, Aho njyanye na Yesu mb’ amahoro.
hymns.author: D. B. Towner by Per

hymns.title: Nshuti Jy’ ugendera Mu Mucyo
verses: Nshuti jy’ ugendera mu mucyo, Woye kurindagira; Umwuka Wera wo mw’ ijuru, Ajy’ akuyobora.
Gendera mu mucyo w’ ukuri, Ko mw’ Ijambo ry’ Imana; Uzajy’ ukuyobor’ iteka, Ukwizez’ Imana.
Jy’ ugendera mu mucy’ iteka, Ujy’ ukumurikira; Maz’ utamurur’ umwijima, Hose hatangaze.
Gendera mu mucyo ng’ umenye, Urukundo rw’ Imana, N’ uburyo yakunze ab’ isi, Ikabarokora.
hymns.refrain: S. na A : Gendera mu mucyo, Gendera mu mucyo; Gendera mu mucyo, Mu mucyo waka w’ Imana. T. na B. : Gendera mu mucy’ utangaje w‘ Imana; Gendera mu mucy’ utangaje w‘ Imana; Gendera mu mucy’ utangaje w‘ Imana; Mu mucyo waka w‘ Imana;
hymns.author: Geo. C. Hugg

hymns.title: Mbes’ Abasaruzi Bari He?
verses: Mbes’ abasaruzi bari hehe, Bo gusarur’ abakiranutsi? Babangir’ ukurink’ imihoro, Kandi ntibab’ ar’ abanyabute.
Mushakire mu mihana yose; Nubw’ urwiri rwarenga ku ngano; Muzishake kuko zirurimo, Zose muzisarurir’ Imana.
Dor’ imirima yereye rimwe, Kandi bose bitez’ isarura; Arikw’ abasaruzi ni bake, Umurimo wab’ urabasaze.
Mwa bantu mwe, Mwahur’ imihoro! Musarur’ igihe kirageze! Mushishikare Umwam’ araje; Dor’ abazaniy’ ingororano!
hymns.refrain: Abasaruzi se bari he? Ngo bafatanye natwe gusarura, Maze twishime, Turi kumwe, Isarura nirirangira.
hymns.author: Geo. F. Root

hymns.title: Ngamij’ Iby’ Igihugu Cy’ Igikundiro
verses: Ngamij’ iby’ igihugu cy’ igikundiro; Nzageray’ izuba rirenze. Ariko s’ ikamba Yes’ azamperayo, Azaritakahw’ inyenyeri?
Reka nkore, nsenge, mbiheshejwe nawe, Mugarurir’ abazimiye. N’agaruka kuri wa munsi w’ ubwiza, Nzatakwehw’ inyenyeri nyinshi.
Mbeg’ umunezer’ uhebuje nzagira, Nimwerek’ abo nakijije, Mfite n’ ibyishimo bitavugwa, Mbonye inyenyeri kw’ ikamba ryanjye.
hymns.refrain: Mbes’ ikamba ryanjye Yes’ azamperayo, Azaritakahw’ inyenyeri (inyenyeri)? Ningir’ amahirwe, Nkabana na Yesu, Azaritakahw’ inyenyeri (inyenyeri)?
hymns.author: Jno. R Sweney

hymns.title: Ngwino Yesu
verses: Ngwino Yes’ uvugane, N’ umutima wanjye: Maz’ umpumuriz’ uti: Ntabwo nagusize. Nyugurur’ umutima, Nihutire kumva, Ijwi ryawe ry’ impuhwe, Nyuzuz’ ibyishimo.
Yobora abana bawe, Uvugane nabo; Ubuzuz’ ibyishimo, Bige kugusenga. Mwami, Bitange rwose, Bakwiyegurire; Tebuts’ ubwami bwawe, Twibanire nawe.
Ngwin’ uvugane natwe, Uduhishurire, Iby’ imigambi yawe, N’ inshingano yacu, Duhe kuguhimbaza, Tukubahirize, Tujye tunezererwa gukor’ iby’ ushaka.
hymns.refrain: Mbwiz’ ijwi ryongorera, Mbwiran’ urukundo; Ut’ uzanesh’ iteka, Ub’ umudendezo. Vugana nanjy’ iteka, Mbwir’ ubudahwema, Reka numv’ uk’ umbwira ngo: Sinaguhanye.
hymns.author: Adapted by L. L. Pickett

hymns.title: Mwami, Sinsabir’ Iby’ Ejo
verses: Mwami, sinsabir’ iby’ ejo, Mfasha none, Ndind’ urukongi rw’ ibyaha, Uyu munsi. Ne gucumuz’ ururimi, Mputiyeho; Mwami, rind’ iminwa yanjye, Uyu munsi.
Njye nshunguz’ ubury’ umwete, No gusenga; Ngwe neza mu buryo bwose, Uyu munsi. Nkomeze nkor’ iby’ ushaka, Ngire bwangu; Mwami, nemere kwitanga, Uyu munsi.
Urupfu niruntungura, Mbe ntunganye; Amasezerano yawe, Ndayiteze; Mwami, sinsabir’ iby’ ejo, Mfasha none; Ndind’ unkomez’ undagire, Uyu munsi; Amen.
hymns.author: F.E. Belden

hymns.title: Murinzi We, Ngaho Mbwira
verses: Murinzi we, ngaho mbwira, Mbese bugiye gucya? Nta bimenyets’ urabona, K’ Umwami yegereje? Mugenzi we haguruka! Umusek’ uratambitse; Tyo kenyera, maz’ ukeshe, Haguruka; bwakeye!
Murinzi we, dor’ umucyo, Ukomeje gukwira! Reba naw’ ibimenyetso, Bitangaza kuza kwe. Ubw’ impanda zizavuga, Abapfuye bazazuka. Ubutazongera gupfa, Bibanire n’ Umwami.
Murinzi we, vuz’ impundu, Igihe kirageze! Mwese nimurangurure, Mubyamamaze hose. Mugenzi we, nawe reba; Ubwami bugeze hafi; Ngiriya Yerusalemu, Irarabagirana.
Murinzi, mur’ uwo murwa, W ‘ igikundiro rwose, Nih’ Umwami w’ i Sioni, Adutegerereje. Ubwami bwe buragutse, Buhetuy’ iyi si yose; N’ ubwami budahanguka; Hahirw’ ababujyamo.
Murinzi dor’ igihugu, Cy’ uburumbuke cyane, Gihora kimeze neza, Nka Edeni ya kera. Gira bwangu ntuzarire, Hasigay’ igihe gito, Abacungujw’ amaraso bakagerayo vuba.
hymns.author: W. B. Bradbury

hymns.title: Aho Nzahamagarwa Hose
verses: Aho nzahamagarwa hose, Ari no mu misozi, Cyangwa ku rugamba rukaze, Mubyeyi, n’ unkenera, Ukambwiz’ ijwi ryawe ritoya, Ukannyuz’ inzira ntazi, Nzakwishyira mu maboko, mvuge nti: Nzajy’ah’unshakira hose.
Ahari Yes’ ashaka yuko muvugir’ uyu munsi; Ahari habonek’ impabe, Nkwiriye guhabura; Murokozi wanjye, N’ unyobora, N’ ahar’ ibihanamanga; Sinzareka kogez’ inkuru yawe; Nzajy’ ah’ unshakira hose.

Ntabwo nshidikanya, Har’ aho Mwam’ ushaka ko nkora, Mu kubaho kwanjye kugufi, Nkorer’ Uwambambiwe. Mwami, Nkubikij’ ibyanjye byose, Nzi k’ unkunda bitangaje. Nzakor’ iby’ ushaka, mbikunze cyane; Nzajy’ ah’ unshakira hose.
hymns.refrain: Nzajy’ ah’ unshakira hose, Mwami; Mu misozi no mu bibaya. Nzavug’ iby’ ushaka ko mvuga Mwami, Kandi nzaba nk’ uk’ ushaka.
hymns.author: Carrie E. Rounsefell

hymns.title: Amagambo Y’ Umujinya
verses: Amagambo y’ umujinya, Ntakabave mu kanwa! Ahubw’ umutim’ uyacuby’ atararushy’ asohoka.
Urukundo n’ imbonera, N’ ubucuti, birera; Byab’ ishyano kubyicisha, Ubupfu bw’ akanya gato.
Amagambo y’ intonganya, Ntaregama mu kanwa, Ijambo rimwe ry’ intonganya, Ritandukany’ inshuti.
hymns.refrain: S. na A.: Mukundane rwose; Yes’ aravug’ ati: Ngir’ itegeko ryanjye mbahaye: Mukundane rwose, Yes’ aravug’ ati: Bana banjye, mukundane. B. na T.: Mukundane, Mukundane; Ngir’ itegeko ryanjye : Mukundane, Mukundane; n’ itegeko rye.
hymns.author: H. R. Palmer

hymns.title: N’ Igihe Cy’ Isarura
verses: Nib’ umunt’ agend’ arira, Asohoy’ imbuto nziza, Ntacogora ngw’ agw’ isari, Ahirwa n’ Uwiteka.
Ikime kiva mw’ ijuru, N’ umucy’ urabagirana. Bizatum’ imbuto zera, Kubw’ ubuntu bw’ Imana.
Bib’ imbuto wicogora, Woye gukuk’ umutima, N’ ubw’ iby’ ubon’ ar’ umwaku, Uzasarur’ ishimwe.
hymns.refrain: Yemwe ga ngo zirakura! Reba uko zingana! Imirima yos’ ireze, N’ igihe cy’ isarura.
hymns.author: C. S. Cable

hymns.title: Isarura Ry’ Isi Riregereje
verses: Isarura ry’ isi riregereje, Yes’ arahamagar’ abasaruzi. Dor’ imirim’ irez’ ahantu hose, Nimuzan’ imihoro musarure!
Uwo muns’ utazabamw’ amarira, Uhora wegerej’ uko bukeye. Imyaka yararitswe n’umuyaga, Mugire bwangw’ imvur’ itarahanguka.
Urukundo ni nk’ isokw’ idakama, Ituruka mw’ ijuru ku Muremyi; Nirwo ruturarikira gukora, Rukadukomeza ntitugw’ isari.
hymns.refrain: S. : Mugire bwangu, muhunik’ imiba; Mugire bwangu, nimuze. A.T.B. : Mugire bwangu mwese; Nimuze muhunik’ imiba ye. Nimuze mugire bwangu mwese; Nimuze mwese nimuze.
hymns.author: F. E. Belden

hymns.title: Nyabun’ Uburyo Ngukennye!
verses: Nyabun’ uburyo ngukennye! Nd’ umukene n’ impumyi; Mfat’ ukubok’ unyobore, Ni wow’ ump’ imbaraga.
Nyambik’ urukundo rwawe, Nahindanye nd’ intebyi. Ubu mfit’ intege nkeya, Nyongeramw’ imbaraga.
Nzab’ amahor’ unyoboye, Sinakwiyiringira. Yes’ ujy’ ungend’ i ruhande, Kuk’ undutira byose.
Nubw’ ibind’ imbere byose, Byankoma mu nkokora, Nzakomeza komatana nawe, Mwana w’ Imana.
hymns.refrain: Ku manywa na n’ ijoro; Mwami ndagushak’ iteka; Ku manywa na n’ ijoro; Mwam’ unyikomereze.
hymns.author: F. E. Belden

hymns.title: Icyampa Nkab’ Uwawe
verses: Icyampa nkab’ uwawe, Yesu Mwami wanjye; Ne kononwa n’ iby’ isi, Nkwikurikirire.
Icyampa nkab’ uwawe, Yesu Mwami wanjye. Nkoresh’ uk’ ushaka, Njye nkubahiriza.
Icyampa nkab’ uwawe, Yesu Mwami wanjye; Ntandukanya n’ iby’ isi, Umboneze rwose.
Icyampa nkab’ uwawe, Yesu Mwami wanjye; Mb’ uwaw’ uko ndi kose, Nta kintu kinziga.
hymns.refrain: Icyampa nkab’ uwawe, Nitanze maramaje. Jye ntacyo maze, Ntacyo, Ntacyo; Niwe mpay’ ikuzo.
hymns.author: I. Allan Sankey

hymns.title: Mfit’Inshuti Y’ Ukuri
verses: Mfit’ inshuti y’ ukuri y’ inkoramutima, Irankunda bihebuje, Nzi kw’ itazampana. Ntabwo nayiv’ iruhande, Nkunda ko tubana, Iyo nshuti ni Yesu, Umukiza.
Iyo nguy’ agacuho, Ameny’ uko meze; Ntanyirengagiza rwose: Aransindagiza, Akanyobora mu nzira, Yo gukiranuka; N’ inshuti nkunda cyane, Yes’ Umwami.
Mutur’ umubabaro, Mubwir’ ibyishimo; Mubwir’ ibinnyura nabyo, N’ ibindushya byose. Angaragariz’ uburyo, Nkwiriye kwifata; Nkunda kwiganirira, Naw’ iteka.
Az’ imigambi yanjye, Yo gukiz’ abandi; Niko kunshing’ umurimo, Wo kumuvugira, No kwamamaz’ urukundo, Rwatumy’ adupfira: Yewe, mukunda rwose, Bihebuje.
hymns.author: Hubert P. Main

hymns.title: Umukiz’ Aranyobora
verses: Umukiz’ aranyobora, Birampagije rwose. Sinshidikany’ impuhwe ze, Kuko njya nzibonaho. Amahoro yo mw’ ijuru, Yanyuzuy’ umutima; Sinzatinya na hatoya, Kuko Yes’ anyobora; Sinzatinya na hatoya, Kuko Yes’ anyobora.

Umukiz’ aranyobora, Akanampumuriza; Iyo ngeze mu makuba, Ntamvirira na hato; Bona n’ ubwo nateguza, Yandamir’ akamfasha; Ahor’ anyitahw’ iteka, Nta cyo nzamuburana; Ahor’ anyitahw’ iteka, Nta cyo nzamuburana.

Umukiz’ aranyobora, Niryo humure ryanjye! Niw’ uzampaz’ uburame, Njye mpora musingiza. Nta cyatuma ntiny’ urupfu, Mfit’ iryo sezerano; Nzajya ndirimb’ iteka, Nti: Yesu niw’ unyobora; Nzajya ndirimb’ iteka, Nti: Yesu niw’ unyobora.
hymns.author: Rev. R. Lowry

hymns.title: Yes’ Arahamagar’ Ati:
verses: Yes’ arahamagar’ ati: Nind’ unkorera none? Isarura rirageze, Nind’ uribusarure? Umv’ ukw’ aduhamagara; Kand’ azagororera. Umusubiza wes’ ati : Ndi hano Mwami ntuma.
N’ utabasha kujya kure, Ngo wambuke n’ inyanja; N’ ino har’ abapagani, Wagarurira Yesu. N’ utabasha gushyanuka, Ngo wigishe nka Paulo, Wakogez’ iby’ urukundo rw’ Umukiza wabambwe.
Wabura kub’ umurinzi, Ku nkike z’i Siyoni, Wafashish’ amasengesho, No gutur’ amaturo; Ukayobora n’ abandi, Mu nzir’ ijya mw’ ijuru, Nk’ ukw’ Aroni yakomeje amaboko ya Mose.
Abantu bari mu kaga; Yes’ aragutabaza. Ntukagir’ ubw’ uvug’ uti: Ntacyo nakora rwose. Ishimire gukoreshwa, Hitam’ umurimo we; Maz’ usubize bwang’ uti: Ndi hano, Mwami ntuma.
hymns.author: F. E. Belden

hymns.title: Nicay’ Imbere Ya Yesu
verses: Nicay’ imbere ya Yesu, Mpaboner’ ihumure; N’ ahantu h’ igikundiro; Icyampa nkahibera. Iyo nicay’ imbere ye, Nimenyah’ ubugoryi; Kumuhang’ amaso nibyo, Bimpa gukiranuka.
Kwicar’ imbere ya Yesu, Nta mahirw’ arut’ ayo; Niho nsig’ ibimbabaza, Nkumva nduhutse rwose. Iyo nicay’ imbere ye, Nkunda kumuganyira; Naw’ ababarana nanjye, Maz’ akampumuriza.
Yesu mp’ umugisha wawe; Dore, Ndategereje; Ndeban’ imbabazi zawe, Menye k’ unyitayeho. Mp’ umutima wawe, Yesu; Nyeza nkubonerere; Bigaragarir’ abandi, Yuko mporana nawe.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Ndagukunda, Mwami
verses: Ndagukunda, Mwami; Uzi ko ngukunda; Ndagukunda Yesu, Bihebuje rwose. Ndagukunda Yesu, Naw’ urabizi; Imirimo yanjy’ izabyerekana.
Nishimye, Nishimye; Rwose bitavugwa. Ibyishimo byanjye, Nta wabirondora. Ndareb’ ubutunzi buri mw’ ijuru, Nzagabirwa nawe kubw’ ubuntu bwawe.
Yesu Mwami wanjye, Niwe nkesha byose; Ar’ ugucungurwa, Ari n’ ubugingo. Nzakogez’ iteka, Nkuririmbire, Kuk’ ubuntu bwawe bwandemy’ umutima.
Naguhwanya nande, Mucunguzi wanjye? Uhoran’ ineza, Ntugir’ impinduka. Nzajya nguhimbaza, Nkubahirize; Umutima wanjye, Wuzuy’ ibyishimo.
hymns.author: Jer. Ingallis

hymns.title: Ayi Rutare Rw’ Imana
verses: Ayi Rutare rw’ Imana, Reka nguhungiraho! Kubw’ imbabazi zawe, Kera waramenewe, Non’ ubu nkwihishemo, Umujinya w’ Imana.
Ibyo twakora byose, N’ umwete wacu wose, N’ agahinda gasaze, N’ amarir’ adashira, Byose ntibyashobora, Kudukurahw’ ibyaha.
Yes’ ibyo mfite byose, Nta mumaro bigira. Sinabasha kwikiza, Ndagushakah’ ubuntu, Unyuhagir’ imbyiro, Mutabazi ne gupfa.
Nuko nkiri muzima, Mwami, nguhungireho. No ku munsi w’ imanza, Ninger’ imbere yawe, Ayi Rutare rw’ Imana, Uzandeke nkwisunge!
hymns.author: Thomas Hastings

hymns.title: Mwa Bera B’ Umwami
verses: Mwa bera b’ Umwami, Mwishimir’ Ijambo rye; Niryo rufatiro rwo kwizera kwanyu. Dore, yababwiye byose; Ntacyo yabahishe. Ntitwabasha kongera kur’ iryo jambo ryiza, Cyangwa kuritubya, Kukw’ ar’ iry’ Imana.
N’ ugera mu kaga, Yesu yasezeranye, Kw’ azakugoboka, kakurengera; Amakuba yawe yos’ akuber’ umugisha; Niy’ azakweza rwose, Maz’ atum’ ushikama; Niy’ azakweza rwose, Agukomeze.
Ibigeragezo nibikugwa gitumo, Ubuntu bwanjye buzaba buhagije. Ibirimi by’ umuriro, Ntibigutinyishe; Bizakongor’ ibyaha, Usigar’ utunganye; Bizakongor’ ibyaha, Bikuboneze.
Unamba ku Mana, Ntizamuhemukira; Ntizamuharir’ umubisha na hato. N’ ubw’ ingabo zose z’ umwanzi zamusatira, Ntizamuhemukira, Ntizamuhemukira, Ntizamuhemukira, Haba na gato.
hymns.author: J. Reading

hymns.title: Uwiteka Niwe Mwungeri Wanjye
verses: Uwiteka niwe Mwungeri wanjye, Sinzakena; Andyamisha mu cyanya cy’ ubwatsi butoshye cyane; Anyobor’ iruhande rw’ amaz’ adasuma; Uwitek’ asubiz’ intege mu bugingo bwanjye.
Nanyura no mu gikombe cy’ igicucu cy’ urupfu, Sinatiny’ ikibi cyose, kuko ndi kumwe nawe; Inshyimbo yawe n’ inkoni, bimp’ ihumure; Nta kaga kazantungura, ndi kumwe nawe, Mwami.
Untunganiriz’ ameza mu gihe cy’ amakuba. Unshagijehw imbabazi, zimeze nk’ amavuta; Wanyujurij’ igikombe, cyuzur’ ubuntu. Mwami, ntacyo wisigiye, ng’ ubon’ uk’ ukingomwa.
Mana y’ ubuntu, n’ ukuri; Ineza wangiriye, N’ imbabazi bizanyomahw’ iminsi yanjye yose; Nzakomeza nkuyoboke, Sinzateshuka; Kandi nzaba mu nzu y’Uwiteka iteka ryose.
hymns.author: German

hymns.title: Wa Muragwa We!
verses: Wa muragwa we, mbese k’ uhunikira? K’ ucogoy’ ugiye kugerayo? Kanguka bwangu, shak’ intwaro zawe; Wizarira, dore byatinze rwose!
Amahanga yose yasubiranyemo; Bose baradagadwa bihebye. Umv’ ukw’ amagar’ ahindira hose; Wa muragwa we, wigumya gutinda!
Ntugwabizwe n’ iby’ iyi si biguhenda; Reb’ ubwiza bwabyo burashira. C’ ingoy’ Umwanzi yakubohesheje; Wa muragwa we, zicikeho bwangu!
Nyamuneka, ntugir’ imitim’ ibiri; Ba mas’ Umwam’ atagutungura; Dor’ umucy’ utangiye gutangaza; Muragwa we, vuz’ impundu, wishime!
hymns.author: L. Mason

hymns.title: Mwami Mana Yanjye
verses: Mwami Mana yanjye, Ni wow’ umbeshaho; Ubuntu bwawe n’ isoko nkesh’ ibyiza byose. Ubuntu bwawe n’ isoko nkesh’ amahirwe yose.
Ni wowe wandemye, Nta wakundutira; Ineza yawe ni nyinshi, Ntacyo nayinganya; Ineza yawe ni nyinshi ntacyo nayigeraho.
Mwami, Natur’ iki, Ko byos’ ar’ ibyawe? Kerets’ umutim’ ushima, Wo kuguhimbaza; Kerets’ umutim’ ushima, Wo kukuramya, Mwami.
Umpe gushikama, Kubw’ ubuntu bwawe; Nkweguriy’ ibyanjye byose, Mbay’ uwawe rwose; Nkweguriy’ ibyanjye byose, Mb’ uwaw’ akaramata.
hymns.author: Unknown

hymns.title: Murinzi We W’ i Siyoni
verses: Murinzi we, w’ i Sioni, Ijoro rigeze he? Mbes’ umusek’ uri hafi? Ntiburatandukana? Ntacy’ ushishoz’ i burasira-zuba? Ntacy’ ushishoz’ i burasira-zuba?
Nyamuneka tumenyeshe, K’ urugendo rushize; Mbese tugeze ku cyambu, Tugiye kugerayo? Mbese koko, ubwami buri hafi? Mbese koko, ubwami buri hafi?
Burakey’ umuns’ uraje! Tubyamamaze hose; Dor’ izuba rirarashe, Mwese nimurirebe! Mwa bera mwe, Mugiye gucungurwa! Mwa bera mwe, Mugiye gucungurwa!
Tugeze ku rugabano, Rw’ igihugu tujyamo, Nimukabuze twihute, Icyambu kiri hafi. Nimurangurure ya majwi yanyu! Nimurangurure ya majwi yanyu!
hymns.author: T. Hastings

hymns.title: Ngabo, Muhaguruke!
verses: Ngabo, muhaguruke! Murwanire Yesu; Murind’ ingabe yanyu, Mutazayinyagwa. Mu nzira yo kunesha, Tuyoborwa na Yesu, Tujyane naw’ iteka, Niho tuzanesha.
Impanda ziravuze, Muze mwebwe mwese. Ikamba ry’ ubugingo, N’ ibihembo byanyu. Nimwangwa n’ ababisha, Mukomere, murwane; Mwonger’ umwete mwinshi, Muganze Satani.
Mubyuke, mutabare, Mudashidikanya. He kugir’ umw’ usiba, murebe kwa Yesu. Kandi mujye mutwara, Intwaro zo kwizera. Muhabwe ukunesha, N’ ibyishimo byinshi.
Mubyuke vuba vuba, Murwane iteka, Mwizer’ izina ryera, Niho muzanesha; Maz’ izo ntwaro zose, Muzih’ Umwami Yesu, Muzabon’ amahoro y’ iteka mw’ ijuru.
hymns.author: Webb

hymns.title: Icyampa Nkizera
verses: Icyampa nkizera rwose, Ubutadohoka; Sintinyishwe n’ ubukene, Cyangw’ ibyago byose.
Sinivovote, mbabajwe, N’ igihano cyawe; Ahubwo, nimba mu kaga, Nkunambeho Mwami.
Mpabwe gushikama cyane, Umugaru n’ ugwa; Ne guhindishw’umushitsi, N’ibyago bitera.
Ne gukangishwa n’ ab’ isi, N’ igitsure cyabo; N’ ubwo bangir’ urw’ amenyo, Noye kubyitaho.
Mwami, ben’ uko kwizera, Niko ngutezeho; Niringiye ko nzahabwa kwibera mw’ ijuru.
hymns.author: J. Ingalls

hymns.title: Hahirw’ Ufit’ Ibyiringiro
verses: Hahirw’ ufit’ ibyiringiro bishyitse, Akiri mu miruho y’ iyi si; Bimukomez’ agatsind’ ibishuko by’ umwanzi. Bimukomez’ agatsinda ibishuko n’ amakuba menshi.
Nibyo bitwibuts’ iby’ uburuhukiro, Ahw’ abakiranutsi bazaba; Bakibanira n’ inshut’ ubudatandukana. Bakibanira n’ inshuti ntibatandukane.
N’ igihugu kitazarangwamw’ icyaha; Ahw’ ibishuko bitazagera; Ni nahw’ ibyishimo bitazagir’ impinduka. Nihw’ ibyishimo bitazongera kugira kirogoya.
Nta n’ umw’ uzahabogorez’ amarira; Ntabw’ urupfu ruzahahangara; Abaturage baho baziberahw’ iteka. Abaturage baho bazamera nk’ abamarayika.
Icyaduh’ igihe kikihuta bwangu! Tukabon’ Umukiza wac’ aje, Akatujyana muri cya gihugu cy’ ibyiza. Akatugez’aho tuzibanira n’ Umukiza wacu.
hymns.author: S. Hibbara

hymns.title: Nyagasani, Turakwiragije
verses: Nyagasani, Turakwiragije, Turagukennye cyane; Turagire mu bwatsi butoshye, Turakwiyeguriye; Nyagasani, Nyagasani, Niwe waducunguye; Nyagasani, Nyagasani, Niwe waducunguye.
Ubu tur’ abawe rwose Mwami, Tureban’ imbabazi; Turinde, Tur’ umukumbi wawe, Twe guteshuk’ inzira; Nyagasani, Nyagasani, Nyamuneka twumvire; Nyagasani, Nyagasani, Nyamuneka twunvire.
Wasezeranye k’ uzatwakira, N’ ubwo tur’ abangizi; Udufitiy’ imbabazi nyinshi, N’ ubuntu buhebuje; Nyagasani, Nyagasani, Turakugarukira; Nyagasani, Nyagasani, Turakugarukira.
hymns.author: Wm. B. Bradbury

hymns.title: Ibyiringiro Dufite
verses: Ibyiringiro dufite bigir’ agaciro cyane; Kurut’ iby’ iyi si by’ imburamumaro, Bijya bishimisha benshi.
Twabony’ umucy’ utangaje, Utamurur’ umwijima, Wazanywe n’ uk’ urupfu rwiganzuy’ isi, None twaretse kwiheba.
Twumvis’ ijwi ry’ ihumure, Rinyur’ imitima yacu; Ridutinyura rwose, rikatwizeza, Yukw’ Iman’ ar’ urukundo.
Iryo jwi n’ irya Rurema, Uwo mucyo n’ Ijambo rye; Ibyo byiringiro n’ ukuragw’ ijuru, Ntitwongere gupf’ ukundi.
hymns.author: J. G. Naegeli

hymns.title: Mu Gihugu Cy’ Ibyiza
verses: Mu gihugu cy’ ibyiza, Har’ umurwa wera; Uzahorahw’ iteka: Nta joro rihaba.
Inkike z’ uwo murwa, Zose n’ izahabu; N’ inzira nazo nuko; Nta joro rihaba.
Kand’ amarembo yawo, Ntabwo yugarirwa; Uruzi rw’ ubugingo, Ruzawutembamo.
Ntuzagomba kuvirwa, N’ izuba n’ ukwezi; Kand’ Umwana w’ Intama, Niwe mucyo wawo.
hymns.refrain: S : Nta marir’ azabayo, Nta rupfu cyangw’ ubwoba; Ibihe ntibibarwayo, Kuko ntabwo bwira. A., T. B : Nta marir’ azabayo, Nta rupfu cyangw’ ubwoba; Ibihe ibihe ntibibarwayo, Kuko ntabwo bwira.
hymns.author: H. P. Danks

hymns.title: Ahar’ Azaza Umusek’ Utambitse
verses: Ahar’ azaza, umusek’ utambitse, Igih’ umucy’ utamurur’ umwijima; Azany’ icyubahiro kitarondorwa, Aje kurokor’ intore ze.
Ahar’ azaza, nko ku manywa y’ ihangu; Cyangwa s’ azaza mu gicuku hagati; Umucy’ usab’ impande zose z’ iyi si, Aje kurokor’ intore ze.
Mbeg’ ibyishimo, N’ asanga tukiriho! Tutarwaye, Tutaririwe twapfuye; Maz’ akadutumbagirana mu bicu, Aje kurokor’ intore ze.
hymns.refrain: Tuzageza ryari, Mwami tugutegereje? Urakaza, Haleluya, Haleluy’ amina! Haleluy’ amina!
hymns.author: James Mc Granahan

hymns.title: Mbes’ Uzaba Witeguye
verses: Mbes’ uzaba witeguye, Yes’ aje, Yes’ aje? Mbes’ uzaba witeguye, Yes’ aje, Yes’ aje? Dore araje! Dore araje! Itegure, dor’ Umukw’ araje!
Muringaniz’ amatara, Araje, Araje! Muringaniz’ amatara, Araje, Araje! Dore araje! Dore araje! Itegure, Dor’ Umukw’ araje!
Mutyo, tumusanganire, Araje, Araje! Mutyo, tumusanganire, Araje, Araje! Araje koko! Araje koko! Itegure, Dor’ Umukw’ araje!
Turirimbe: Haleluya; Araje, Araje! Turirimbe: Haleluya; Araje, Araje! Araje koko! Araje koko! Turirimbe: Haleluy’ araje!
hymns.refrain: Dore, Umukwe araje, Araje! Dore, Umukwe araje, Araje! Dore araje! Dore araje! Itegure, Dor’ Umukw’ araje!
hymns.author: R. E. Hudson

hymns.title: Ntituz’ Umunsi
verses: Ntituz’ umunsi Yesu azagaruka, Arikw’ igihe, cyo kiri hafi cyane, Ibimenyetso byagaragaye byose, N’ umunsi tutazi.
Abitondera, igitabo cy’ Imana, Ukuri kwayo, nimwo bakubonera, Ibyahanuwe bitangaza kuza kwe, N’ umunsi tutazi.
Imuri zacu ntizigahweme kwaka, Tujye dukora, dutegerej’ Umwami, Tumuhimbaze, twe kujya turambirwa, N’ umunsi tutazi.
hymns.refrain: Azaza (azaza), duhore twiteguye. Azaza (azaza), Haleluya! Haleluya! Azaza ku bicu, Afit’ ubwiza bwa Se, N’ umunsi tutazi.
hymns.author: F. E. Belden

hymns.title: Ntituz’ Igihe Azazira
verses: Ntituz’ igihe azazira, Ku manywa cyangwa n’ ijoro; Ahar’ azaza bugorobye, Cyangw’ umusek’ utambitse. Aratwihanangiririza kuba mas’ iteka ryose; Kugira ng’ ubw’ azatunguka, Azasange twiteguye.
Ndibuk’ uburyo yadukunze, Akaduharira byose; Yasiz’ ubwiza bwe mw’ ijuru, Yitangira kudupfira. Azanezerwa n’ agaruka, Kujyan’ abo yacunguye, Nib’ azasanga bari maso, Bamaze kumwitegura.

Ayi Yesu Mwana w’ Imana, Dor’ uz’ ibyo ndangamiye; Nizigiye ko nzakubona, Nkurebesh’ amaso yanjye; N’ ubwo bamwe bazaguhunga, Babony’ igitsure cyawe, Jye, nzakuramutsa nk’ inshuti; N’ ubu ndagutegereje.
hymns.refrain: Tumwitegure, Tumwitegure, Tumwitegure; Dore, Turamwiteguye.
hymns.author: Will H. Pontius

hymns.title: Umunsi W’ Ihumur’ Uregereje
verses: Umunsi w’ ihumur’ uregereje; Yes’ azazaho. Nibw’ azajyan’ abana be bizeye, Bigir’ i wabo.
Ubutumwa bwiza nibuhetura iyi si yacu, Umwam’ azashok’ aza bidatinze, Atujyan’ iwe.
N’ az’ ashagawe n’ abamarayika batabarika, Azatsembahw’ ibihumanya byose; Ntabw’ azasobwa.
Abazaba baratandukanijwe, Bazabonana; Be kongera kubogoz’ amarira, Bagubwe neza.
hymns.refrain: Umusek’ utangiye gutambika, Weyuyeh’ umwijima! Umusek’ utangiye gutambika, Bugiye gucya!
hymns.author: S. J. Graham, by Per

hymns.title: Yesu Yadusezeraniy’ Ati
verses: Yesu yadusezeraniy’ ati: Dore ndaza vuba kujyan’ abanjye; Komez’ icy’ ufit’ utakinyagwa; Komeza wizere, we kurambirwa.
Tuzajye tuba maso dusenga, Kukw’ azaza nk’ umujura w’ ijoro; Ntituz’ umunsi, cyangwa s’ igihe; Icyo tuzi n’ ukw’ ari bugufi.
Dufit’ ijambo ritwiringiza yuko, Tuzaragw’ ubwami bw’ Imana; N’ isezerano ridakuka ngo: Dore ndaza vuba, we kurambirwa.
hymns.refrain: Komez’ icy’ ufit’ utakinyagwa; So yiteguye kuguh’ ubwami. Ngwino, Winjire mu munezero; Urahabw’ ikamba ritangirika.
hymns.author: F. E. Belden

hymns.title: Mwese, Nimuvuz’ Impundu
verses: Mwese, nimuvuz’ impundu! Dor’ Umwam’ araje! Mwitegure mwiboneze, Musangwe mwinonosoye. Isi yos’ iririmbe ( isi yos’ iririmbe)! Isi yose niririmbe ( yose niririmbe)! Nawe juru, wishim’ uririmbe cyane!

Mwese, nimuvuz’ impundu! Dor’ Umwam’ araje! Azim’ ingom’ ihoraho, Ntabw’ izahanguka rwose. Muvuz’ ijwi ry’ impundu ( vuz’ ijwi ry’ impundu), Nimuvuz’ ijwi ry’ impundu ( vuz’ ijwi ry’ impundu), Nimwishime mwese muririmbe cyane.

Azanatsembahw’ icyaha, Is’ igubwe neza; Imibabar’ izashira, Habehw’ amahoro masa, Nta mivum’ izabayo ( Nta mivum’ izabayo), Ntabwo hazab’ imivumo ( Ntabwo hazab’ imivumo), Ntayo rwose, Nta mivum’ izarangwayo.

Azategekesh’ ubuntu no gukiranuka; Ngw’ ab’ isi bose bamenye, K’ Uwitek’ agira neza, Urukundo rwe rwinshi ( urukundo rwe rwinshi), Urukundo rutangaje ( urukundo rutangaje ), Urukundo rwe rwinshi rurahebuje.
hymns.author: George F. Handel

hymns.title: Mbese Ko Tujya Tuvuga
verses: Mbese, Ko tujya tuvuga, Iby’ igihugu cy’ ihirwe; Tukogez’ ubwiza bwaho; Kubayo bizacur’ iki? Ko tuvug’ inzira zaho, Zasizw’ izahabu nziza; Ar’ ukugenekereza; Tugezeyo, hacur’ iki?
Ko tuvug’ uko hameze, Kw’ ari nta byaha n’ urupfu, Cyangw’ ibishuko bibayo, Tugezeyo hacur’ iki? Ko tuvug’ iby’ urukundo, N’ ibishura bizambarwa, Tukabyishimira cyane; Kubayo bizacur’ iki?
Tuvuga n’ iby’ igitondo, Kizaba gitamanzuye, Tukazabona wa murwa, Umanuk’ urimbishijwe. Umurw’ urabagirana, Utarangwamw’ agahinda, Ntubemo n’ imibabaro, Har’ umunezero gusa.
N’ ubwo ngoswe n’ ibishuko, Ntunganiriza kujyayo; Ngo nanjye njye niyumvamo, Uko kubayo byamera; Nibwo tuzatambagira, Icyo gihugu cy’ ihirwe, Hamwe n’ abamarayika, Na Yes’ Umukiza wacu.
hymns.author: Lewis Edson

hymns.title: Data Mwiza Tugarutse Kugushengerera
verses: Data mwiza, Tugarutse kugushengerera none; Twicishije bugufi, twiyoroheje, Twifuza kubabarirwa.
Twongeye kugushimira, Kuko waturinze twese; Ukatuzirikana ukaduhira, Ukatugarura hano.
Ayi, twagushij’ ishyano; Tur’ abo kwangw’ urunuka; Dore, tujya duteshuk’ inzira yawe, Noneho turahabutse.
Mana y’ imigisha yose, Niw’ utang’ utaziganya; Tureban’ imbabazi, turakwinginze; Uduhaz’ ijambo ryawe.
hymns.author: J. G. Naegeli

hymns.title: Mwam’ Ubwo Tukigushengereye
verses: Mwam’ ubwo tukigushengereye, Tukuririmbirir’ icya rimwe Iyi ndirimbo yac’ iheruka, Twicishije bugufi, duhire.
Mwami dusezerer’ amahoro; Duherekeze, tujyane nawe; Turindir’ iminwa n’ imitima, Ngo yoye kujy’ igukoz’ isoni.
Amahoro yaw’ abane natwe; Ab’ ari y’ ajy’ aduh’ ihumure. Maze n’ uturuhur’ imiruho, Tuzongere kuyabon’ i wawe.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: N’ Ubwo Nsazwe N’ Ibyaha
verses: N’ ubwo nsazwe n’ ibyaha, Yesu yarankijije, Yamviriy’ amaraso, Angura n’ urupf’ atyo. Tuzab’ akaramata, Ak’ ishami n’ igiti.
Urukundo rwa Yesu, Rusaguts’ ikirere. Ntacyo twarugeraho, Ruzagumahw’ iteka; Niwe warumbwirije, Jye ntabwo nari nduzi.
N’ ubwo nsazwe n’ ibyaha, Yes’ andutira byose; Az’ ibyo nkennye byose, Ankiz’ umubabaro. Namuberey’ imbata, Nta cyago cyampangara.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Twabuze Gakondo Mur’ Iyi Si
verses: Twabuze gakondo mur’ iyi si; Tuyirimo tur’ abasuhuke; Arikw’ ikitunezeza, Nuko dushaka gakondo, Irushaho kuba nziza.
Twabuze gakondo mur’ iyi si; Tugamij’ iy’ iwacu mw’ ijuru; Niyo Siyon’ ihoraho, Ifit’ umucy’ udashira, Ihor’ irabagirana.
Mbeg’ uburyo tuzanezererwa; Ahw’ abagenzi bat’ umuruho. Icyamp’ amababa none, Nkaguruka, Nkigirayo, Nkibanira nawe, Mwami.
Mutima wanjye, reka kuganya! Dor’ igih’ Imana yangeneye, Nicyo cyiza, nicyo cyiza; Njye nkomeza kwiringira, Ngez’ ubw’ izampamagara.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Mw’ Ijuru No Mw’ Isi Yose
verses: Mw’ ijuru no mw’ isi yose, Nta zina nk’ irya Yesu; Ntaryo nkunda ku mutima, Nk’ iry’ uwaducunguye.
Nihagir’ umunt’ ushimwa, Akarutishw’ abandi, N’ abarush’ icyubahiro, Yes’ aramuhebuza.
Abamarayika bose, Bitw’ amazina meza, Ariko nta zina ryabo, Ribasha kunnezeza.
Yes’ ankiz’ ibyago byose, Kandi niw’ unkomeza; N’ iyo nagiz’ intege nke, Anyonger’ imbaraga.
hymns.refrain: N’ izina ( n’ izina ) rya Yesu ( rya Yesu ), Niryo ritwiringiza; N’ izina ( n’ izina ), Ry’ Umukiza, Riduhesh’ amahirwe.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Ngiz’ Amahirwe Nd’ Uwa Yesu
verses: Ngiz’ amahirwe, nd’ uwa Yesu; N’ ubu mfit’ umunezero mwinshi! Ndazw’ agakiza; ndacunguwe; Mbyawe n’ Umwuka, ndatunganye.
Nditanze, ndamwiyeguriye; Ndumv’ ibyishimo binsabye rwose. Narokotse kubw’ ubuntu bwe, None ntegerej’ iby’ ijuru.
Sinkir’ uwanjye, ndamwihaye, Niwe wambohoy’ arambatura. Mbe maso nsenge, ntegereze; Maz’ ubuntu bwe bunyuzure.
hymns.refrain: Nibyo ndirimba, nibyo mvuga; Nshim’ Umukiz’ ubudasiba; Nibyo ndirimba, nibyo mvuga; Nshim’ Umukiz’ ubudasiba.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Reba Yesu Ku Musaraba
verses: Reba Yesu ku musaraba, Reb’ uko twatumy’ agirirwa; Huguk’ araguhamagara, Ngwin’ umusange.
Yesu yambatuye mu byaha, Atura mu mutima wanjye; Niw’ uwuzanamw’ ihumure; Yes’ ahimbazwe!
Niwe Sokw’ inyezahw’ ibyaha; Narayiyuhagije ndera; Nzi yukw’ ineza y’ izaramba; Yes’ ahimbazwe!
Muze kw’ Isoko y’ Agakiza; Maze muyiyuhagiremo; Irabezahw’ ibyaha byose; Yes’ ahimbazwe!
hymns.refrain: Duhimbaz’ izina rye, Duhimbaz’ izina rye; Yaducunguj’ amaraso ye; Yes’ ahimbazwe!
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Mbes’ Urumv’ Ushaka Gutunganira Yesu?
verses: Mbes’ urumv’ ushaka gutunganira Yesu? Ng’ ugendane nawe mu nzira ntoya? Akwikorerer’ imitwaro yawe yose? Emer’ ugengwe nawe.
Mbes’ urashaka kw’ akubatura mu byaha? Ngw’ aguh’ amahoro yo mu mutima? Ajy’ akuramira, we guhor’ ugwaguza? Emer’ ugengwe nawe.
Mbes’ urashaka kugabana ku bugingo? Ngo wibere mu bwami bwo mw’ ijuru? Urashaka kumaramaza muri byose? Emer’ ugengwe nawe.
hymns.refrain: Azagutungany’ akuboneze, Amaraso y’ akwezehw’ ibyaha, Akuzuz’ urukundo rwe rwinshi; Niwemera kujy’ ugengwa nawe.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: I Muhira Hahirwa
verses: I muhira hahirwa, Har’ urukundo; Byose bib’ amahoro, Har’ urukundo. Ntihab’ impagarara, N’ urutoto n’ inkeke; Hab’ ibyishimo gusa, Har’ urukundo.
Ivundi ryanezeza, har’ urukundo; Ntihaba kirogoya, Har’ urukundo, Ibiri mu nzu byose byahinduk’ inyamibwa, Hab’ ibyishimo gusa, Har’ urukundo.
Yes’ akunda kuhaba, Har’ urukundo; Isi yos’ irishima, Har’ urukundo. Isanzure ry’ ijuru, Ryuzur’ umucyo waka, N’ Iman’ ikamwenyura, Har’ urukundo.
hymns.refrain: Ineza mu rugo, Niy’ izan’ ibyishimo, Har’ urukundo.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Icyamp’ Umuriro Waka
verses: Icyamp’ umuriro waka, Wajyag’ urabagiranira. Mu bera ba kera bose, Ukabagir’ intwari z’ Imana.
Mwam’ icyampa wa mutima, Aburahamu yahoranye; Wari no muri Pawulo, Ukamutera kwiyumanganya.
Ntukiban’ intore zawe, Nk’ uko wabanye na Eliya? Ugahumuriza Yobu, Ageze mu kaga katavugwa.
Ibuka, Mwam’ aba kera, Uko wabagendereraga; Ab’ arik’ ujy’ utugenza, Utwuzuz’ Umwuka wawe wera.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Mbes’ Urashaka Kunesh’ Ibyaha?
verses: Mbes’ urashaka kunesh’ ibyaha? Izer’ amaraso ya Yesu. Mbes’ urashaka kumeny’ intsinzi? N’ amaraso y’ Umukiza.
S’ urashaka gukir’ ubwibone? Izer’ amaraso ya Yesu; Ngwin’ umusange ku musaraba, Akwejesh’ amaraso ye.
Mbes’ urashaka kujya wera de? Izer’ amaraso ya Yesu. Icyakwez’ ibizinga by’ ibyaha, N’ amaraso y’ Umukiza.
Urashaka gukorera Yesu? Izer’ amaraso y’ akiza. Urashaka kujy’ umusingiza? Izere ya maraso ye.
hymns.refrain: S. na A. : Har’ imbaraga mu maraso, Y’ Umwana w’ Intama; Har’ imbaraga mu maraso, Ya Yes’ Umwana w’ Imana . T. na B. : Koko har’ imbaraga mu maraso…; Y’ Umwana… w’ Intama; Koko har’ imbaraga mu maraso, Ya Yes’ Umwana w’ Imana.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Yesu N’ Az’ Umwijim’ Uzahunga
verses: Yesu naz’ umwijim’ uzahunga, Yesu naz’ umwijim’ uzahunga, Impundu zizavuga Yes’ aje, Gukorany’ intore ze.
Imibabaro yos’ izashira, Imibabaro yos’ izashira; Ubw’ Umwami Yes’ azagaruka, Gukorany’ intore ze.
Nta wuzongera kurir’ ukundi, Nta wuzongera kurir’ ukundi; Umwami Yesu n’ aza ku bicu, Gukorany’ intore ze.
Hazab’ indirimbo z’ indamutso, Hazab’ indirimbo z’ indamutso; Z’ abakijijwe Yes’ agarutse, Gukorany’ intore ze.
hymns.refrain: Gukorany’ abakunzi be ( bose ); Gukorany’ abakunzi be ( bose ); Impundu zizavuga Yes’ aje, Gukorany’ intore ze.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Yesu Niwe Nshut’ Ihebuje
verses: Yesu niwe nshut’ ihebuje, Iy’ amagany’ agucogoje. Niwe womor’ inguma zo mu mutima wawe; Yesu niwe nshut’ ihebuje.
Nasanz’ ar’ inshut’ ihebuje, Kukw’ atampana mu makuba; Nindek’ akanyobora, Sinzagir’ icyo ntinya; Yesu niwe nshut’ ihebuje.
N’ ubwo natahirwa n’ ibyago, Bikantera byiyungikanya, Sinzakuk’ umutima, Kukw’ ampor’ i ruhande; Yesu niwe nshut’ ihebuje.
Ubwo tuzagera mw’ ijuru, Tugahura n’ abo twatanye, Impundu zizavuga, Tumusingiz’ iteka: Yesu niwe nshut’ ihebuje.
hymns.refrain: Yesu n’ inshut’ ihebuje (ihebuje); Yesu n’ inshut’ ihebuje (ihebuje); N’ ugw’ azakuramira, N’ utak’ agutabare; Yesu niwe nshut’ ihebuje.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Imana Ihimbarizw’ Ibyo Yakoze
verses: Iman’ ihimbarizw ‘ibyo yakoze; Yakunz’ ab’ is’ itang’ Umwana wayo; Niwe Yesu waducunguye twese, Akaducir’ icyanzu ngo dukire.
Yesu yaducunguj’ amaraso ye, Maz’ aduca kuri kamere yacu; Ngo n’ ubwo twaba twarashayishije, Tube nk’ abatigeze gucumura.
Ibyo yadukoreye ntibigerwa, Twakiran’ Umwana w’ Imana ishimwe; Ariko tuzarushaho kwishima, Nitumurebesh’ aya maso yacu.
hymns.refrain: Dushime, dushime, Yes’ Umwami wacu; Dushime, dushime, Twese tumushime. Niwe watwujuje n’ Imana yacu; Tumuhimbariz’ iyo neza nyinshi.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Ur’ Uwera Wera
verses: Ur’ Uwera wera, Man’ ikomeye! Mu gitondo tujye tukuririmbira. Nubw’ ukomey’ ute, Ugir’ imbabazi; Ingoma yawe ntizahanguka.
Ur’ Uwera wera, Abera bose, Baguhimbazanya n’ abamarayika ! Ibyaremwe byose bikuramye, Mwami, Wahozeho, Kand’ uzahoraho.
Ur’ Uwera wera, Ubwiza bwawe, N’ ubwo butarebwa n’ inkozi z’ ibibi, Uhor’ ur’ Uwera, Nta wundi mwahwana, Kugira neza, No gutungana.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Uhoraho Nyobora
verses: Uhoraho nyobora, Kuko nd’ umugenzi mu butayu, Nd’ umunyantege nke, Ariko wowe ur’ umunyambaraga. Mutsima wo mw’ ijuru we, Nshaka guhazwa nawe (guhazwa nawe), Nshaka cyane guhazwa nawe.
Twifuza kumarw’ inyota nawe, Wowe sokw’ idakama, Tuyoboresh’ inkingi y’ igicu, Tuzarangiz’ urugendo. Ur’ umutabazi wacu, N’ ingab’ idukingira ( idukingira), Tuber’ ingab’ idukingira.
Ningera ku nkombe ya Yordani, Umutim’ uzatuza, Maz’ unyambuts’ amasumo yaho, Ngere hakury’ i Kanani. Nzaririmba, Nzaririmba, Nzagusingiz’ iteka (iteka), Nzagusingiz’ iteka ryose. Amen.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Urugo Runezerewe
verses: Urugo runezerewe, Iman’ irubamo, Iyo bahuj’ imigambi yo kujya mw’ ijuru.
Urugo rurimo Yesu, Rugir’ amahoro, Abana biga kuvuga, Bahoh’ izina rye.
Urugo runezerewe, Bahora basenga, Ahw ababyeyi bakunda, Ijambo ry’ Imana.
Mukiza fash’ ingo zacu, Zigir’ amahoro, Uzuz’ imitima yacu, Urukundo rwawe.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Munsi Y ‘Amababa Ye
verses: Munsi y’ amababa ye nihw’ ampisha, N’ ubw’ ijoro ryakwijima cyane, Ntacyo nzatinya nzi kw’ azankomeza, Ubu nd’ umwana we yacunguye.
Munsi y’ amababa ye nta gahinda, N’ uburuhukiro bw’ umutima, Mur’ iyi si ntiharimw’ agakiza, Mpirwa ndi mu mababa Ye gusa.
Munsi y’ amababa ye niho heza, Nzajya mpihish’ ibishuko byose, Niho buhungiro nta cyampangara, Nzibanira na Yes’ amahoro.
hymns.refrain: Munsi y’ ayo mababa ye, Havuy’ urukundo rwinshi, Mu mababa niho nzibera, Mu mahor’ iteka ryose.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Mwami, Umurab’ Urakaze!
verses: Mwam’ umurab’ urakaze, Urahorera cyane. Nta buhungiro nta bwugamo, Bw’ umuzajoro nk’uyu. Mbese ko tugiye gupfa, Nawe wiryamiye? Dor’ umuraba wabay’ icyago, Tugiye kurengerwa.
Mwami mfit’ agahind’ ubu, N’ umubabaro mwinshi, Umuraba urandengeye, Mwami tebuk’ unkize. Isuri y’ ibyaha byanjye, Dor’ irantembanye, Ndarenganye, Ndarenganye rwose, Mwami tebuk’ unkize.
Mwam’ umurab’ uratuje, Ubu nta bwoba mfite. Hamaze no gutamuruka, Mfit’ ibyishimo byinshi. Nuko, Mwami ndakwinginze, Ntunsige jyenyine, Nduhukire mur’ iki cyambu, Kirimw’ amahoro masa.
hymns.refrain: S. na A.: Umurab’ uranyumvira rwose. Utuze. T. na B.: Umurab’ uranyumvira rwose. U-tuze ...ze ...tuze Bose: Nib’ ar’ umurab’ usheg’ utyo, Cyangwa daimoni cyangwa s’ abantu, Nta mazi yabasha kurengera Ubwat’ Umwami wa byos’ arimo. Dore byose biranyumvira. Bituze, Bituze. Dore byose biranyumvira, Biratuza.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Nkweguriy’ Ubugingo Bwanjye
verses: Nkweguriy’ ubugingo bwanjye, Ng’ ubugenz’ uk’ ushaka Mukiza, Nkweguriy’ amaboko yanjye, Ng’ uyakoresh’ uk’ ushaka Mwami, Ng’ uyakoresh’ uk’ ushaka.
Nkweguriy’ ibirenge byanjye, Bijye bijyan’ ubutumwa bwiza, Nkweguriy’ ijwi ryanjye na ryo, Ngo rijye rigusingiz’ iteka, Ngo rijye rigusingiza.
Nkweguriye akanwa kanjye, Kuzuz’ ubutumwa bwawe Mwami, Nkweguriy’ ubutunzi bwanjye, Ntacyo nshaka kwisigaranira, Ntabwo nagir’ icyo nkwima.
Nkweguriy’ imigambi yanjye, Yikoresh’ uk’ ushaka Mukiza, Nkweguriy’ umutima wanjye, Maz’ uwimike m’ Ubwami bwawe, Wimike m’ Ubwami bwawe.
Nkweguriy’ urukundo rwanjye, Sinshaka kugir’ icyo nguhisha, Nguhay’ impagarike yanjye, Nkweguriy’ ibyanjye byose Mwami, Nkweguriy’ ibyanjye byose.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Abazacungurwa Bazaririmba
verses: Abazacungurwa bazaririmba, Bazashyir’ amakamba yabo hasi, Imibabaro yab’ izab’ ishize, Bazahora banezerew’ iteka.
Indirimbo y’ urukund’ itangaje, Izab’ iririmbanyw’ umunezero, Tuzabanayo n’ Umukiza wacu, Tuzahora tunezerew’ iteka.
Abamesh’ ibishura byabo nibo, Bazegera ya ntebe ye ya cyami, Ibyaha tuzabikizwa na Yesu, Tuzahora tunezerew’ iteka.
hymns.refrain: S. na A.: Bazaririmbir’ iyo Ntama y’ i Kalvari Baririmbire Yes’ Umwami Uhoraho. T. na B.: Bazaririmba, Bazaririmba, ...ma y’i Kalvari Ntama y’ i Kalvari, Baririmbire, baririmbire ...mi, Uhoraho.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Ku Musozi Kure
verses: Ku musozi kure har’ umusaraba, Ubabaj’ ukojej’ isoni, Ndawukunda cyane kuko wabambweho, Uwacunguy’ abanyabyaha.
Mbeg’ umusarab’ ab’ isi bahinyuye, Ng’ uranyur’ umutima wanjye! Umwana w’ intama yarets’ ikuzo rye, Awikorer’ ajy’ i Kalvari.
Umusaraba wavushij’ amaraso, Ya Yesu umwana w’ Imana, Kuri wo nih’ Umukiza yatangiye, Maz’ ubwo mbabarirw’ ibyaha.
Kubw’ umusaraba, Nzab’ umunyakuri, Nihanganir’ isoni zawo, Kugez’ ubw’ uzanjyan’ iwacu mw’ ijuru, Tunezeranw’ iteka ryose.
hymns.refrain: Nzogeza uwo musaraba (musaraba), Kugez’ ubwo nzat’ umuruho, Nzikomeza ku musaraba (musaraba), Kugez’ ubwo nzambikw’ ikamba.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Yes’ Umukiza Yari Mu Gituro!
verses: Yes’ Umukiza yari mu gituro, Ahategerereje ko bucya.
Barindiy’ ubusa Yes’ Umukiza, Bakinz’ igituro ngw’ aheremo.
Umukiza Yesu, Ntiyaheranywe, N’ ingoyi z’ urupfu, Yarazutse.
hymns.refrain: Mu gitond’ arazuka (arazuka), Atsinz’ umwanzi bitangaje (bitangaje), Yaneshej’ ubutware bw’ umwijima, Azabana n’ aber’ iteka ryose. Yazutse (yazutse), Yazutse (yazutse)! Umwami Yes’ ariho.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Ahar’ Uburuhukiro AH
verses: Ahar’ uburuhukiro, Ni hafi y’ Imana, Ahw’ icyaha kitarangwa, Ni hafi y’ Imana.
Ahatab’ impagarara, Ni hafi y’ Imana, Ahw’ icyaha kitarangwa, Ni hafi y’ Imana.
Ahahor’ umudendezo, Ni hafi y’ Imana, Ahahor’ umunezero, Ni hafi y’ Imana.
hymns.refrain: Mwami Yesu Mukiza watumwe n’ Imana, Dukomereze twese bugufi bw’ Imana.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Iteraniro Ry’ Abera
verses: Iteraniro ry’ abera, Inzovu n’ ibihumbi, Ingabo z’ abacunguwe, Barabagirana nk’ umucyo, Barwany’ uko babasha, None baratsinze, Mwagurir’ amarembo, Kugira ngo binjire.
Ikobe ry’ indirimbo, Rirangira mu kirere, Urusobe rw’ amajwi y’ inanga, Zizacurangw’ urwunge, Mbeg’ umuns’ utangaje, Ni nk’ uwo kurema, Mbega ng’ umubabar’ uratsindwa bitavugwa!
Hanezerew’ abari mu mirenge y’ i Kanani, Igitey’ ubwuzu kandi, N’ uko batazatandukana, Ya maso yariraga uzasang’ akeye, Nta mpfubyi nta n’ impfusha bizarangw’ i Kanani.
Iteraniro ry’ abera, Batsinze wa mubisha, Nimwumv’ izo ndirimbo nziza, Ni nk’ iz’ abamarayika, Hehe n’ imibabaro, Bayisezeyeho, Ntibazongera gusuhuz’ imitim’ ukundi.
hymns.refrain: Haleluya, Haleluya, Dusingiz’ Umwana w’ Intama, Haleluya, Haleluya, Nimusingiz’ Uwazutse.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Nimwuname Imbere Ya Yehova
verses: Nimwunam’ imbere ya Yehova, Yemwe mahanga yo mw’ isi, Mumenye yuk’ Uhorahw’ ari we Mana, Niwe soko y’ ubugingo.
Kand’ imbaraga ze zitangaje, Zaturemye mu butaka, Ndets’ igihe twazimiraga nk’ intama, Yatugaruye mu bushyo.
Tumusingirize mu ndirimbo, Duhanik’ amajwi yacu, Kand’ indim’ ibihumbi zo mw’ isi yose, Zizasingiz’ Uhoraho.
Amateka y’ ageng’ isi yose, Nta wager’ urukundo rwe, Ukuri kwe gushikamye nk’ urutare, Ukw’ ibihe bih’ ibindi.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Mb’ Uwawe, Mwami
verses: Mb’ uwawe Mwami mbane nawe, Ni wow’ umbumba, Jye nd’ ibumba, Ngenz’ uk’ ushaka mere nkawe, Mwam’ ubu ndakwiyeguriye.
Mb’ uwawe Mwami mbane nawe, Ndondora Mwam’ ungerageze, Unyeze nere nk’ urubura, Njye ngusenga niyoroheje.
Mb’ uwawe Mwami mbane nawe, Ubu ndagusab’ untabare, Wowe Nyir’ imbaraga zose, Nkorah’ umvure we Mukiza.
Mb’ uwawe Mwami mbane nawe, Nkomeza kuko nteraganwa, Nyuzuz’ Umwuka wawe Wera, Ngo bose bambonemo Yesu.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Mutuze
verses: Mutuze, Mutuze, Mwe guhwihwisa, Mwite kw’ ijambo ryose mwumvir’ aha.
Mutuze, Mutuze, Aha n’ ahera, Turahumvir’ ubutumwa bukiza.
Mutuze, Mutuze, Mwiyoroheje, Dusangir’ ibyiza byo mur’ Edeni.
Mutuze, Mutuze, Tubabarirwe, Mutuze, Turi kumwe n’ Uhoraho.
hymns.refrain: Mwitonde (mwitonde), Mwitonde (mwitonde), Har’ Uhoraho, Muze (muze) hafi ye, Mumwubashye cyane.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Mbes’ Ushaka Guhirwa?
verses: Mbes’ ushaka guhirwa? Tang’ unezerewe. Bizakwiz’ ubutumwa, Tang’ unezerewe. Ntukikanyize rwose, Tanga unezerewe. Fatanya n’ Imana, Tyo tang’ unezerewe.
Reka wikwikanyiza, Tang’ unezerewe. Rekur’ impano zawe, Tang’ unezerewe. Mbes’ utunze bikeya? Tanga unezerewe. Izaguh ‘imigisha, Tang’ unezerewe.
Kwiza hos’ ubutumwa, Tang’ unezerewe. Maz’ umucyo wihute, Tang’ unezerewe. Mbes’ ushak’ imigisha wahabga n’ Uhoraho? Nuko rero mwumvire, Tang’ unezerewe.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Rangurur’ Indirimbo
verses: Rangurur’ indirimbo y’ ibyishimo n’ umunezero, Wikwiheba shir’ agahinda, Ririmban’ ibyishimo. Ririmbir’ Uwaturinze, Waduhuje n’ inshuti, Uwatuyoboy’ inzira, Itugeza mw’ ijuru.
Turirimbe dutway’ amabendera tunezerewe, Turirimba hoziana z’ umunezero w’ iteka. Turirimbir’ Umukiza, Turanguruy’ amajwi, Tuvug’ ibyabaye kera, By’ urukundo rw’ Imana.
Turagushima Data Wera, Kubw’ imbabazi zawe, Uko duteraniye hamwe, Turagushima cyane. Turagushima Mukiza, Kuko waducunguye, Uduhe Umwuka Wera, Atwegerez’ Imana.
hymns.refrain: Ririmba (ririmba), Ririmba (ririmba), Ririmban’ ibyishimo, Ririmba (ririmba), Ririmba (ririmba), N’ ibyishimo byinshi.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Nshikamye Ku Masezerano
verses: Nshikamye ku masezerano meza, Y’ Umukiza wanjye, Mpora nsingiza, Nzahora musingiza, Ndanguruye, Nshikamye ku masezerano.
Nshikamye ku masezerano meza, N’ ubwo naba mbuz’ epfo na ruguru, Ijambo ry’ Imana rimpa gutsinda, Nshikamye ku masezerano.
Nshikamye ku masezerano meza, Kuko nejeshejw’ amaras’ akiza, Niy’ atuma mpora mu mudendezo, Nshikamye ku masezerano.
Nshikamye ku masezerano meza, Nkomezwa n’ umurunga w’ urukundo, Mpora neshesh’ inkota y’ Umwuka we, Nshikamye ku masezerano.
Nshikamye ku masezerano meza, Numv’ Umwuka we Wer’ ampamagara, Ngo ngume mu Mukiza nkesha byose, Nshikamye ku masezerano.
hymns.refrain: S.: Nshikamye ku masezerano, Y’ Umucunguzi wanjye, Nshikamye ku masezerano, Y’ Umucunguzi. A.,T. na B. : Nshikamye ku masezerano, Masezerano y’ Umucunguzi wanjye, Nshikamye ku maserano, Y ’ Umucunguzi. Masezerano y’ Umucunguzi.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Niba Mvug’ Ijambo Rito
verses: Niba mvug’ ijambo rito, Rihumuriz’ abandi, Niba ndirimb’ indirimbo, Ntibongere kwiheba.
Niba urukundo rwanjye, Rwahumuriz’ abandi, Niba nagir’ icyo nkora, Kikunganir’ abandi.
Niba nakor’ umurimo, Ukaruhur’ abandi, Mana mp’ urukundo rwinshi, Rutume mfash’ abandi.
hymns.refrain: Mana mfasha mvuge neza, Mpa n’ indirimbo nziza, Mbashisha kurangurura, Ngo byumvikane hose.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Umwami Yesu Yikorer’ Umusaraba?
verses: Umwami Yesu yikorer’ umusaraba wenyine? Umuntu wese yikorer’ uwe, Nanjye har’ uwanjye.
Nzawikorera ngeze igihe Azawunduhura, Anjyan’ iwacu anyambik’ ikamba yanteguriye.
Nzarambik’ ikamba ryanjye iruhande rw’ Umukiza, Haba hashashe izahabu, Nzogeza izina rye.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Umwami Yesu Yazutse
verses: Umwami Yesu yazutse, Mwese nimwishime Haleluya, Abaremwe bamuramye, Mwese nimwishime Haleluya, Twese tumusingize, Mwese nimwishime Haleluya, Isi n’ ijuru bimusingize, Mwese nimwishime Haleluya.
Umukiza wac’ ariho, Mwese nimwishime Haleluya, Yaneshej’ urupfu rwose, Mwese nimwishime Haleluya, Niwe waducunguye, Mwese nimwishime Haleluya, Yatsinz’ imbaraga z’ igituro, Mwese nimwishime Haleluya.
Yaducunguj’ urukundo, Mwese nimwishime Haleluya, Yaturwaniy’ intambara, Mwese nimwishime Haleluya, Yiganzura n’ urupfu, Mwese nimwishime Haleluya, Yatwugururiye paradizo, Mwese nimwishime Haleluya.

Twishimire kujy’ ahw’ ari, Mwese nimwishime Haleluya, Tuger’ ikirenge mu cye, Mwese nimwishime Haleluya, Azatuzura nkawe, Mwese nimwishime Haleluya, Tubikeshej’ umusaraba we, Mwese nimwishime Haleluya.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Mbese Yesu Ajy’ Anyitaho?
verses: Mbese Yesu ajy’ anyitaho, Mu byago no mu mahoro, Mu mibabaro no mu miruho, No mu rugendo rurushya?
Mbese Yesu ajy’ anyitaho, Iyo ngenda mu mwijima, N’ iy’ umwijima w’ akag’ ungose, Mbese Yes’ amba bugufi?
Mbese Yesu ajy’ anyitaho, Iyo nguye mu bishuko, Iyo mbabaye, N’ iyo mbogoza, Mbese Yes’ arantabara?
Mbese Yesu ajy’ anyitaho, Iyo nsezeye ku nshuti, Iyo mbabazwa, Simpumurizwe, Mbese Yes’ ab’ abireba?
hymns.refrain: Anyitaho, Arandinda, Mu mibabaro yanjye, Mu bihe merewe nabi, Umukiza wanjy’ anyitaho.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Hanga Amaso Umukiza
verses: Iyo utewe n’ ibyago bigatuma wiyunamira, Iyo kwiheba kukugezeh’ ubwoba bukagutaha.
Iy’ usatiriwe n’ umuraba byose bihungabanye, Iy’ ibyawe byose byagushijeh’ ubwoba bwagutashye.
Iy ur’ arakazuz’ ubuz’ urukundo rwawe rwa mbere, Iy’ icyaha wakoze kigutotez’ ijoro n’ umunsi.
Iyo ugiz’ ibicuguc’ intege mu murimo wa Yesu. Iyo mu rugendo rwawe mw’ isi utakimeny’ inzira.
hymns.refrain: Hang’ amaso Umukiza, Ngwin’ arakureba neza, Uzumv’ uhumurijwe kandi, Azakwemera akwakire.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Mfasha Ngo Ndusheho
verses: Mfasha ngo ndusheho kugukunda, Icyo nicyo ngusaba mpfukamye. Mbigusabye cyane mfasha Mwami Yesu, Ngo ndusheho kugukunda.
Nashats’ iby’ iyi si ngo nezerwe, Ubu ndabiretse, Ng’ ump’ ibyiza. Icyo nsaba gusa, Mfasha Mwami Yesu, Ngo ndusheho kugukunda.
Mfit’ umubabaro n’ agahinda, Nzishimira cyan’ intumwa zawe. Iyo ndirimbana nazo biramfasha, Nkarushaho kugukunda.
Mu marembera y’ ubu bugingo, Nzagushima cyane ngusingize. Nzakuririmbira maze mvuge nsenga, Ngo ndusheho kugukunda.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Yes’ Aje Yasanga Twiteguye?
verses: Yes’ aje yasanga twiteguye, Yasanga turi maso? Igihe cyose yagarukamo, Se twaba twiteguye?
Mbese n’ az’ umusek’ utambitse akaduhamagara, Umunt’ akabazw’ icyo yakoze, Mbes’ ahw’ azadushima?
Mbese tujya tub’ abanyakuri cyangwa turinezeza? Niba tuboneye mu mitima, Tuzagera mw’ ijuru.
Hahirw’ ab’ Umwami azasanga bakimutegereje, Mbese n’ agaruka mu gicuku, Tuzaba turi maso?
hymns.refrain: Mbese mugenzi twavuga tuti: Ubu turiteguye? Mbes’ ah’ Umwam’ azasanga wowe nanjye, Tukimutegereje?
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Izuba Nirirenga
verses: Izuba nirirenga turangij’ imirimo, Ubwo tuzaba tunaniwe, Uhorah’ utwara byose niw’ uzadukiza, Duhurire kuri Siyoni.
Tunyura mu gicucu, No mu mugaru mwinshi, Tugoswe n’ umwijim’ ukaze, Ariko Uhoraho, Niw’ uzatuyobora, Ab’ ari w’ utugez’ iwacu.
Nubw’ amaso yacu yuzuyemo amarira, Dufit’ ubwoba mu mitima, Ariko Umukiza agiye kutujyana, Aho tuzashir’ agahinda.
hymns.refrain: Tuzahurirayo, Koko tuzahurirayo, Tuzibanira na Yesu, Muri cya gihugu cyiza, Tuzahurirayo, Koko tuzahurirayo, Twibanire (twibanire), mw’ ikuzo rye.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Narebye Yesu
verses: Narebye Yes’ igihe nari ndembejwe n’ ibyaha, Nari nabuz’ uko ngira, Maz’ arampumuriza.
Nabony’ Umwami Yes’ ambambiwe ku musaraba, Nizera yukw’ ibyaha byanjye bibambanywe nawe.
Nabony’ Umwami Yesu, Azukany’ icyubahiro, Niringir’ imbabazi ze, N’ ibyahanuwe kera.
Yandebany’ impuhwe, Umutima wanjy’ uranyurwa, Maz’ anyiher’ ikimenyetso cy’ Umwuka We Wera.
Tuzabana n’ Umwami Yesu Krist’ ibihe byose, Mutezeho byose, Mbe nk’ umwana wiringira se.
hymns.refrain: S :Ye, ni koko, Nareby’ Umwami Yesu ; Arambona, Nzabana naw’ iteka. A, T na B :Ye n’ iby’ ukuri koko, Nanjye nareby’ Umwami Yesu, Maz’ arambona, Nanjye rwose, Nzabana naw’iteka.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Ntugire Icy’ Utinya
verses: Ntugire icyo utinya, Ndi kumwe nawe, Ni isezerano ryo kwizera kwanjye. Umwijima ntuzigera unter’ ubwoba, Ndahumurijwe, Ngendana n’ Umukiza wanjye.
Umusek’ umurik’ iyo hakeye neza, Yes’ umucyo wanjy’ amurikir’ iteka, Iyo ncitse intege, Yes’ arandamira, Mucyo weyur’ ibicu, Azangeza mw’ ijuru.
Iyo ibyago bituruts’ impande zose, Iyo nugarijwe Yes’ amba bugufi, Ambwira ati: Komera, Humura “ Nijye” Ntutinye komera ndi kumwe nawe iteka.
hymns.refrain: Ntabwo nzigunga, Sinzigera nigunga, Yesu arandinda, Ntabwo ajy’ ansiga jyenyine. Ntabwo nzigunga, Sinzigera nigunga, Yesu arandinda. Ntabwo ajy’ ansiga jyenyine.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Mbeg’ Inteko!
verses: Umwana w’ umunt’ azaz’ igitondo gitangaje, Nibwo twese tuzabon’ ikuzo rye. Azakur’ abantu be mu moko yose yo mw’ isi, Iyo nteko nini iratangaje !
Abasinziriye muri Yesu bazakanguka, N’ ubwo bab’ ikuzimu no mu nyanja, Bahabw’ imibiri imeze nk’ iy’ abo mw’ ijuru, Iyo nteko nini izatangaza !
Tuzabon’ umudugud’ urimw’ amazu yera de, N’ uruzi rwa ya mazi y’ ubugingo. Abazaba baratandukanye bazabonana, Izab’ ar’ inteko nin’ itangaje!
Nukuri Yes’ agiye kugaruka bidatinze, Uwo muns’ uzab’ umuns’ uhiriwe, Twese tuzahindurwa mu kanya, Nk’ ako guhumbya! Iyo nteko nin’ izab’ itangaje !
hymns.refrain: S. na A. : Mbeg’ inteko nini nziza! Inteko nini y’ abacunguwe na Yesu ubwe! Mbeg’ inteko nini y’ abantu! Bazahora banezerew’ iteka! T. na B. : Mbeg’ inteko, mbeg’ inteko ! Nini nziza, nini nziza ! Inteko nini y’ abacunguwe na Yesu ubwe! Mbeg’ inteko, mbeg’ inteko ! nini y’ abantu! Bazahora banezerew’ iteka!
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Umutima Wanjye Wari Wihebye
verses: Umutima wanjye wari wihebye, Ibyaha byanjye byantaye mu rwobo, Ntakambir’ Uhoraho ndi mw’ isayo, Maz’ araz’ ankuramo, None ndiho.
Yanyigije hafi ye ku Rutare, Nimpaguma ntabwo nzongera kugwa, Byatumy’ intambwe zanjye zishikama, Nzahaguma nzahambikirw’ ikamba.
Niwe wanyigishij’ indirimbo nshya, Nyiririmba ku manywa na nijoro, Ubu nibereye mu mudendezo, Nzakomeza nsingiz’ Uwankijije.
Nzaririmb’ ibitangaza bya Yesu, Nzamusingiza bose babimenye, Nzajya ndirimb’ agakiza k’ iteka, Kugez’ ubwo bose bameny’ Imana.
hymns.refrain: Yankuyemo yaransayuye, Maz’ ampagarika ku Rutare, Kand’ anyigisha kuririmba, Ndamwogeza, Haleluya.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Ibihe By’ Imibabaro
verses: Ibihe by’ imibabaro bitey’ agahinda, Byose nabituy’ i Kalvari, Yes’ ari bugufi.
Muture Yes’ amaganya yanyu uyu munsi, Byose nabituy’ i Kalvari, Yes’ ari bugufi.
Mutim’ ubabaye cyane, Humura witinya, Byose nabituy’ i Kalvari, Yes’ ari bugufi.
hymns.refrain: Byose nabituy’ i Kalvari, Kalvari, Kalvari, Byose nabituy’ i Kalvari , Yes’ ari bugufi.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Wibuk’ Imigisha Wahawe
verses: N’ ubwo waterwa n’ amakuba menshi, Maz’ akagutera kwiheba cyane, Ibuk’ imigisha yose wahawe, Ibyo yakoze biragutangaza.
Uhor’ uremerewe n’ amaganya, Umusarab’ urakuremereye, Ibuk’ imigisha yose wahawe, Uhor’ ubiririmb’ uko bukeye.
N’ ubon’ abandi bafit’ ubutunzi, Wibuk’ ubwo Yesu yasezeranye, Wibuk’ imigisha yos’ utagura, Ingororano yaw’ iri mw’ ijuru.
N’ ubwo wab’ utewe n’ impagarara, Ntizizaguhagarik’ umutima, Wibuke k’ ufit’ abamarayika, Bazakurinda baguhumurize.
hymns.refrain: S. na A. : Wibuk’ imigisha wahawe, Wibuk’ imigisha y’ Imana, Imigisha Iman’ iguha, Ibyo yakoze biragutangaza. T. na B. : Wibuk’ imigisha …gisha wahawe, Wibuk’ imigisha …gisha y’ Imana, Imigisha yose Iman’ iguha, Ibyo yakoze biragutangaza.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Mana Data, Ushobora Byose
verses: Mana Data, Ushobora byose, Duhe Mwami, Kurabagirana, Tukuririmbire tugushima, Kukw’ ariw’ ushobora byose.
Watuyoboy’ ibihe byashize, Tuyobore no mur’ iki gihe, Dukingire imyambi y’ umwanzi, Tuyoboreshe ijambo ryawe.
Intambara ziraduc’ intege, Tuber’ ingabo idukingira, Duhe kwizer’ imbaraga yawe, Dukeney’ ubuntu bwawe Mwami.
Duhembure mur’ urugendo, Tuyobore amanywa n’ ijoro, Duhe kuguma bugufi bwawe, Guhimbazwa n’ ibyawe iteka.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Urukundo Rw’ Umukiza
verses: Ubu mpagaz’ imbere ya Yesu w’ i Nazareti, Ntangazwa n’ ukw’ ankunda kandi nandujwe n’ ibyaha!
Ari mu gashyamb’ asenga, Nijye yagiriraga, Bya byuya by’ amaraso yabibize kukw’ ankunda.
Maz’ abamarayika baza kumuhumuriza, Kuko yar’ ababajwe n’ imibabaro y’ abantu.
Tuzamureb’ iteka abazaba bacunguwe, Duhore turirimba urukundo yadukunze.
hymns.refrain: Urukundo rw’ Umukiza Nzahora nduririmba, Urukundo Yes’ ankunda, Ruhebuj’ ibintu byose.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Amarembo Niyugururwa
verses: Ntituzongera kuba mu mwijima, Amarembo niyugururwa. Ahubwo tuzaba muri rwa rurembo, Rumurikirwa n’ Imana.
Inshuti zizandindira ku cyambu, Amarembo niyugururwa. Nzajya kwiber’ ahatazarangw’ icyaha, Amarembo yuguruwe.
Nta ndwara no kuribwa bizabayo, Amarembo niyugururwa. Tuziganirira n’ abakunzi bacu, Amarembo yuguruwe.
Nzagir’ umunezer’ utarondorwa, Amarembo niyugururwa. Nzahora nirebera Yesu mu maso, Amarembo yuguruwe.
Tuzagendera mu mucyo w’Imana, Amarembo niyugururwa. Tuzaba turirimban’ umunezero, Amarembo yuguruwe.
Ntabwo nzongera kuvunwa n’ ishavu, Amarembo niyugururwa. Nzabana n’ Umwami Yes’ iteka ryose Amarembo yuguruwe.
hymns.refrain: S. na A. : Amarembo niyugururwa, Amarembo niyugururwa. Mbeg’ umunezero tuzahagirira, Amarembo yuguruwe! T. na B. : Amarembo niyu...ru... ...gururwa, Amarembo Niyu... ru... gururwa, Mbeg’ umunezero tuzahagirira, Amarembo yuguruwe!
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Nind’ Uzagera Mu Rurembo?
verses: Nind’ uzagera mu rurembo, Ruhorahw’ ibihe byose, Akabon’ ibyiza bihari, Mbese nijye, Cyangwa wowe? Akahabon’ inzira zose zisizemw’ izahabu nziza, Agahora mu munezero, Mbese nijye, Cyangwa wowe?

Nind’ uzatur’ umusaraba, Ngw’ aruhuk’ iteka ryose, Umwizer’ azahabw’ ikamba, Mbese nijye, Cyangwa wowe? Azareb’ Umwami mu maso, Akiz’ imibabaro yose, Abane naw’ iteka ryose, Mbese nijye, Cyangwa wowe?
Kandi har’ uzakingiranwa, Ubutazakingurirwa, Azabwirwa ngo ntabwo nkuzi, Mbese nijye, Cyangwa wowe? Azahamagarir’ ubusa, Urugi ruzaba rwakinzwe, Bazagororerw’ asigare, Mbese nijye cyangwa wowe?

Harih’ uzishimir’ intsinzi, Anesheje, Anesheje, Ari hamwe n’ abacunguwe, Mbese nijye, Cyangwa wowe? Har’ uzaramukanya n’ abe, Batandukanijwe n’ ibyago, Be kongera gutandukana, Mbese nijye, Cyangwa wowe?
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Ngufitiy’ Ubutumwa
verses: Ngufitiy’ ubutumwa, Haleluya, N’ ubutumwa bw’ Umukiza, Bwanditse mw’ Ijambo rye, Haleluya, Muhugukire urakizwa.
Ngufitiy’ ubutumwa bw’ urukundo, Mwene Data, Haleluya, Buturutse mw’ ijuru, Haleluya, Bwatanzwe n’ Umukiza Yesu.
Weguriw’ ubugingo, Haleluya, Buhorahw’ iteka ryose, N’ uhanga Yes’ amaso, Haleluya, Niwe wenyine ugukiza.
hymns.refrain: Tyo reba ( tyo reba) maz’ ukire ( maz’ ukire ), Reba Yes’ Urakizwa. Byanditswe mw’ Ijambo rye, Haleluya Muhugukire urakizwa.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Ndi Mu Murima
verses: Ndi mu murima jyenyine, Ikime gitonze ku byatsi, Numv’ ijwi rivuga riti: Umwana w’ Iman’ aratungutse.
Aravuga maz’ ijwi rye ryiza ryikirizwa n’ inyoni, Indirimbo nziza namwumvanye ntabw’ izamva ku mutima.
Tugumana mu murima, Kuk’ ubwire bwari bukubye, Maze anyoherez’ ankangara, Arikw’ ar’ ukumpwitura.
hymns.refrain: Turakomeza turagendana, Maz’ ambwira ko yantoye, Mbeg’ ibyishimo twari dufite, Bitigeze bibaho!
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Ntabwo Ndamenya
verses: Ntabwo ndamenya nez’ icyatumye Iman’ ingirir ‘ubuntu, Bigatum’ ingir’ uwo mu muryango w’ abana bayikunda!
Ntabwo nzi nez’ uburyo yampaye, Uko kwizera gukiza, N’ubury’ Ijambo rye ryampaye amahoro yo mu mutima!
Sinzi ubury’ Umwuka yihanisha abanyabyaha nkanjye, Kumenyesh’ abandi ibya Yesu, Bidutera kumwizera.
Ntabwo nz’ icyo nateganirijwe, Ar’ icyiza cyangw’ ikibi, Imibabaro n’ iminsi myiza, Byose bir’ imbere yawe.
Sinzi igih’ Umwam’ azazira, Ndetse n’ ahw’ azaturuka, Niba mbana na Yesu mur’ iki gihe, Nzamusanganira.
hymns.refrain: Kuko nzi nez’ uwo nizeye, Kand’ ariwe ushobora byose, Niwe undindir’ ubugingo, Kugeza urya munsi.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Nguhay’ Umwanya
verses: Wavuye mw’ ijuru usig’ ubwami bwawe, Uza mur’ iyi si ku bwanjye, I Betelehemu, Ntiwabonay’ icumbi, Kand’ ur’ Umwami w’ abami.
Abamarayika bakuririmbiraga, Bogez’ icyubahiro cyawe, Maz’ ugeze mw’ isi uvuk’ ur’ umukene, Wicisha bugufi cyane.
Ingunzu zitahiraga mu myobo yazo, Inyoni zirara mu byari, Ariko woweho wararaga butunda, Mw’ ishyamba ry’ i Galilaya.
Wazaniy’ abantu Ijambo rihoraho, Ngo rizabah’ umudendezo, Maze barakwanga bakujyan’ i Kalvari, Bakwambikiray’ amahwa.
Ubw’ uzagaruka mw’ ikobe ry’ indirimbo, Uje mu cyubahiro cyawe, Ndifuza cyane yuko wazampamagara, Ut’ icar’ iburyo bwanjye.
hymns.refrain: Nguhay’ umwanya mu mutima, Uwiberemw’ ibihe byose, Ndawukweguriye Mwami wanjye, Uwiberemw’ ibihe byose.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Twabony’ Agakiza
verses: Twabony’ agakiza, Muri Yesu Kristo, Yadupfiriye i Kalvari, Mu rukundo rwe rutagir’ iherezo, Twatsindishirijwe na Yesu
Igitambo cy’ amaraso y’ Umukiza, Nicyo cyadukijij’ ibyaha, Cyadukuyehw’ inenge twari dufite, Ubu tur’ abana b’ Imana.
Urukund’ Imana yakunze umuntu, N’ ukuri ruhebuje byose, Nta yindi mpano dufite twakwitura, Tuguhay’ imitima yacu.
hymns.refrain: Yesu yabay’ incungu y’ ibyaha byacu, Yaducunguj’ amaraso ye, Nzahora ndirimb’ urukundo rwinshi, Yesu yankunze kera.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Uko Ndushaho kumukorera
verses: Aho menyey’ Umukiza, Nkanagengwa nawe, Uko ndushaho kumukorera, Nikw’ arushaho kunyuzuramo.
Angirir’ ubuntu bwinshi, Nkamererwa neza, Uko ndushaho kumuyoboka, Nikw’ arushaho kunyuzuramo.
hymns.refrain: Uko njya ndushaho kumukorera, Nawe, nikw’ arushaho kunyuzura, Kandi uko ndushaho kumukunda, Nawe nikw’ arushaho kunyuzuramo.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Nabonye Kuza Kwa Yesu
verses: Nabonye kuza kwa Yesu afit’ icyubahiro, Amaze gusenya rwos’ ububiko bw’ umujinya, Yadukijije n’ ubugi bw’ inkot’ ityaye cyane, Niw’ utuyobora.
Namubonye no mu mazu y’ abantu benshi cyane, Bamwubakiramw’ ibicaniro nimugoroba, Nongera kumubon’ ac’ imanza zitarenganya, Niw’ utuyobora.
Akomeje guhamagaz’ abant’ ijwi ry’ impanda, Arateguriz’ abantu bose gucirw’ imanza. Mutima wanjye mwitabe vuba unezerewe, Niw’ utuyobora.
hymns.refrain: Nasingizwe, Haleluya, Nasingizwe, Haleluya, Nasingizwe, Haleluya, Niw’ utuyobora.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Mbeg’ Umunsi Mwiza !
verses: Mbeg’ umunsi mwiz’ ubw’ abacunguwe bazaba bar’ imbere ye. Bazaririmb’ indirimbo kubw’ ikuzo n’ ubuntu bwayo.
Ndareb’ ingabo zitabarika zerekan’ umucyo w’ ijuru, Zifit’ amahoro atangaje ku maremb’ arabagirana.
Numv’ ijwi ryiza ry’ Umucunguzi riva ku ntebe ye y’ ubwami, Nimuz’ abahiriwe na Data. Mwambikw’ ikamba ryo kunesha.
Abera bazaririmba n’ abamarayika batabarika, Isi izahind’ umushyitsi kand’ ibyago bizaba bishize.
hymns.refrain: Inteko zingana n’ umusenyi, Zingana n’ umusenyi mwinshi, Abacunguwe bazangana n’ umusenyi, Umusenyi bangana n’ umusenyi.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Nimutyo Turirimban’ Umunezero
verses: Nimutyo turirimban’ umunezero, Twegereje kuger’ iwacu, Aho niho tuzaban’ iteka ryose, Ubu tugiye kugerayo.
Mutyo dushishikare dukore neza, Twegereje kuger’ iwacu, Kand’ Imana yiteguye kutwakira. Ubu tugiye kugerayo.
Dukomez’ urugendo twe gucogora, Twegereje kuger’ iwacu, Nimutyo twamamaz’ iyo nkuru nziza, Ubu tugiye kugerayo.
Mbeg’ umunezero tuzagirirayo! Twegereje kuger’ iwacu, Ntituzongera kubogoz’ amarira, Ubu tugiye kugerayo.
hymns.refrain: S. na T. : Mu gihe gito, Mu gihe gito, Tuzaba tugezeyo, Tugiye kuban’ ubudatandukana, Ubu tugiye kugerayo. A. na B. : Mu gihe gito, Mu gihe gito, Tuzaba tugezeyo, Tugiye kuban’ ubudatandukana, Ubu tugiye kugerayo.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Muze Dusingiz’ Umwami
verses: Muze dusingiz’ Umwami, Abera muz’ imbere ye, Abahora mumuramya, Mwamamaz’ ububasha bwe.
Mumusingiriz’ ahera, Muririmbe mwisanzuye, Nimumuramye mwunamye, Mumwubahe kukw’ abumva.
Murahoran’ ubuntu bwe butemba buv’ i Siyoni, N’ Umuremyi, N’ Uhoraho, Bose nibamusingize.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Ahw’ Umukiza Anyobora
verses: Ahw’ Umukiza anyobora, Nzemera mukurikire, Nzamukurikir’ iteka, Sinzakorwa n’ isoni.
N’ ubwo haba mu mwijima, Nkagenda nyobagurika, Nzumv’ ijwi ry’ uwo Mukiza rinsubizemw’ intege.
N’ ubw’ isi yambushabusha, Nkabur’ epfo na ruguru, Mukiza uzandamira, Ntabwo nzarambarara.
Ibi byago nibishira, Azanyijyanir’ iwacu, Ntihabay’ umubabaro, Nzaba ntanye n’ ibyaha.
hymns.refrain: Ahw’ Umukiza anyobora, Nzemera mukurikire, Ahw’ azanyobora hose, Nzajya mukurikira.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Twumvire Mwami
verses: Twumvire Mwami, Turakuramya, Uduteg’ amatwi, Duh’ amahoro. Amen.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Nzinutsw’ Ibyo Mw Isi
verses: Nzinutsw’ ibyo mw’ isi, Mpisemo Yesu! Sinzifatanya nabyo, Mpisemo Yesu! N’ isi y’ umwijima, Nta buruhukiro, Yesu niwe mugisha, Mpisemo Yesu!
Wa si we, winshuka, Mpisemo Yesu! Nzabana naw’ iteka, Namuhisemo, Ibyo mw’ isi byose, n’ iby’ igihe gito, Bimeneka nk’ ibumba, Mpisemo Yesu!
Iby’ isi n’ inzozi, Mpisemo Yesu! Niwe umber’ umucyo, Mpisemo Yesu! Nashatse kwikiza, Binsubiz’ inyuma, Yesu niwe wanyuze, Niwe mpisemo!
Ntabwo ntiny’ urupfu, Mpisemo Yesu! Nshaka kubahw’ iteka, Mpisemo Yesu! Ndashaka kugera, Aho nzab’ iteka, Nzaba mu gituza cye, Mpisemo Yesu.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Mutima Wanjye Ucururuke
verses: Mutima wanjye ucururuke, Nugir’ ibiguter’ impagarara, Wiringire Ishobora byose, N’ imigambi yayo myiza.
Mutima wanjy’ iby’ ari byo byose, N’ ubw’ ibihe byagenda bihinduka, Imbabazi, zayo ntizishira, Zihorahw’ ibihe byose.
Mutima wanjye uremerewe, N’ ubwo wab’ utew’ ubwoba n’ urupfu, Ni wiheba wisung’ Uwiteka, Agukingurir’ ijuru.
Mutima wanjy’ uhereye kera, Ntiwigeze ubur’ umudendezo, Isung’ Imana izakwakira, Wemere kugengwa na yo.
Ubugingo bwiza buboneye, Bushishikarira gukor’ ibyiza, Mukiza mfasha ngo mbugereho, Ump’ umutim’ utunganye.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Ikuzo Ni Iryawe !
verses: Ikuzo n’ iryawe Data wa Twese, Nari nahabiye kure yawe, Wangejeje mu mucyo w’ itangaza, Umvana mu bubata ndakira.
Mbeg’ urukundo rutarondoreka! Rwatumye Yesu azakunshaka. Nar’ umuhanya sinari nkwiriye, Gukira ngukesha Yesu gusa.
Akir’ uyu mutima wanjye Mwami, Nkweguriy’ imibereho yanjye, Wowe wanyitangiye ukankiza, Wanyejeshej’ amaraso yawe.
Mana yanjye nkingira ndakwinginze, Sinashobora kwirwanirira, Kugira ngo nzanezererw’ iteka, Twishimye, Dusingiza Umwami.
hymns.refrain: Mbeg’ urukundo ruhebuje! Nababariwe, N’ inkuru nziza kuri twe.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Umukiza Niw’ Unyobora
verses: Umukiza niw’ unyobor’ iyo ndi mu bishuko, N’ iy’ amakub’ angose, Amber’ ubuhungiro, Niw’ unkingir’ ibishuko, Yesu nyiyoborere.
Uhosh’ umuraba nk’ umubyey’ uhoz’ umwana we, Ndets’ uranawutegek’ ubwaw’ ukakumvira, Mwami wanjye Yesu nkunda, Ujy’ Unyiyoborera.
Iyo negerey’ inkengero ngashy’ ubwoba, Nkakwihishamo, Ndaruhuka, Nkumv’ umpumuriz’ uti: Witinya ntacy’ uteze kuba, Nzajya nkuyobora.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Yesu Araduhamagara !
verses: Yes’ araduhamagara, Ashaka kudukiza, Atubwiz’ ijwi rye ati: Mukristo nkurikira.
Yes’ araduhamagara, Ngo tuve mu by’ iyi si, Araduhamagar’ ati: Mukristo nkunda cyane.
Iyo tumerewe neza, Cyangwa se tubabaye, Araduhamagar’ ati: Mukristo nkunda rwose.
Yes’ araduhamagara, Mwami turakwitabye, Duhe kukumvira, Tugukunde kuruta byose.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Nimucane Amatabaza
verses: Nimucan’ amatabaza, Umwijim’ ubay’ icyago, Hazab’ umwijim’ ukaze, Umwam’ ataragaruka.
Abant’ ibihumbi byinshi, Bahinyur’ ubu butumwa, Natwe tubushikamyemo, Dutegerez’ Umukiza.
Ijambo rye n’ itabaza, Ntituzigera tuyoba, N’ ubw’ amakub’ ari hose, Ntabw’ Iman’ izaduhana.
Dukor’ imirimo myiza, Twe guh’ ab’ iy’ is’ urwaho, Tuzabiherw’ imigisha, Nidukomeza kwizera.
hymns.refrain: Mubonez’ amatabaza, Kandi nimwubah’ Imana, Kuza kw’ Umwami kuri hafi, Mubonez’ amatabaza.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Ujyuvug’ Ibya Yesu
verses: Ujy’ uvug’ ibya Yesu, Inshuti y’ ukuri, Ngwin’ uduhumurish’ ibyo yagukoreye.
Ujy’ uvug’ ibya Yes’ uzumv’ ubabariwe, No kubw’ ubuntu bwe tuzagera mw’ ijuru.
Sinabura kuvug’ iby’ umusaraba we, Nkund’ uwo Mukiza, Kuko yanyitangiye.
Uvug’ ibya Yesu, Ntupfush’ igih’ ubusa, Kutita ku nshingano, Bitesh’ agaciro.
Ujy’ uvug’ ibya Yesu, N’ ubwo wacogora, Va mu ntege nke zawe, Umwiyegurire.
hymns.refrain: Vuga Yesu gusa, Bizakuyobor’ iteka, Jy’ ubivug’ uririmba, Kandi unasenga.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Ushimirw’ Ibyiza Byose
verses: Ushimirwe ibyiza byose, Siyoni murwa w’ Imana, Itavuguruzwa yakugiz’ ubuturo bwayo bwite, Wubatswe ku Rutare rw’ iteka, N’ iki cyaguhangara? Ugoteshejw’ inkike z’ agakiza, Reka gutiny’ abanzi bawe.
Dore amazi y’ ubugingo, Atemb’ ava mu rukundo, Niy’ abeshahw’ abana bawe, Imibabar’ igashira. Ninde se wacogora, Har’ uwo mugez’ umar’ inyota? Ubuntu bw’ uwo Mutanga-bugingo, Ntabwo buzagir’ iherezo.
Ahazenguruts’ uwo murwa, Har’ ibicu n’ umuriro, Byerekana ko kugaruka kw’ Umwami kuri bugufi, Hahirw’ abazatur’ i Siyoni, Bejeshejw’ amaraso, Biyeguriye Yes’ abahindur’ abami, N’ abatambyi b’ Imana.

Ndi mu muryango w’i Siyoni, Kubw’ ubuntu bwawe Mwami, N’ ubwo bampindur’ urw’ amenyo, Nzasingiz’ izina ryawe, Ibinezeza byo mur’ iyi si, Bihita nk’ umuyaga, Umunezero uhoraho, Wateguriw’ abana b’ i Siyoni.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Mbes’ Aho Tuzahurira Ku Cyambu?
verses: Mbes’ aho tuzahurira ku cyambu cya rwa ruzi, Ahahor’ umucy’ iteka, Ntihab’ umubabaro?
Tuzahurira ku cyamb’ urugendo rurangiye? Mbes’ aho tuzahurirayo, Maze twiruhutse?
Mbes’ aho twese tuzahurira mu mudugudu, Wubatswe n’ Uhoraho, Urimbishijwe yasipi?
Abacunguwe bose, Bazaririmb’ indirimbo, Kand’ ibiremwa byose bizasingiz’ Uhoraho.
Mbes’ aho tuzabonana n’ abo twakundanaga, Maze twumv’ amajwi yabo tubareba mu maso?
Mbese tuzabonana na Krist’ Umukiza wacu, Aje kujyan’ intore ze mu bwami buhoraho?
hymns.refrain: Mbes’ aho tuzahurira ku cyambu cya rwa ruzi? Tuzabonanirayo tuhanezererw’ iteka?
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Abatuye Mw’ Isi Mwese
verses: Abatuye mw’ isi mwese, Muririmbir’ Uhoraho, Mumukorere mwishima, Mwogez’ icyubahiro cye.
Mumenye kw’ ari we Mana, Kukw’ ariwe waturemye, Twese tur’ umukumbi we, Turagiwe n’ Uhoraho.
Muze mwese mu rugo rwe, Muze mwese mumushima, Muhanik’ amajwi yanyu, Kukw aribyo bikwiriye.
Mwabaza muti: ni kuki? Nuk’ Uhoraho ari mwiza, N’ impuhwe ze zikaramba, Nta n’ ubwo zizashiraho.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Yesu Mucunguzi Wanjye
verses: Yesu Mucunguzi wanjye, Niwe byishimo byanjye, Ni wowe ujy’ ungoboka, Mu bihe by’ amakuba.
Wagumye kumpumuriza, Mu bihe bibi byose, Ubwo nari nshumbirijwe, Ngoswe n’ imibabaro.
Ur’ ibyiringiro byanjye, Ndayob’ ukanyobora, Ni wowe nshuti y’ ukuri, Undutir’ abo mw’ isi.
Ni wow’ undem’ umutima, Mur’ iyi si y’ ibyaha, Nzakomeza ngusingize, Ngez’ ubwo nzaz’ iwawe.
hymns.refrain: Yesu Mucunguzi wanjye, Niwe ndirimbo yanjye, Nta yindi nshuti nabona, Nagereranya nawe.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Yasezeranye Kuduh’ Imvura
verses: Yasezeranye kuduha, Imvura y’ umugisha, Iri sezerano ryayo, Ryaturutse mw’ ijuru.
Yasezeranye kuduha, Imvura y’ umugisha, Yitugoborer’ uyu muns’ ikwir’ impanda zose.
Yasezeranye kuduha, Imvura y’ umugisha, Turayifuz’ uy’ umunsi, Sohoz’ ibyo wavuze.
Yasezeranye kuduha, Imvura y’ umugisha, Icyayiduh’ uyu munsi, Mana tubabarire.
hymns.refrain: Duh’ umugisha, Turifuz’ umugisha, Uvuy’ iwawe mw’ ijuru, Nyabuneka wuduhe.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Inkomangiro Yawe Yafata ?
verses: Inkomangiro yawe yafata, Umuraba w’ ibyag’ uguteye? Ukagukanagira nk’ ingoyi, Inkomangiro yaw’ izashikama?
Nib’ itsitse ntizateraganwa, Ifashwe n’ ukuboko k’ Umwami, Imirunga ye iraduhuza, Bitewe n’ imbaraga y’ ikomeye.
Izashikama mu gihe kibi, Ubw imivumb’ izab’ ihurura, Umuyaga w’ ishuher’ usheze, Ntabwo bizarenga ku bwato bwacu.
Ndetse no mu gihe kibi cyane, Twifuz’ amazi yaduhembura, Tuzatsika ku nkombe z’ ijuru, Umugar’ ushire buheriheri.
Ubw’ igitondo kizatangaza, N’ amarembo arabagirana, Tuzatsika ku nkombe z’ ijuru, Umugar’ ushire buheriheri.
hymns.refrain: Dufit’ inkomangir’ itsika, Imiraba yiyungikanya, Ikomangiye ku Rutare, Rushikamye, Umukiza wacu.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Nta Rindi Zina Nka Yesu
verses: Nta rindi zina nka Yesu, N’ izina rihebuje, Rihimbar’ abo mw’ ijuru, N’ abakristo bo mw’ isi.
Nta rindi zina nka Yesu, Rimar’ imibabaro, Nta zina ryahwana n’ irye, Ndetse no mu mahoro.
Mfit’ ibyiringiro byo kuzamubon’ agarutse, Nizeye kw’ azanyakira, Maz’ akampumuriza.
Nib’ ashaka ko mukorera mu ruzabibu rwe, Azampira mu byo nkora, Kand’ ahir’ ibyo mvuga.
Nah’ urupfu rwanyegura, Kuko nd’ umukungugu, Ntacyo bizaba bintwaye, Niringiy’ Umukiza.
hymns.refrain: Zina (zina) ryiza (ryiza), Nta rihwanye n’ irya Yesu, Zina (zina) ryiza (ryiza), Nta rihwanye n’ irya Yesu.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Singizwa Yesu
verses: Singizwa Yesu, Umukiza Yazutse, Yesu yaneshej’ urupfu, Iteka ryose, Marayik’ ufit’ umucyo, Aramanuka, Yakinguye igituro, Yesu aranesha, Singizwa Yesu, Umukiza Yazutse, Yesu yaneshej’ urupfu, Iteka ryose.
Itegereze: Ni Yesu Umukiza, Umucunguzi w’ abantu, Ntushidikanye, Ishime kand’ uririmbe! Yesu ariho! Ongera ubyamamaze, Yesu ni muzima. Itegereze: Ni Yesu Umukiza, Umucunguzi w’ abantu, Ntushidikanye.

Nta bwoba mfite! Yesu ni muzima pe! Nzajya musingiz’ iteka, Mahoro yanjye. Yesu yaraneshereje niwe nizeye. Ni Yesu umbeshejeho, Sinzigera ntinya, Nta bwoba mfite! Yesu ni muzima pe! Nzajya musingiz’ iteka, Mahoro yanjye.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Nyir’ Impuhwe Nyinshi
verses: Nyir’ impuhwe nyinshi cyane, Iman’ ibabarira, Kwibagirw’ ibyaha ikababarir’ uwagomye.
Nari kure y’ uwo nkunda, Mbabaj’ umutima we, Kuko namwimagahw’ aba, N’ uwanjye yamfiriye.
Yesu ndakwiyeguriye, Ndashaka kubaturwa, Icyaha cyose cyambase, Maze ngikire rwose.
Haleluya yanduhuye, Ubu sinshidikanya, Nderekez’ iyo mw’ ijur, Nejejwe no kubayo.
hymns.refrain: S na A:Ndaje Yesu, Ndakwitabye, Uko ndi kos‘ unyemere, Ndaje Yesu ndakwitabye, Mukiz‘ unyakire.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Bazany’ Amaturo Yabo
verses: Bazany’ amaturo yabo, Kuyatur’ Umwami Yesu, Kuko bari bamukunze, Maze barayamutura. Iyo neza n’ urukundo, Byafashij’ umukene, N’ amaturo yose batuye, Yar’ ay’ agaciro.
Umukene yar’ ahagaze, Kure y’ abaturaga, Maz’ abony’ uburyo batura, Agir’ umunezero. Yuzurwa n’ ibyishimo, By’ ayo maturo batuye, We, yar’ afit’ ituro rito, Imbere y’ Umwami.
Abwiran’ Umwam’ agahinda, Ati: Nz’ ineza yawe, Akir’ iri turo ngutuye, Niryo mutima wanjye, Yes’ asubiza yitonze, Ati: S’ ituro rito, Nubw’ abandi batuye menshi, Urabarengeje.
hymns.refrain: Muture Yes’ amaturo, Biramunezeza rwose, Muhay’ umutima wanjye, Ndamwiyeguriye.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Ari Hafi Kuza
verses: Ari hafi kuza, Nahimbazwe Yesu, Azakorany’ abatoni be, Bajyane mw’ ijuru, Turebe mw’ ijuru, Twishime araje! Aje mu cyubahiro cye, Mucunguzi wacu.
Ari hafi kuza, Nahimbazwe Yesu, Imibabaro yacu yose, Ntizibukw’ ukundi, Yes’ azakuraho, Urupfu burundu, Azaza tuban’ iteka, Mucunguzi wacu.
Ari hafi kuza, Nahimbazwe Yesu, Azaz’ atungutse ku bicu, Ntidutinye rwose, Twubure amaso, Nguriya araje! Aje kujyana njye nawe, Mucunguzi wacu.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Ndakwifuza Yesu Mwiza
verses: Ndifuza Yesu Mwiza, Ndagukennye cyane, Nd’ umushyitsi n’ umwimukira, Singira gakondo, Ndifuz’ urukundo, Rwawe rumpumuriza, Runyobora ngakomera cyane, Sintezuke.
Ndifuz’ umutima wa Yesu ngo nduhuke, Ng’ untere kumutur’ imibabaro yanjye yose, Ndifuz’ Umwuka Wera, Ngw’ ambwir’ icyo ndi cyo, Arusheho kunyereka Umwana w’ Intama.
Ndakwifuza Yesu, Nshaka kuzakubona, Ugoswe n’ umukororombya ku ntebe ya cyami, Nzahora nezeranywe n’ abo wacunguye, Nzahora ngusingiz’ iteka, Ndi kumwe nawe.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Iby’ Usahaka Nibibeho
verses: Mukiza naraguhemukiye, Ndanakwimura ku mpamvu nkeya, Utungany’ umutima wanjy’ iby’ ushaka bibe.
Nari mfit’ imibabaro myinshi, Ntakir’ inshuti nahemukiye, N’ ubu ngubu ndacyavuga, Nt’ iby’ ushaka bibe.
Umwuka waw’ utangir’ ubuntu, Agenderer’ umutima wanjye, Humuriz’ umutima wanjy’ ibyushaka bibe.
Hindur’ ubugingo bwanjye bushya, Ubutegeke bub’ uk’ ushaka, Ndind’ ibimbuza kuvuga, Iby’ ushaka bibe
hymns.refrain: Iby’ ushaka (ushaka) nibibeho (bibeho), Utungany’ umutima wanjye, Iby’ ushaka bibe.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Haba Ubwo Umwijima Ubudika
verses: Hab’ ubw’ umwijim’ ubudika, Maze nkabur’ inzira pe, Ibyago bikiyongeranya, Bikantera no kwiheba.
Hab’ umunsi umbera mubi, Natambuka ngateguza, Nuko nkumva nguy’ agacuho, Maze nkisunga Rutare.
Nzanikomeza ku Rutare, Nibwo nzashir’ agahinda, Nirwo ruzanshoboz’ inzira, Zirimw’ ibihanamanga.
hymns.refrain: Nzahungira kuri Yesu (kuri Yesu), Kukw’ ariw’ undush’ imbaraga (imbaragaa), Nzahungira kuri Yesu ( kuri Yesu), Kukw’ ariw’ undush’ imbaraga.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Nimusingize Umukiza
verses: Nimusingiz’ Umukiza, Mumurebe mukire, N’ abanyabyaha nibaze, Arabamar’ inyota, N’ ubwo yigeze kwicisha bugufi, Yar’ Umwami, Impumyi zihumuka kubw’ amaraso ya Yesu.
Nimusingiz’ uwo Mukiza, Mwese mumuramye, Abamushakan’ umwete, Nabo azabakira, Bavuy’ impande zose, Bihuta banezerewe, Batwaye umusaraba wa Yesu, Abakize.
Nimumuh’ icyubahiro, Niwe Mwana w’ Imana, Ndetse n’ abatamwitaho, Arabiyegereza, Ngo bajye bibuk’ umusaraba yatangiyeho, Bib’ uruhererekane mu bantu, Bamuramye.
Mumusingize mu ndirimbo, No mu masengesho, Umucunguzi wikoreye ibyaha by’ abantu, Abato n’ abakuru bamwubahe, Bamuramye, Ibipfamatwi byumve, N’ ibiragi biririmbe
hymns.refrain: Abantu bose basingiz’ Umukiza wazutse, Musingiz’ uwo Mukiza, Ubavana mu byaha.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Hari Igihugu Kibamo Umucyo
verses: Har’ igihugu kibamw’ umucyo urabagirana, Ntabwo habayo umwijima, Yesu n’ umucyo waho.
Ibihe byaho ni byiza rwose, Nta mpinduk’ ibayo, Ntabwo habay’ impagarara, Tuhabik’ ubutunzi.
Mw’ ijuru hariy’ amazu meza arabagirana, Tuzahahurira n’ inshuti, Twakiranw’ ibyishimo.
Twifuza cyane kwimuka vuba, Mur’ iyi s’ ishaje, Tujye guturana n’ abera, Maze dut’ umuruho.
hymns.refrain: Abantu bose basingiz’ Umukiza wazutse, Musingiz’ uwo Mukiza, Ubavana mu byaha.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Nyobora Mwami Wanjye
verses: Nyobora Mwami wanjye (Mwami wanjye), Ne kurorongotana ( mbane nawe), Mb’ amahor’ unyoboye (unyoboye), Iyo nkuri bugufi (nkuri bugufi).
