Iyo ngeze mu kaga (ncits’ intege) Umber’ ubuhungiro ( buhungiro), Nyakiran’ imbabazi ( imbabazi), Nezerwa turi kumwe (turi kumwe).
Ntabara Mwami mwiza ( Mwami mwiza), Mu mibabaro yanjye (yanjye yose ), Kugez’ ubwo nzager’ aho (nzager’ aho ), Ntazarir’ ukundi (ntazarir’ ukundi).
hymns.refrain: Mukiza we, Mpabura nahabiye kure, Unyambutse mw’ isumo ( mw’ isumo), Mwami ngendane nawe ( nawe ).
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Mbese Ngend’ Imbokoboko?
verses: Mbese ngend’ imbokoboko, Nsanganiy’ Umukiza wanjye? Nta cyiza namukoreye, Mbese ngend’ imbokoboko?
Sinterw’ ubwoba n’ urupfu, Umukiza yarankijije. Ku musanga ntacyo mfite, Numva binkojej’ isoni.
Napfushij’ igih’ ubusa, Nakoz’ ibyangwa n’ Umukiza, Ubu ndamutakambira, Musaba kumbabarira.
Mwebw’ abera mushishikare, Mukore hakiri kare, Dor’ ijoro riraguye, Mutarakiz’ imitima.
hymns.refrain: Mbese ngende ntacyo mfite, Nsanganir’ uwo Mwami wanjye, Nta n’ umwe namukirije, Mbese ngende ntacyo mfite?
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Yesu Niwe Rufatiro
verses: Yesu niwe rufatiro, Twubakahw’ ingo zacu, N’ Urutare rukomeye, Ntabwo runyegenyega.
Iyo turi kumwe nawe, Atwuzuz’ urukundo, Niwe byiringiro byacu, Atwonger’ imbaraga.
Duh’ urukundo nyakuri, Ukomez’ ingo zacu, Turind’ imigambi mibi, Iva kuri sekibi.
hymns.refrain: S. na A. : Yesu n’ Urutare, Bwugamo bwacu, Yesu niwe soko, Y’ umunezero. T. na B. : Yesu Rutare, Yesu n’ Urutare, Bwugamo bwacu, …cubwacu Yesu ni soko, Yesu niwe soko, Y’ umunezero.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Yesu Ntabwo Yakwanga
verses: Yesu ntabwo yakwanga, N’ ubw’ ur’ umunyabyaha, Niwe nshuti ihebuje, Ntazanga kukwakira, Imana yatanze Yesu, Kugira ngo ducungurwe, N’ ubwo wamuhemukiye, Ntazanga kukwakira.
N’ ubw’ ujy’ umugayisha, Ntazakwirengagiza, Niwe nzira n’ umucyo, Ntazanga kukwakira, Azagusendahw’ ibyaha, maz’ usigar’ utunganye, Azagukiz’ urupfu, Ntabw’ azakwirengagiza.
Ngaho ngwin’ utiganda, Ntazanga kukwakira, Gana ku musaraba, Ntazanga kukwakira, Numara gusanga Yesu, Ntuzasubira mu byaha, Ngwino uhabw’ ubugingo, Butagir’ iherezo.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Uhoraho Iyo Nitegereje
verses: Uhoraho, Iyo nitegereje, Ibitangaza by’ ibyo wakoze, Ar’ izuba, N’ ukwezi n’ inyenyeri, N’ ibindi bintu byose waremye.
Mana nkunda, Iyo nitegereje, Igiti cyose mu byo waremye, Binyibutsa igiti cy’ i Kalvari, Umwana wawe yambambiweho.
Iyo numva inyoni ziririmba mu biti byiza yaturemeye, Urusobe rw’ amajwi yazo meza n’ urw’ amasumo biranezeza.
Igih’ ibyago bizaba bishize, Abera bose bagukikije, Tuzagusingiza iteka ryose, Kandi turamy’ Uwatwitangiye.
hymns.refrain: Nishimira kukuririmbira, Mana nkuru y’ urukundo Nishimira kukuririmbira, Mana nkuru, Y ’ urukundo.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Nzasa Na Yesu SP
verses: N’ ubw’ ibyiza by’ isi byancuka, Nzasa na Yesu, Ntacyo mw’ isi kizampindura, Nzasa na Yesu.
Nabohow’ ingoyi z’ umwanzi, Nzasa na Yesu, Nzarushaho kumukorera, Nzasa na Yesu.
Naba mw’ isi cyangwa mw’ ijuru, Nzasa na Yesu, Nzahora mbyamamaz’ iteka, Nzasa na Yesu.
Kugira ngo nzajye mw’ ijuru, Nzasa na Yesu, Kuko nifuza kuzashimwa, Nzasa na Yesu.
hymns.refrain: Nzasa na Yesu rwose, Niyo ndirimbo yanjye, Ndi hanze n’ imuhira, Nzajya nsa na Yesu.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Iyi Isi Niya Data
verses: Iy’ isi n’ iya Data, Kand’ iyo ntez’ amatwi, Numv’ ibiremwa bisingiza izina rye mu ndirimbo, Isi n’ iya Data, Mpora mbitekereza, Iby’ Uhoraho yaremye byose, Ni byiza bitangaje.
Iy’ isi n’ iya Data, Inyoni ziririmba, Umuseke wa mu gitondo, N’ impumuro y’ uburabyo, Ibimera byose, Hamwe n’ ibyo mw’ ijuru, Byose bigaragaz’ ububasha, N’ imbaraga ze nyinshi.
Iy’ isi n’ iya Data, N’ ubwo yuzuy’ ibyaha, Nta kizaganz’ imbaraga ze, Azahor’ ari ku ngoma, Isi n’ iya Data, Mbese nakwiganyira? Imana yac’ izahora ku ngom’ ibihe bidashira.
Iy’ isi n’ iya Data, Ntabwo nzabyibagirwa, N’ ubw’ ibyaha biyuzuyemo, Imana n’ umuyobozi, Isi n’ iya Data, Ni kuki nababara? Data niwe uri ku ngoma, Ijuru n’ isi byishime.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Isi N’ Ibiyirimo
verses: Isi n’ ibiyirimo, Byose n’ iby’ Imana, Twese tur’ ab’ Imana, N’ ubutunzi bwose, Imana ni nyir’ ibintu byose, Turi ibisonga byayo, Dukwiriye kuyitunganira, Tub’ ibisonga nyakuri.
Impano waduhaye, Ziguhesh’ ikuzo, Duhe kuzikoresha, Mu murimo wawe, Zijye zikugaragaza Mwami, Ahantu hose tunyura, Impano waduhaye Mukiza, Tuzikoresh’ umurimo.
Igihe waduhaye, N’ impan’ ikomeye, Tugikoreshe neza, Twitegur’ Umwami, Buri gihe tubane n’ Imana, Dukoresh’ igihe neza, Igihe Imana yaduhaye, Tugikoresh’ umurimo.
Yaduhay’ ubutunzi ngo tubukoreshe, Ibyo dutunze byose, Byose n’ iby’ Imana, Tube ibisonga yishimira, Dukiranukir’ Imana, Ibyo dutunze tubikoreshe, Umurimo w’ Uwiteka.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Bona N’ Ubwo Ngoswe N’ Ibicu
verses: Bona n’ ubwo ngoswe n’ ibicu, Kandi nkab’ inkehwe, Kandi nkaba ndembejwe n’ amaganya menshi cyane. Gubiramo: Nagira Yesu wenyine, Byose byatamuruka, Niwe zuba ryaka nk’ inyenyeri y’ i Betelehemu.
N’ ubw’ urugendo rwo mw’ isi rwantera gucogora, Najya gusingir’ uburabyo, Ngasingir’ amahwa. Gubiramo: Nagira Yesu wenyine, Byose byatamuruka, Niwe zuba ryaka nk’ inyenyeri y’ i Betelehemu.
N’ ubw’ umutima wanjye, Wazirikan’ Uwankunze, Bigatuma ngir’ agahinda, Kenshi nkababara. Gubiramo: Nagira Yesu wenyine, Byose byatamuruka, Niwe zuba ryaka nk’ inyenyeri y’ i Betelehemu.
Nzirikany’ icyubahiro, Ntegereje kwinjira, Navuga Yesu wenyine, Byose byatamuruka. Gubiramo: Nagira Yesu wenyine, Byose byatamuruka, Niwe zuba ryaka nk’ inyenyeri y’ i Betelehemu.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Intama Mirongo Cyenda N’ Icyenda
verses: Intama mirongo cyenda n’ icyenda, Zari mu kiraro cyazo, Imwe yazimiye yararagiye, Yagiye mu bihanamanga, Dor’ irazerera mu kidaturwa, Yasiz’ Umwungeri w’ impuhwe nyinshi, Yasiz’ Umwungeri w’ impuhwe nyinshi.

Ufite mirongo cyenda n’ icyenda, Mbese warets’ iyo Mwami, Aransubiz’ ati : Nayo n’ iyanjye, Ibarirwa mu ntama zanjye, Bona nahw’ inzira yakukumuka, Ndayikurikira mu kidaturwa, Ndebe ko nabasha kuyibonayo.

Nta muntu wamenya uko yarushye, N’ uko yambuts’ imigezi, Ryar’ ijoro ribi kandi ntaw’ uzi, Uko yataruy’ iyo ntama, Yumvis’ ijwi ryayo mu kidaturwa, Ntabwo yagirag’ uwayitabara, Rwose yar’ ishigaje hat’ igapfa.

Mwami nyerek’ inzira wanyuzemo, Mbone mw’ amaraso yawe, Yavuye ku bwacu twarazimiye, Maz’ utugarura mu bushyo, Nyereka za nkovu zo mu biganza, Wakomerekejwe muri ryo joro, N’ igihe bakwambikaga ya mahwa.

Ku misozi hose no mu bikombe, No ku bitare ku manga, Har’ ijwi rirenga ngo nimwishime, Intama yanjye yabonetse, Abamarayika bavuga bati: Nimwishim’ Umwam’ abony’ intama ye, Nimwishim’ Umwam’ abony’ intama ye.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Mu Gihugu Cyiza Twasezeraniwe
verses: Mu gihugu cyiza twasezeraniwe, Hariy’ ururembo rwera rw’ Imana, Tuzamuk’ imisozi tunaniwe, Tukarabukw’ aho tuzab’ iteka.
Mu bitabo by’ abahanuzi tubwirwa, Iby’ umudugudu wera w’ Imana, N’ inzira zaho zisizwe zahabu, Amazu yahw’ ararabagirana.
Abazajyayo n’ abizera bakeya, Bakomez’ amategeko y’ Imana, Tuzahora turangurur’ amajwi, Turirimb’ indirimbo z’ ibyishimo.
Mbese tuzahurirayo bene Data, Mu gihugu kirasirwa n’ izuba? Nimwemera ubutumwa bw’ Imana, Yesu n’ aza azabahamagara.
hymns.refrain: S. na A. : Tugeze hafi, Hafi y’ iwacu, Dore hararabagirana cyane, Har’ umucy’ uturuka mu marembo, Aho niho tuzab’ iteka ryose, Turirimbana n’ abamarayika, Turi hafi yaho. T. na B. : Tuge… tugeze y’ iwacu…, Hafi y’ iwacu, Dore hararabagirana cyane, Har’ umucy’ uturuka mu marembo, Aho niho tuzab’ iteka ryose, Turirimbana n’ abamarayika, Turi, turi hafi …ho.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Wiringir’ Umwam’ Imana
verses: Wiringir’ Umwam’ Imana, Kukw’ ari y’ izakuyobora, Izere Nyir’ imigisha, Niw’ uzagukenura.
Wiringir’ Umwam’ Imana, Umushukanyi nakwegera, Wiringir’ Umwam’ Imana, Ujy’ uyihungiraho.
Wiringir’ Umwam’ Imana, Mu birushya no mu makuba, Wiringir’ Umwam’ Imana, Yih’ umutwaro wawe.
Wiringir’ Umwam’ Imana, Mu mibereho yawe yose, Wiringir’ Umwam’ Imana, Kugez’ ahw azazira.
hymns.refrain: Izer’ uko yakubwiye, Yihang’ amas’ iteka ryose, Uyiringire ibihe byose, Niyo Mwungeri wawe.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Habuka Wa Mpabe We
verses: Habuka wa mpabe we, Urahamagarwa, Rek’ ibyaha byawe ngwino, Wikwinangira.
Umukiz’ arakwinginga, Ntiwinangire, Umv’ araguhamagara, Mukingurire.
Uraritswe n’ ubutumwa, We kwinangira, Bukuzaniy’ agakiza, Bukingurire.
We kwigomw’ umunezero, Ngo winangire, Nibw’ uzagir’ amahoro, Mukingurire.
hymns.refrain: Ngwino hakirih’ umucyo, Yes’ aragutegereje, Aramburiy’ amaboko, Abe bahabye.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Dutegerej’ Igitondo Cyiza
verses: Dutegerej’ igitondo cyiza, Tuzabon’ abacu twabuze, Nibwo bazakanguka, Tuban’ iteka ryose, Ntabwo tuzongera gutandukana.
Ubw’ impanda izaba ivuze, Ibituro bizakingurwa, Abera babivemo, Ntibazongera gupfa, Abera bazahabw’ indi mibiri.
Igitondo kiri hafi cyane, Bagenzi mwe bugiye gucya, Umucyo w’ itangaza, Uturasire twese, N’ umunsi w’ ihumure kuri twese.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Yesu Ni Umukiza Wanjye
verses: Yesu n’ Umukiza wanjy’ utangaje, Kuko andutira byose, Niwe wampagaritse ku Rutare, Mpaboner’ umunezero.
Yesu n’ Umukiza wanjy’ utangaje, Antur’ imitwaro yose, Arankomeza sinzanyeganyega, Kukw’ ahor’ ambumbatiye.
Ansesurahw’ imigisha nk’ ikamba, Anyuzuz’ ubugwaneza, Ndirimba ntikenga nsingiz’ Imana, Niyo Mucunguzi wanjye.
Ninambara kurabagirana kwe, Nibwo nzamusanganira, Nzajya ndirimbana n’ abacunguwe, Indirimbo y’ agakiza.
hymns.refrain: Niwe wampagaritse ku Rutare, Mu gihugu cy’ umutarwe, Kand’ ampisha mu rukundo rwe rwinshi, Andindish’ ukuboko kwe, Andindish’ ukuboko kwe.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Isi Ni Iy’ Uhoraho
verses: Isi n’ iy’ Uwiteka, Tumusingize twese, Imisozi n’ inyanja n’ ibirimo byose, Isi n’ iy’ Uwiteka, Bose bamuramye, Imidugudu n’ ibiyaga byose n’ ibye.
Isi n’ iy’ Uwiteka tuyibimenyeraho, Mpabe nimuhabuke mwe kuyob’ inzira, Isi n’ iy’ Uwiteka ntimugacogore, Umusaraba niwo watuneshereje.
Isi n’ iy’ Uwiteka, Itegeko n’ iri ngo: Mugende, Mwamamaze ubutumwa bwiza, Isi n’ iy’ Uwiteka, Ganz’ iteka Mwami, Amahanga yose ahor’ agusingiza.
hymns.refrain: Isi yose, Isi yose, Yamamaz’ ubutumwa bwiza bwa Yesu, Mutwar’ umusaraba, Mushing’ ibendera, Kugez’ ubw’ abantu bose bazihana. Amen. (Ku gice cya 3).
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Yes’ Arakomang ‘Ubu
verses: Yesu arakomang’ ubu, Mukingurire? Aringing’ umutima wanjye, Se mukingurire? Muri wo harimw’ ibyaha, N’umwijima n’ agahinda. Kristo ashaka ko musanga, Se mukingurire?
Se mubwiran’ urukundo, Mukingurire? Nakir’ uwo Mwami w’ ubuntu, Se mukingurire? Ntantererana na hato, Ambabarir’ ubugome. Mbese namwimura burundu, Cyangwa munambeho?
Umutima w’ ubwibone, Ndawukinguye. Mwakirany’ ibyishimo byinshi, Ndamukinguriye. Mukiza mwiza tubane, Undind’ ibishuko byose, Mb’ amahor’ iyo turi kumwe, Ngwino Mwami Yesu.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Nimushimir’ Imbabazi Za Yesu
verses: Nimwishimir’ imbabazi za Yesu, Kuko yatwicunguriye, Ntacyo twatinya Yes’ ashobora byose, Ni we Mukiza wacu.
Mukomerere mu Mwami wacu Yesu mub’ abakiranutsi, Mu kaga kose muhagarare mushikamy’ azabakomeza.
Nimwiringire Yesu mukomez’ amategeko ye by’ ukuri, Isi izashira arikw’ amategeko y’ azahorahw’ iteka.
Tuzibanira n’ Umwami wacu Yesu azaduh’ ubugingo, Kandi nta muntu wabasha kudutesh’ uwo Mukiz’ umez’ atyo.
hymns.refrain: Mbese ubw’ Imana, Iri mu ruhande rwacu, Umubisha wacu, Ninde, Ninde? Umubisha wacu, Se nde?
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Har’ Ijwi Rihamagara
verses: S. na A. : Har’ ijwi rihamagar’ abarushye, Mubamurikire Harihw’ abatabaza ngo bakizwe, Mubamurikire T. na B. : Har’ ijwi rihamagar’ abarushye, Mubamurikire, Harihw’ abataba za ngo bakizwe, Mubamurikire
S. na A.: Harihw’ abatabariza gukizwa, Mubamurikire, Tuzan’ amaturo ku musaraba, Ngo bamurikirwe. T. na B.: Harihw’ abatabariza gukizwa, Mubamurikire, Tuzan’ amaturo ku musaraba, Ngo bamurikirwe.

S. na A.: Ubuntu bwa Yesu bugwire hose, Mubamurikire, Kand’ Umwuka wa Yes’ ukwire hose, Mubamurikire. T. na B.: Ubuntu bwa Yesu bugwire hose, Mubamurikire, Kand’ Umwuka wa Yes’ ukwire hose, Mubamurikire.
S. na A.: Twe gucogorera gukora neza, Tubamurikire, Twitegurire kuzahabw’ ikamba, Tubamurikire. T. na B.: Twe gucogorera gukora neza, Tubamurikire, Twitegurire kuzahabw’ ikamba, Tubamurikire.
hymns.refrain: S. : Nimubamurikishirize umucyo w’ ubutumwa, Bamenyeshe ko Yes’ ariwe wabapfiriye bose. A.,T. na B. : Nimubamu... kishirize ...cyo bu....butumwa, Bamenyeshe Ye...riwe ....pfi...ye bose (bose).
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Mutim’ Ufit’ Intege Nke
verses: Mutim’ ufit’ intege nke, Harih’ uburuhukiro, N’ iwacu hadahinduka, Se ntiwifuza kubayo?
Ubw’ uzatur’ umutwaro, Ibyo mw’ isi birangiye, Uzashyikir’ agakiza, Tegerez’ utivovota.
Nib’ amahw’ ari mu nzira, Tekerez’ uwayambitswe, N’ ubabara wibuke k’ Uwera, Nawe yababajwe.
Ujy’ uhora wihanganye, Ntukibagirwe gusenga, Harih’ ubw’ uzaruhuka, Tegerez’ utivovota.
hymns.refrain: Wa munyantege nke we, Tegereza, Kandi nturambirwe, B’ uretse, Tegereza, Ntukivovote.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Ubugingo Bw’ Abantu
verses: Ubugingo bw’ abantu, Buhita nk’ igicucu, Imbere yawe Mwami Mana, Buhita n’ ingoga.
Umunt’ ab’ afit’ izina rimutey’ ishema, Imyaka yamara guhita, Rikibagirana.
Ya nyenyeri y’ Umukiza y’ i Betelehemu, Natw’ ibasha kutuyobora, Tukamugeraho.
Mwami Mana komez’ iyo nyenyer’ imurike, Umucyo way’ ukwire hose, Umwijim’ uhunge.
hymns.refrain: Ye ni koko, Burihuta, Rwose bwihuta nk’ igicucu, N’ iby’ ukuri nta mumaro, Ubugingo bwacu n’ ubusa.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Ndabatuwe Sinkibabaye
verses: Ndabatuwe sinkibabaye, Yesu ndaje, Yesu ndaje, Nje mu munezero iwawe, Ubu Yesu ndaje, Nje nifuza gufashwa nawe, Ngutuy’ intege nke zanjy’ unkize, Mvuye mu byaha nje nkugana, Ubu Yesu ndaje.
Nkijijw’ isoni sinihebye, Yesu ndaje, Yesu ndaje, Nemey’ umusaraba wawe, Ubu Yesu ndaje,Mvuye mu mibabaro y’ isi, Ubu ngeze mu mahoro yawe, Simbabaye ndanezerewe, Ubu Yesu ndaje.
Nkiz’ imiruho n’ ubwibone, Yesu ndaje, Yesu ndaje, Nje kuba mu mahoro yawe, Ubu Yesu ndaje, Nje kuba mu rukundo i wawe, Sinkihebye nje mu munezero, Nj’ ah’ uri nguruka nk’ inuma, Ubu Yesu ndaje.
Wamaz’ ubwoba bw’ igituro, Yesu ndaje, Yesu ndaje, Nje mu munezero w’ iwawe, Ubu Yesu ndaje, Wanyaruye mw’ irimbukiro, Ungeza mu mahor’ adashira, Ngo mpore nkureba mu maso, Ubu Yesu ndaje.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Ni Wowe Gusa
verses: Ni wowe gusa nkeneye, Ntaw’ undi Mwami. Har’ undi mfite mw ijuru, Mwam’ atari wowe?
N’ ubwo mfit’ inshuti nyinshi, N’ ibyiza byinshi, Utabirimo Mukiza, Nta mumaro wabyo.
Mbese harih’ umutima wuzuy’ ineza? Cyangw’ ijwi ryiza nakumva rikampumuriza?
Iby’ isi ntabwo byantanya nawe Mukiza, Ibyo mur’ iy’ isi byose, Nta mumaro wabyo.
hymns.refrain: Ni wowe (ni wowe), Ni wowe (ni wowe), Wanyerets’ urukundo, Ni wowe (ni wowe), Ni wowe(ni wowe), Ntaw’ uhwanye nawe.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Munsi Mwiza Wejejwe
verses: Munsi mwiza wejejwe, W’ icyumweru cyo kurema, Wagizw’ uwa karindwi, Wahiriwe n’ Imana.
Irangije kurema, Ishyiraho n’ Isabato, Iman’ irayihira, Natwe tuyiruhuke.
Benshi barwany’ Imana, Baruhuka kuwa mbere. Shaka mu Byanditsw’ urasanga nta habihamya.
Abanyakuri bazi ko wahinduwe n’ umuntu, Ntabw’ Ijambo ry’ Imana rikwiye guhinduka.
Nashatse mu Byanditswe, Nsang’ ariyo yategetswe. Mpera ko nyiruhuka, Kukw’ ari yo y’ ukuri.
hymns.refrain: Ngwino Sabato, Sabato nziza, Tuboner’ imigisha, Mu munsi w’ Uhoraho.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Gitare Kirekire
verses: Gitare kirekire njya mpungiraho, Ni wow’ umutima wanjye wifuza, Nd’ umunyantege nke nshaka kukwisunga, Wowe Gitare cyanjye, Nkwihishemo.
Ngiz’ imibabaro ku manywa y’ ihangu, Nizingiweho n’ ibigeragezo, Ndengewe n’ imiraba yiyungikanya, Wowe Gitare cyanjye, Nkwihishemo.
Umwanz’ anyibasiye ndi ku rugamba, Ni wowe mpungiraho nkaruhuka, Iyo nibasiwe n’ ibigeragezo, Niwe nihishamo, Gitare cyanjye.
hymns.refrain: Nkwihishemo, Nkwihishemo, Wowe Gitare cyanjye, Nkwihishemo.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Mpisemo Umukiza Yesu
verses: Mpisem’ Umukiza Yesu gusa, Kurut’ ubutunzi bwo mur’ iyi si, Andutir’ ifeza n’ izahabu, Ikiganza cye cyarambambiwe.
Mpisemo Yesu kurut’ ikuzo, No kumukorera nivuy’ inyuma, Andutir’ icyubahiro cy’ isi, Nkunda kwitirirwa izina rye.
Arush’ ibiremwa byos’ ubwiza, Anyur’ umutima kuruta byose, Azah’ umutima wanjy’ ibyiza, Nimwemerera akanyobora.
hymns.refrain: Rwose aho kub’ Umwami w’ isi, Ngaheranwa n’ ibyaha, Nahitamo Yesu mur’ iyi si, Niw’ undutira byose.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Amahoro Masa
verses: Umutima wanjy’ urasingiz’ Imana, Mu ndirimbo y’ umunezero, Nifitiy’ amahoro ava mw’ ijuru, Yuzuye mu mutima wanjye.
Nifitiy’ amahor’ arut’ ubutunzi, Yuzuye mu mutima wanjye, Kandi nta muntu wabasha kuyanyaga, Ntawe n’ aho yakwigir’ ate!
Yambereye ubuhungiro nijoro, Bituma mb’ uwa Yesu gusa, Nta cyampangara ku manywa na nijoro, Ntacyo rwose haba na gito.
Reka mvug’ ibya wa mudugudu mwiza, Uwo nzabona nkanezerwa, Mu ndirimb’ abera bazaharirimbir’ Imwe n’ iyi ngiyi wumva ngo:
N’ ubwo nanyuraga makuba y’ isi, Nkabur’ umunt’ umpumuriza, Umukiza wanjye n’ inshuti y’ ukuri, Yangoteshej’ amaboko ye.
hymns.refrain: Amahoro masa, Aturuka ku Mana gusa, Nyamuneka tungany’ ubugingo bwanjye, N’ urukundo rutarondorwa.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Yesu Niwe Niringira
verses: Yesu niwe niringira, Niwe butunzi bwanjye, Nzakwishingikirizaho, Kugez’ igihe nzapfa, Ni wowe umbeshejeho kuko ump’ amahoro, Ni wow’ ump’ umunezero, Ur’ ubuzima bwanjye.
Niba bikwiriye kureb’ umusaraba wawe, Ngira intungane nkunde amategeko yawe, Ntawe unaniza ngw’ akor’ ibyo adashoboye, Ntacyo wasaba ng’ umuntu abon’ icyakwitura.
Njye ndashaka kugendera mu mucyo wawe Yesu, Ngo nzazuke nigira iwawe mw’ ijuru heza. Aho niho hari igihugu nzabamw’ iteka, Niho Yesu azanyakira ari mu ngoro ye.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Igitekerezo Cyiza
verses: Igitekerezo cyiza cya Yesu Mukiza, Kivug’ uburyo yahoranye n’ abantu, N’ uko yahamagarag’ abana nk’ intama ze, Maze bigatuma nkumbura Yesu, Numva nifuza kw’ aba yaranshyizehw’ ibiganza, Ngw’ abe yaranzengurukij’ amaboko, Yemwe mba narahiriw’ iyo numv’ avug’ ati: Nimurek’ abana bato bansange!

Nzeger’ intebe ye ngo mutur’ amasengesho, Maze musabe kuba mu rukundo rwe, Kand’ uko ndushaho kumushaka mur’ iyi si, Nizeye ko nzamubona mw’ ijuru. Yagiye mw’ ijuru guteguray’ amazu meza, Azaturwamo n’ abacunguwe gusa. Abana benshi bazaba bateraniyeyo, Kuk’ ubwami bwo mw’ ijuru ar’ ubwabo.

Abantu benshi bazimiriye mur’ iyi si, Ntabwo barumv’ inkuru y’ iwacu heza, Ndifuza ko bamenya ko har’ umwanya wabo, Kandi Yesu niw’ ubahamagara. Ndifuza kuzishima kur’ uwo munsi mukuru, Uzab’ ar’ umuns’ urut’ iyindi yose. Ubw’ abana bo mw’ isi yose bazaterana, Akabaher’ umugish’ icyarimwe.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Urukundo Yes’ Ankunda
verses: Urukundo Yes’ ankunda, Rwatumy’ abambwa ku giti, Kugira ngo nkomeze kubaho, Ntawarurondora.
Uburyo yambabarijwe, Yambitsw’ ikamba ry’ amahwa, Kugira ngo nkomeze kubaho, Nta wabirondora.
Mfit’ amahoro muri we, Kukw’ ansabira kuri Se, Uko yankirishij’ amaraso, Nta wabirondora.
Iyo ndi kumwe na Yesu, Amber’ uburuhukiro, Ibyiringiro mfite muri We, Nta wabirondora.
hymns.refrain: Yankunz’ urukundo rwinshi ( urukundo rwinshi), Yankunz’ urukundo rwinshi ( urukundo rwinshi), Urukundo Umukiz’ ankunda, Nta warurondora.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Umwami Arakomanga
verses: Umwam’ arakomanga, Ashaka kubana nawe, Mbeg’ ibyishimo kubana nawe? Kingurira uwo Mwami.
Witinya kumusanga! Araguh’ ibyiringiro, N’ ibyishimo mu mutima wawe. Ese ntubona umucyo?
Kumwakira n’ ibyiza, N’ ukubabarirwa nawe, N’ ijuru Imana iguhaye, Araguha amahoro.
Ahagaze ku rugi, Ashak’ umutima wawe. Mbeg’ ibyishimo umwakiriye, Akakubera Umwami.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Reka Yesu Yinjire Mu Mutima Wawe
verses: Reka Yesu yinjire mu mutima wawe maz’ akuruhure, Niba wifuz’ ubugingo bushya, Umwakire mu mutima.
Nib’ ushaka ku mutunganira, Umwemerere akuzemo, Hafi yawe har’ isoko yeza, Sanga Yes’ agutunganye.
N’ ushaka kuzamuririmbira, Umwemerere akuzemo, Nib’ ushaka kuzabana nawe, Umwakire mu mutima.
hymns.refrain: Ubu wishidikanya, Reka kumwihakana, Muh’ umutima wawe, Wumwegurire burundu.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Umunsi W’ Umuzuko
verses: Umunsi w’ umuzuko, Umuns’ utangaje, Hazab’ umunezero, Tuzabon’ Imana, Abera bazakangurwa, Bazamurwe mu bicu, Baririmb’ indirimbo, Nziza yo kunesha.
Tuzezwa imitima, Tuzabona Yesu, Tuzabana n’ Imana mu mucy’ utazima, Tuzahora duhimbaza, Dushim’ Imana yacu, Yo yatuneshereje, Iduh’ agakiza.
Wa juru we ishime, Wa si we ririmba, Abanambye ku Mana, Baranesherejwe, Ibindi biremwa nabyo , Byishime binezerwe, Umwami wacu Yesu, Nasingizw’ iteka.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Ntukumvir’ Umubi
verses: Ntukumvir’ umubi ujy’ agushuka, Umwumviye wese ab’ acumuye, Wamutsinda none kubw’ Umukiza, Byagufash’ ubundi kujy’ umunesha.
Wirind’ ubucuti bw’ abantu babi, Bakunda kukoshya gukor’ ibibi. Ntukavug’ ijambo ritey’ isoni, Ujye wubaha izina ry’ Imana.
Ujy’ ugira neza, Ufash’ abandi, Wirinde kubeshya, Ahubw’ ujy’uba, Inyangamugayo kukw’ iby’ aribyo, Bikundwa na Yesu, Uzagufasha.
Unesha Satani yandikiwe ko, Azahabw’ ikamba n’ Umukiza we, Tugir’ intege nke, Ariko Yesu, Niwe Mutabazi, Udushoboza.
hymns.refrain: Saba Yes’ agufashe, Kand’ aguhumurize, Yemeye kukurinda, Azatum’ utsinda.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Nzabana N’ Umwami
verses: Nzabana n’ Umwam’ ibihe bidashira, Iryo jambo rivuga ngo: Nzatur’ ibudapfa, N’ ubwo nkingiranywe mur’ uyu mubiri, Buzacya negereje gutah’ iwacu heza.
Mu rugo rw’ Umwami ndahararikira, Kwizera niko kunyerek’ amarembo yaho, N’ ubwo njya ncogora s’ ukutahashaka, Iyo gakondo y’ abera ni Yerusalemu.
Njya ngotwa n’ ibyaha, Nkumva ndacogoye, Nka bur’ aho mfata nka ya numa yo mu nkuge, Ibicu byeyutse, Umukororombya, W’ ihumure urasira mu mutima wanjye.
Nkund’ izo ndirimbo zihora mw’ ijuru, Izo mw’ isi yacu ni nk’ indimi z’ i Babeli, Harihw’ icyo nkunda, Nukw’ abazazuka, Bazongera kubana na Yesu, Yee, Amina.
hymns.refrain: Iwacu, Iwacu, Ngeze hafi yaho.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Mwami Yesu Mugenga
verses: Mwami Yesu Mugenga w’ ibi bintu byose, Wambay’ ubumuntu ku bwacu, Ndakwiyeguriye nzakubaha, Kuk’ ur’ ikuzo n’ ikamba ryanjye.
Icyanya cyiza n’ amashyamba ni meza, N’ ibimera nabyo ni byiza, Yes’ urabirusha kand’ uraboneye, Uturuhur’ imitima.
Umucyo ni mwiza, Umwez’ ukawurusha, N’ umucyo w’ inyenyeri nuko, Yes’ urabirusha kand’ uraboneye, Kurush’ abamarayika.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Umwami Arahamagara
verses: Umwam’ arahamagara abasaruzi bitanze, Ibisarurwa bireze abasaruzi ni bake.
Nimwihute mutabare abari mu byaha bose, Mubatabaz’ amaboko muc’ ingoyi zibaboshye.
Nimumenyesh’ abakene nabo baze mu birori, Yes’ umutsim’ uhoraho yiteguye kubakira.
Nimwihute dor’ igihe cy’ isarura kirashize, Hagiye kuzab’ igihe tutazabasha gukora.
hymns.refrain: Nimuhaguruke mushikame, Mw’ izina ry’ uwo Mwami, Muvuge inkuru y’ agakiza, Muyamamaze hose.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Urukundo Rw’ Imana Yacu
verses: Urukundo rw’ Imana yacu, Nta muntu warurondora, Rusaguts’ ikirere cyose, Rugera no munsi y’ isi. Abantu bose bacumuye, Bacunguwe na Yesu, Umwana we wese wahabye, Yaramwicunguriye.
Ubw’ ibihe bizah’ ibindi, N’ ubwami bw’ isi bwashize, Abantu bakanga gusenga, Amabuy’ azaririmba. Urukundo rw’ Imana yacu, Ntabwo rurondoreka, Rwacunguy’ abo mw’ isi bose, Ruzaririmbw’ iteka.
Inyanja zose zaba wino, N’ ijuru ryab’ impapuro, Tukandikisha agati kose, Umuntu wes’ akandika, Urukundo rw’ Imana yacu, Rwakamy’ inyanja zose, Ntabwo rwabon’ aho rukwirwa, Rusaguts’ ikirere.
hymns.refrain: Mbeg’ urukundo rutangaje, Rutagir’ urugero, Abera bazaruririmba, Ibihe bidashira.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Umukiza Aragutegereje
verses: Umukiza aragutegereje, Ntiwamusanga none? Ntaby’ isi bigomba kumukuvutsa, Mbes’ ub’ uribaz’ iki ?
Nshuti ter’ intambw’ ugan’ Umukiza, Agutez’ ibiganza, N’ umwemerera arakuruhura, Muban’ iteka ryose.
hymns.refrain: Umukiz’ aragutegereje, Aragutegereje, Ngw’ arebe ko wemera gukingura, Mbeg’ ubury’ abyifuza.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Ubutumwa Bw’ Ubuntu
verses: Ubutumwa bw’ ubuntu bwanyuz’ umutima, Imana yadutangiy’ Umwana wayo.
Nkuko Mose yamanits’ inzoka ku giti, Niko Yesu yamanitswe ngo tubeho.
Numvise yuk’ ukor’ ibyaha wes’ azapfa, None ndahabutse kubw’ ijambo ryawe.
Yesu ntabwo yaje kuducirahw’ iteka, Ahubwo yaj’ atuzaniy’ agakiza.
Mwami ndakwinginz’ ongera kwizera kwanjye, Nakir’ iby’ ubutumwa bwawe bumbwira.
hymns.refrain: Ng’ umwizera wes’ adapf’ Ahubw’ ahabw’ ubugingo, Ahubw’ ahabw’ ubugingo bw’ iteka.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Hariho Uburuhukiro Muri Paradiso
verses: Hariho uburuhukiro muri paradiso, Ahatazab’ umubabar’ ukundi,Tuzahurirayo.
Hariy’ umudugudu mwiza utatswem’ umucyo, Aho nihw’ abakiranutsi bazibanira n’ Umwami.
Hariyo amakamba meza, Ayo tuzambikwa, Kristo yateguriy’ abamutegereje bihanganye.
Jy’ ukiranuk’ ibihe byose, Nubwo wabizira, Yesu yasezeranye kw’ azaguh’ ikamba ry’ ubugingo.
hymns.refrain: S. : Tuzateranirayo, Tuzahurirayo Kuri rwa ruzi, Tuzateranirayo, Mu musek’ igitondo gitangaje. A., T. Na B.: Tuzate..., nirayo, Tuzahurirayo Kuri rwa ruzi, Tuzate…nirayo, Mu musek’ igitondo gitangaje.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Mukristo Ube Maso
verses: Mukristo ube maso, Nturuhuke na hato, Akaga kari hafi, Usenge!
Ababisha b’ Imana bajya bakubikira, Baguciriy’ ibico, Usenge!
Kenyer’ intwaro zawe ku manywa na n’ ijoro, Dor’ umwanz’ arakaze, Ba maso!
Umv’ abatsinze kera iyo ntambar’ urwana, Barakubwira bati: Usenge!
Umva Umwami wawe, Yesu wagupfiriye, Niwe wategets’ ati : Wirinde!
Bik’ iryo jambo ryiza, Mu mutima wemera, Kandi unabikore usenga.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Mbese Wahereye Ryari?
verses: Mbese wahereye ryari uvugana n’ Umwam’ umutakambira? Mbese wahereye ryar’ usenga, Ugez’ ubw’ ukesh’ ijoro? Mbese wamaz’ igihe kingan’ iki wumva yuk’ utay’ umuruho? Se wamwit’ inshuti, Wamenye ryari, Kw’ akurind’ akakwitaho?

Mbese wahereye ryar’ upfukam’ useng’ Uhorah’ uri mw’ ijuru? Se wameny’ ute ko washubijwe, Akakurinda bugacya? Ukamenya ko wiriz’ uwo munsi, Mbese wamwit’ inshuti yawe? Mbese wamenye ryari kw’ akwitaho, Kandi akanakurinda?
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Igihe Cyo Kugaruka K’ Umwami
verses: Igihe cyo kugaruka k’ Umwami kiregereje rwose, Inyenyeri zicwekereye, Kubw’ umucyo w’ igitondo gitangaje.
Ibimenyetso byose byahanuwe kw’ izuba no ku kwezi, Birahamiriz’ umuntu wese ko kuza k’ Umwami kutwegereye.
Iki n’ igihe rwos’ itorero rikwiye guhaguruka, Kandi rikwiriye kuba maso, Kuko bidatinze bugiye gucya.
Nimusohoke mujye mu nzira ngari no mu nzira ntoya, Nimubwir’ ibirema n’ impumyi ko kuza k’ Umwami kutwegereye.
hymns.refrain: Mbes’ aho ntiburi hafi gucya! Mbes’ aho ntiburi hafi gucya! Mbese ntabw’ ubona k’ umusek’ utambitse! Mbese k’ ubanza bugiye gucya!
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Ye Byose Biba Byiza
verses: Ye byose biba byiza sinzatinya, Nkeney’ urukundo ruhebuje, Imiyaga n’ imigaru biratuza. Imana yacu y’ impuhwe nyinshi itwitaho.
Byose biba byiz’ Iman’ inyitaho, Munsi y’ amababa ye sintinya. Nta cyago cyankuraho amahoro ye. Iyo niringiy’ Imana mu mutima wanjye.
Biba byiza Yesu, Yabibwiy’ abe. Mukumbi wanjye muto ntutinye. Iman’ iri ku ngoma is’ irabizi. Isi n’ ijuru bizuzura ikuzo ryayo.
hymns.refrain: Mu mibabar’ idusagiriz’ ibyiza, Iradukunda. Iraturinda, Mu mibabar’ idukomez’ imitima, Kukw’ Imana yacu yumva gutaka kwacu, Irindira igihe cyayo kuzageza, Ku mperuka.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Harih’ Umunt’ Umwe
verses: Harih’ umunt’ umwe wapfuye ku bwanjye, Kandi ntibyari bikwiriye, Yemeye kujyanw’ ajya ku musaraba, Kubwo kumbabarir’ ibyaha.
N’ umugwaneza kand’ arankunda cyane, Yez’ umutima wanjy’ ibyaha, Sincirw’ urubanza, Mfit’ umudendezo, Kuko yambabariy’ ibyaha.
Nzabana n’ Umukiza akaramata, Nzajya ngendana naw’ iteka, Ndirimbish’ umunwa n’ umutima wanjye, Kuko nababariw’ ibyaha.
hymns.refrain: Byarabambwe byose, Byarabambwe byose, Yemw’ uko yabyikorey’ ubwe! Yemwe ngo arababara cyan’ ajyayo! Ajyanyweyo n’ ibyaha byanjye.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Yesu Araje
verses: Yes’ araje nimubyamamaze, Aje kujyan’ abo yacunguye, Azanywe no kwimik’ ingoma ye, Yesu agiye kuza.
Yes’ araj’ abapfuye bazuke, Maz’ abatoni be baterane, Bahurire nawe mu kirere, Yesu agiye kuza.
Yes’ azanywe no gukiz’ abera, Azanywe no gutang’ amahoro, Imibabaro yos’ izashira, Yesu agiye kuza.
Yes’ araje nk’ uko yabivuze, Ni bande batowe bamwizeye, Bamutegereje bari maso, Yesu agiye kuza.
hymns.refrain: Yes’ agiye kugaruka vuba, Yesu agiye kuza ( agiye kuza ), Nimubyamamaz’ ahantu hose, Agiye kugaruka.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Mfite Umukiza
verses: Mfit’ Umukiz’ ukomey’ undind’ iteka? Unyobor’ intambwe ngo ntayob’ inzira, Niw’ uyobora buri ntambwe y’ uhabye, Mbes’ ufit’ Umukiza nk’ uwo?
N’ Umukiza niringir’ ibihe byose, Mu byago n’ amakub’ ampor’ iruhande, No mu bishukw’ arandinda bitangaje, Mbes’ ufit’ Umufasha nk’ uwo?
Mfit’ Umwungeri mwiz’ ukund’ intama ze, Azihamagara mu mazina yazo, Azih’ ubwatsi bwiza n’ amazi meza, Mbes’ ufit’ Umwungeri nk’ uwo?
hymns.refrain: Mfit’ Umukiza umez’ atyo (atyo)! Se nawe n’ Umukiza wawe (wawe)? Yanyinjiyemo, Ntabwo ateze kumvamo, Se nawe n’ Umukiza wawe (wawe)?
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Ngwin’ Umukiz’ Aragushaka
verses: Ngwin’ Umukiz’ aragushaka, N’ inshuti nziza y’ ukuri, Ubu ngub’ aragutegereje, Arakwinginga ngwino.
Umv’ amagambo ye y’ ihumure, Yesu n’ inshuti y’ ukuri, Musange n’ isoko y’ ubugingo, Ntabw’ uzabur’ umwanya.
Umvir’ uwo Mwuk’ ukongorera, Wisuzugur’ uwo Mwami, Mwakire vuba witindiganya, Hahirw’ umwakiriye.
hymns.refrain: Umukiz’ ahagaze ku rugi, Gira bwang’ umusab’ imbabazi, Witindigany’ arategereje, Gira n’ ingoga ngwino.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Isengesho Ryanjye
verses: Isengesho ryanjye Mwami nyumvira, Nyobora mu nzira, Mu birushya byo mur’ ubu buzima, Jy’ umpor’ iruhande.
Har’ ibigeragezo byinshi mpura naby’ aho njya hose, Mfash’ umpe kub’ umunyakuri, Kandi mb’ umukiranutsi.
Igih’ ub’ ubuzima buzaba bugeze kw’ iherezo, Ndagusaby’ uzampe kubana nawe mu bwami bw’ ijuru.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Mfit’ Inyota Mwami
verses: Mfit’ inyota Mwami, Ndagukennye cyane, Mpembura Mukiza, Wowe soko nziza, Soko y’ ubugingo, Ngwin’ umurikire, Unyobore ( unyobore ), Nger’ iwawe.
Nd’ umugenzi Mwami, Ngenda mu butayu, Kandi mfit’ isari, Ndarushye Mukiza, Mpam’ amazi Mukiza, Maze nshir’ inyota, Kugez’ ubwo ( kugez’ ubwo), Ngez’ iwacu.
Iwacu mw’ ijuru, Ngiye kugerayo, Nzambikw’ ikamba Yesu yanteguriye, Nubw’ indushya, Ndi hafi kugera, Mu gihugu ( mu gihugu), Cy’ ihumure.
hymns.refrain: Buhungiro (buhungiro), Nihishamo (nihishamo), Ubwugamo (ubwugamo), Bw’ umugaru (bw’ umugaru), Murikira (murikira), Noye kuyoba (ne kuyoba), Kugez’ ubwo ( kugez’ ubwo ), Ngez’ iwacu.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Reb’ Ibimenyetso
verses: Reb’ ibimenyetso by’ urugendo, Reb’ ibimenyetso birashira, By’ imyak’ ishize by’ ubwami bune, Twe turi hehe, Reb’ urugendo.
Abasiriya bategets’ isi, Haz’ Abamedi n’ Abaperesi, Abagiriki batway’ iyi si, Haz’ Abaroma, Twe turi hehe?
Ko turi mu bihe by’ intege nke, Iby’ ibumba n’ icyuma byavanzwe, Nuko tuzareb’ uko bizaba Yes’ agarutse, Kwim’ ingoma ye.
hymns.refrain: Reba ibimenyetso by’ ubuhanuzi, By’ ibihe byashize by’ ubwami bune, Reba ibimenyetso by’ ubuhanuzi, Byose byarangiye.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Uwiteka N’ Umwungeri Wanjye
verses: Uwiteka n’ Umwungeri wanjye, Sinzakena na hato, Andyamisha mu cyanya cy’ iruhande rw’ amaz’ adasuma.
Asubiz’ intege mu bugingo bwanjye mu gihe ntebye, Anyobor’ inzira yo gukiranuka kubw’ izina rye.
Naho nanyura no mu gikombe cy’ igicucu cy’ urupfu, Sinzatiny’ ikibi cyose Mwami kuko ndi kumwe nawe.
Untunganiriza ameza mu maso y’ abanzi banjye, Unsize amavuta mu mutwe maze aratonyanga.
Kugirirwa neza n’ imbabazi bizanyomahw’ iteka, Nanjye nzaba mu nzu y’ Uwiteka ibihe bidashira.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Nari Nararohamye Mu Byaha
verses: Nari nararohamye mu nyanja y’ ibyaha, Nta byiringiro narimfite byo kuvamo, Maz’ Umukiza yumva gutabaza kwanjye, Ab’ ariw’ unkuramo none ndiho.
Muhay’ umutima wanjye mushikamyeho, Nzajya ndirimb’ iteka icyubahiro cye, Urukundo nyakuri nzajya nduririmba, Niwe nkesha kwizera n’ urukundo.
Mutim’ ubabaye reba Yes’ agukize, Niw’ uzakurokora, Mu murab’ ukaze, Ategek’ inyanja zose zikamwumvira, Arashaka kugukiz’ uyu munsi.
hymns.refrain: Urukundo rwankuyemo, Ubwo nari nabuze uwamfasha, Urukundo rwankuyemo, Nari nabuz’ umfasha, Mbona Yesu.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Mbega Igitambo!
verses: Mbega igitambo cy’ amaraso Y ‘ Umukiza, Wapfuy’ ari njy’ azira! Yambambiwe ku musaraba, Abitewe n’ ukw’ ankunda cyane, N’urukundo rutangaje Mwami wanjye, Kugira ngo wemere kubabara no kumfira.
Yasiz’ intebe y’ ubwami ya Se, Yemera kunyitangira ngo nkire, Nari mbuz’ epfo na ruguru, Imbabazi ze zirangoboka, Maz’ Urukundo rwe runter’ umunezero, Mperako mererwa neza mu mutima wanjye.
Nari maz’ igihe kirekire, Mboshywe n’ umwijima w’ ibyaha byanjye, Maze kumeny’ ineza yawe, Ngukurikira mfit’ ibyishimo, Kuko nari mbohowe ingoyi z’ ibyaha, Mperako ndahaguruka, Ndagukurikira.

Nta teka ncirwaho kuko ndi muri Yesu, Naw’ akab’ ari muri jye, Niwe nkesha kubaho kwanjye, Nkeger’ intebe ye ntacyo ntinya, Nkambikw’ ikamba mbikesha uwancunguye, Ntabwo nzahwema kumusingiz’ iteka ryose.
hymns.refrain: S. : Urukundo ruhebuje, Nirwo rwamuteye kumfira, Mbeg’ urukundo rutangaje, Ngo ruratum’ ancungura! A., T. na B. : Urukundo ruhebuje, Nirwo rwamute… kumfira, Mbeg’ uruku…rutangaje, Ngo ruratum’ ancungura.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Impanda Iravuze
verses: Impanda iravuze, Nimwumve, Nimwumve, Ivugira mw’ ijuru, Yesu araje, Wow’ uhunikira, Ngah’ umva, Ngah’ umva, Kanguka, Ubyuke, Umwam’ araje.
Ese ntimwumv’ impanda, Nimwumve, Nimwumve, Umugen’ arayumva, Yes’ ari hafi , N’ ibyishimo byinshi, Nimwumve, Nimwumve, Araririmb’ ati Yes’ ari hafi.
Impanda iravuze, Nimwumve, Nimwumve, Nimubyuke bwakeye, Umukw’ araje, N’ ibyishimo byinshi, Nimwumve, Nimwumve, Ngaho itegure, Dore araje.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Dufit’ Ibyiringiro
verses: Dufit’ ibyiringiro by’ ukuri, Ko Yesu azagaruka, Twizezwa n’ uk’ ubwe yabivuze, Twizer’ isezerano rye, Ubw’ amoko yo mw’ isi, Azarangurur’ ati: Haleluya, Yesu Kristo n’ Umwami w’ Abami, Twiringiye yuk’ Umwami wacu, Ari hafi kugaruka.

Duhuriye muri Yesu Kristo, Duhujwe n’ urukundo rwe, Abantu bifuz’ urukundo rwe, Rwatumy’ acungur’ abantu, Ijuru rizakinguka Kristo agaruke, Abantu baririmbe, Haleluya, Araje! Dufit’ ibyiringiro mu Mana, Twibumbiye muri Kristo.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Nkunda Igitabo Cyera
verses: Nkund’ igitabo cyera cy’ Imana, Nicyo kindutir’ ibindi byose, Kinyigish’ ibyiza byo mw’ ijuru, Nkameny’ inzira y’ agakiza.
Gitabo cy’ ingenzi muri wowe, Mpabon’ ubwiza bw’ Umwami wanjye, Ibyanditswe byawe binyigisha, Iby’ umunezero nzagira.
Ariko igihe nkiri mw’ isi, Umbwir’ iby’ urukundo rw’ Imana, Nkarushaho gusobanukirwa, N’ umunezero wo mw ijuru.
Ni wowe werekan’ imigambi, Yose ya Yes’ Umukiza wanjye, Muri wowe niho har’ ubwenge, N’ ubuhanga butarondorwa.
Ur’ umucy’ umurikir’ ab’ isi, Ngo bave mu mwijima w’ ibyaha, Ni wow’ umurikir’ imitima, Y’ abahabye bagahabuka.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Ku Musaraba
verses: Imbere y’ Uhoraho ntabwo nkorwa n’ isoni, Kand’ ijambo ryawe rinshimish’ ibihe byose.
Yesu Mana yanjye nzi yukw’ ari ryo zina rye, Ntazemerer’ umutima wanjye kuzimira.
Yasezeranye yukw’ intebe y’ izahoraho, Biragaragara kw’ ibyo yavuz’ ar’ ukuri.
hymns.refrain: Ku musaraba niho naboney’ umucyo, Mbona gutur’ umutwaro wanjye, Mbiboneshwa no kwizera Uherey’ ubu nzahora nezerewe.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Mana Yac’ Ur’ Umufasha
verses: Mana yac’ ur’ umufasha, Byiringiro byacu, Bwugamo bw’ umugaru, Niwe buturo bwacu.
Ku ntebe yawe y’ ubwami, Tubon’ amahoro, Iyo dutabawe nawe, Tugir’ ihumure.
Imisoz’ itarabaho, Is’ itarabumbwa, Kuva kera kose Mana, Ur’ uko wahoze.
Imyak’ igihumbi uyibona nk’ umuns’ umwe, Ni migufi nk’ isah’ imwe, Ihita ni ngoga.
Man’ ur’ umufasha wacu, Byiringiro byacu, Utuber’ umuyoboz’ uzatugez’ iwacu.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Ntabaza Yesu Iyo Mbabaye
verses: Ntabaza Yesu iyo mbabaya, Ankiz’ imibabaro yanjye, Mur’ iyo mibabaro nt’ ampana, Ahubw’ arantabara rwose.
Mu makuba yanjy’ arantabara, Kukw’ ari we nshuti y’ ukuri, Iyo mutabaj’ arantabara, Ankiz’ imibabaro yanjye.
Mbeg’ ukuntu iby’ isi binshuka, Bikanyoshya gukor’ ibyaha, Mbibwire Yesu kand’ azamfasha, Niw’ uzampa gutsind’ iby’ isi.
hymns.refrain: Ntabaza Yesu, Ntabaza Yesu, Kuko ntacyo nakwishoboza, Ntabaza Yesu, Ntabaza Yesu, Yesu gusa niwe wamfasha
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Mwuka Wera
verses: Aha hantu har’ amahoro, Kandi hari n’ Umwuka Wera w’ Uhoraho, Kandi n’ umuntu wese uhari, Afit’ umunezero mwinshi bihebuje.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Nzabon’ Umwami
verses: Nzabon’ Umwami wanjy’ aririmbirwa n’ abamarayika Tuzabana naw’ iteka ryose mu gihugu cy’ ibyiza.
Mur’ icyo gihugu cyiza nta joro rizabay’ ukundi. Nzabana n’ Umwami wancunguje amaraso y’ akiza.
Nzabana n’ Umwami wanjye nkunda nzamureba mu maso, Nzamuririmbira mushimira ubuntu yangiriye.
hymns.refrain: Tuzahorana ibihe byose, Yankirije i Kalvari Amaherezo nzabon’ Umwami wanyitangiye kera.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Icyampa Kugendana N’ Imana
verses: Icyampa kugendana n’ Imana, Mu nzir’ ijya mw’ ijuru, Nibyo byamber’ umucy’ ungeza, Ku Mwana w’ Intama.
Garuka, Mukunzi garuka, Ntumwa nziza y’ amahoro, Nang’ ibyaha byakubabaje, Bikantanya nawe.
Mbega ngo ndagir’ amahoro, Ntazigera nibagirwa! Ariko byansizemw’ imvun’ itakungwa n’ ab’ isi.
Icyo nagusimbuje cyose, Uko cyaba kiri kose, Mfasha nitandukanye nacyo, Ngusenge wenyine.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Nimumenyesh’ Abantu Bose
verses: Nimumenyesh’ abantu bose ko Yes’ ari hafi, Is’ imurikirwe n’ umucyo, Maze Yes’ agaruke.
Amahanga yasubiranyemo, Muyaburire, Is’ imurikirwe n’ umucyo, Maze Yes’ agaruke.
Bana b’ Imana, Nimuririmbe, Muyih’ ikuzo, Hahirw’ ababa maso, Bukarinda butandukana.
hymns.refrain: Nimusingiz’ uwo Mwana w’ Intama watambwe, Nimwamamaze ko Yes’ agiye kwima.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Nejejwe N’ Iri Turo
verses: Nejejwe n’ iri turo ntuy’ Umwami Yesu, Igitambo kizima nicyo jyew’ ubwanjye.
Mpaz’ ubugingo bwanjye, Nticuza, ntatinya, Kubw’ ubuntu bwawe warancunguye Mwami.
Yesu ngwin’ unyigishe wowe wancunguye, Nshaka kubana naw’ ibihe bidashira.
hymns.refrain: Akir’ ituro ryanjye We Mwana w’ Imana, Kand’ umanurire ku mucyo uv’ ahera.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Dusingiz’ Uwiteka
verses: Dusingiz’ Uwiteka, Tumushimir’ ineza ye, Kukw’ imbabazi ze nyinshi, Zizahorahw’ iteka.
Umuremyi wa byose, Uwakwij’ umucyo kw’ isi, Agir’ imbabazi nyinshi, Zizahorahw’ iteka.
Abibeshaho byose, Akabimar’ ubukene, Agir’ imbabazi nyinshi, Zizahorahw’ iteka.
Yahiriy’ ubwoko bwe, Ubwo bwari mu butayu, Agir’ imbabazi nyinshi, Zizahorahw’ iteka.
Ni nyir’ impuhwe nyinshi, Ameny’ ubukene bwacu, Agir’ imbabazi nyinshi, Zizahorahw’ iteka.
Tumusingiz’ iteka, Kubw’ imbabazi ze nyinshi, Ahoran’ impuhwe nyinshi, Zizahorahw’ iteka.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Kuber’ Iki Utindiganya?
verses: Kuber’ iki utindiganya? Yes’ aragushaka none, Haguruk’ uve mu mwijima, Aragukunda, Musange.
Igihe kirahita vuba, Uyu munsi niwo wawe, Reka Yes’ aguhumurize, N’ ubutunzi bw’ igiciro.
Ese ntiwumva mu mutima, Wuzuwe n’ Umwuka Wera? Ntiwifuza kumurikirwa na Yesu agukomeze.
Kuber’ iki wanga kwitaba? Urupfu rugusatira! Ngwino Yes’ akumurikire, Ngwin’ aragutegereje
hymns.refrain: Kuki? Kuki? Utamusang’ uyu munsi? Kuki? Kuki? Utamwitaba none?
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Ku Rutare Har’ Isoko
verses: Ku Rutare har’ isoko itemb’ imar’ inyota, Mugenzi ngwino kw’ isoko maz’ unywe ushir’ inyota. Gububiramo: Yesu niwe Gitare, Yaradupfiriye twese, Mugenzi ngwino kw’ isoko, Maz’ unywe ushir’ inyota.
Arahamagar’ ati: Ngwino kw’ isoko y’ ubuntu, Mugenz’ ufit’ inyota, Mbese ntiwakwitaba Yesu? Gububiramo: Yesu niwe Gitare, Yaradupfiriye twese, Mugenzi ngwino kw’ isoko, Maz’ unywe ushir’ inyota.
Munyabyaha ngwino Yesu akwambuts’ ubutayu, Umukiz’ aragutegereje, Ngwino umusange. Gububiramo: Yesu niwe Gitare, Yaradupfiriye twese, Mugenzi ngwino kw’ isoko, Maz’ unywe ushir’ inyota.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Ineza N’ Imbabazi
verses: Igihe nari nd’ inzererezi, Ngenda mu mwijima w’ ibyaha, Nih’ Umwungeri yantaruye, None ndi mu nzir’ ijy’ iwacu.
Ansubiz’ intege mu bugingo, Anyonger’ imbarag’ iteka, Anjyan’ ahar’ amaz’ atuje, Arind’ intambwe zanjye zose.
Mu gikombe cy’ umwijim’ ukaze, Umukiz’ azabana nanjye, Azanyoboz’ ukuboko kwe, Angez’ aho yanteguriye.
hymns.refrain: Ineza n’ imbabazi ze nibyo bizanyomaho, Iminsi yo kubaho kwanjy’ ibihe byose, Ineza n’ imbabazi ze nibyo bizanyomaho, Iminsi yose nzaba ndiho. Kandi nzaba mu nzu y’ Uwiteka iteka, Nzarira ku meza yanteguriye kera, Ineza n’ imbabazi ze nibyo bizanyomaho, Iminsi yose nzaba ndiho. ‘’Iminsi yose nzaba ndiho’’.(Ku gice cya 3).
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Yesu Ndagutakambiye
verses: Yesu ndagutakambiye, Kuk’ utantabaye napfa, Ungeze ku gakiza kawe, Unyakir’ uko ndi.
Ntabwo ngira kivurira, Arikw’ amaraso yawe, Niyo yangize uk’ ushaka, Unyakir’ uko ndi.
Sinabasha kwitegura, Nguhay’ imigambi yanjye, Unkize kubw’ izina ryawe, Unyakir’ uko ndi.
Dore Mwami nje ku birenge byaw’ ungir’ uk’ ushaka, Utungany’ umurimo wawe, Unyakir’ uko ndi.
hymns.refrain: Unyakir’ uko ndi, Unyakir’ uko ndi, Mwami wanjye warampfiriye, Unyakir’ uko ndi.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Yesu Niw’ Ujy’ Unyobora
verses: Yesu niw’ ujy’ unyobora, Amurikir’ inzira, Mu ntege nke zanjye zose, Yesu niw’ unyobora.
Yesu niw’ ujy’ undengera, Yamviriy’ amaraso, Kwizera igitambo cye, Byatumye mbabarirwa.
Anyezahw’ inenge zose, Igihe munambyeho, Amp’ ubugingo bw’ iteka, Ntadukana n’ urupfu,
Yanyishyuriy’ umwenda, Ufit’ igiciro cyinshi, Yanteguriye umwanya, Nzabana naw’ iteka,
hymns.refrain: Igihe munambyeho, Igihe munambyeho, Amp’ ubugingo bw’ iteka, Ntandukana n’ urupfu.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Mukiza Wanjye Nyobora
verses: Mukiza wanjye, Nyobor’ ah’ ushaka, Mfat’ ikiganza maze nkumve bugufi, N’ ubw’ amahwa yampanda, Ngukurikire, Nyobor’ ah’ ushaka, Mukiza wanjye.
Mukiza wanjye, Nyobor’ ah’ ushaka, Ukomez’ undinde unampumurize, N’ ubw’ umwijima wab’ umbudits’ imbere, Ntabwo nzatiny’ unyoboye Mukiza.
Njyan’ ah’ ushaka Mwam’ icyo ngusaba, Nyuza mu nzira ntoya ne guteshuka, Nubwo Satan’ anyoshya anyongorera, Mfasha njye nsubiza bwangu mpakana.
hymns.refrain: S : Nzagukurikira hose, Mukiza wanjye, Ngukurikire, Nzagukurikira Mukiza unyobore. A.,T. na B. : Nzagukuriki… ,…gukurikira hose, Mukiza wanjye, Ngukurikire, Nzagukuriki…,…rikira unyobore, …za unyobore , nyobora.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Shimwa Ntama Y’ Imana
verses: Shimwa Ntama y’ Imana, Turagushima Ntama, Shimwa Ntama y’ Imana, Turagushima cyane.
Ubwami bwawe buze, Dutsindire icyaha, Waradukunze cyane, Shimwa Ntama y’ Imana.
Tukunambeho Mwami, Tujye tuguh’ ikuzo, Turi kumwe n’ Umwami, Ku musozi Siyoni.
hymns.refrain: Shimwa haleluya, Shimwa haleluya, Singizwa Mukiza, Wowe Ntama y’ Imana.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Nzahimbaza Imana
verses: Nzahimbaz’ Imana mfite umutima unyuzwe, Kubw’ urukundo rwawe n’ imbabazi wangiriye, Mfasha mu ntege nke zanjye, Unsindire icyaha. Murikir’ umutima wanjye, Nguhimbaze Mwami.
Mutima wanjye umvira, Wubahe Uwiteka, Ungarure hafi yawe, Ne kuyoba Mukiza, Narazimiye, Mvana mu nzira y’ urupfu Mwami. Wampaye ibyiringiro igihe wapfiraga.
Mfukamye imbere yawe, Ngushima Mwami wanjye, Ndakwinginze Mwami mpa umugisha uyu munsi, Nkeney’ urukundo n’ ubuntu biva kuri wowe. Maz’ imibereho yanjye ijy’ iguhesh’ ikuzo.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Yesu Araguhamagara!
verses: Yes’ arahamagara, Munyabyaha ngwino, Ubu turagusabira, Nyamuna ngwino, Arakwiteze munyabyaha, Ngwino, Ngwino, N’ igihe cyo kumumenya, Nyamuna ngwino.
Nib’ uremerewe n’ ibyaha, Ngwino, Ngwino, Yesu aragutur’ uwo mutwaro ngwino, Yesu n’ umunyebambe, Munyabyaha ngwino, Niwe wagucunguye, Munyabyaha ngwino.
Umv’ ubury’ akwinginga, Munyabyaha ngwino, Ngwin’ araguh’ umugisha, Nyamuna ngwino, Araguhamagara, Munyabyaha ngwino, Ubu turagusabira, Nyamuna ngwino.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Ndi Mu Maboko Akiza
verses: Iy’ Umukiza wanjy’ anyoboye, Uko ndi kose ngir’ amahoro, Ankirish’ umuraba w’ ibyaha, Amaboko y’ akiza.
Ahor’ andamiz’ amaboko ye, Akanambwiz’ ijwi ry’ ihumure, Ati: Humura, Nzakuramiza, Amaboko akiza.
Azandinda anyobor’ iteka, Ntacyo nzatinya ndi kumwe nawe, Nzi kw’ ahor’ andind’ iteka ryose, Ndi mu mabokw’ akiza.
hymns.refrain: S. na A. : Ndi mu mabokw’ akiza, Amaboko y’ akiza, N’ ubwo naba ngeze no mu kaga, Ndi mu mabokw’ akiza. T. na B. : Ndi mu mabo... ...kw’ aki...mabokw’ akiza, Amaboko akiza ....mabokw’ akiza, N’ ubwo naba ngeze no mu kaga, Ndi mu mabokw’ akiza.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Manyur’ Umutsima
verses: Manyur’ umutsima w’ ubugingo, Nk’ uko wabigize mu kibaya, Natw’ uduhaz’ Ibyanditswe Byera, Turakwifuza Jambo rizima.
Mwami hir’ ukuri menyeshejwe, Nk’ uko wahiriye wa mutsima, Uri ku nyanja y’ i Galilaya, Mbeshweho naw’ Ushobora byose.
Mwam’ ur’ umutsima w’ ubugingo, Ijambo ryawe rimbeshejeho, Mpa guhazwa naryo tuzabane, Mpa kugukunda nzabane nawe.
Amagamb’ uvuga n’ ubugingo, Mfasha ngo nyumvire, jye nta ntege, Ni wowe nkesh’ ubugingo bwanjye, Ijambo ryawe rimpa gutsinda.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Nakurikiye Yesu
verses: Nakurikiye Yesu mu kibaya akiz’ abarwayi, Ac’ iminyururu y’ ibyaha no kuruhur’ imitwaro.
Namukurikiye ku musoz’ igihe yahindurwaga, Imana iravuga iti: Ur’ Umwana wanjye nkunda.
Namukurikiy’ i Kalvari, Agend’ atukwa na benshi, Akomez’ inzira y’ Umwanzi, Yikorey’ umusaraba.
Nzamukurikira nkiriho, Maz’ atume mpora nesha, Kugez’ ubwo nzager’ iwacu ahahor’ umunezero.
hymns.refrain: S.: Mbega ngo biranezeza gukurikira Yesu, Akanyoboz’ ubuntu bwe akangeza mw’ ijuru. A., T., B.: Mbega ngo biranezeza, …rikira, …ra Yesu, Akanyoboz’ ubuntu bwe, …kangeza; Mw’ ijuru.
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Nabony’ Umuntu Unaniwe
verses: Nabony’ umunt’ unaniwe, Kand’ agenda yihanganye, Yikorey’ umusaraba, Nyamara ntabwo yari yihebye, Imibabar’ iba myinshi! Arik’ uw’ urahebuje! Mubaz’ ikimuh’ intege, Ati: Nuko mfit’ ibyiringiro.

Nabony’ afite n’ intwaro, Arwany’ iby’ is’ ashikamye, Kand’ arwan’ amaramaje ngw’ azabon’ ikamba rihoraho, N’ ubwo yari yarenganye, Ntiyigeze yivovota, Mubaz’ ikimuh’ intege, Ati: Nuko mfit’ ibyiringiro.
Nabony’ uwasiz’ inshuti ze, Bakundanaga cyane, Atandukana n’ iby’ isi, Ahitamw’ inzir’ imuruhije, N’ ubw’ irimw’ ibibabaza, Arikw’ ariyumanganya, Mubaz’ ikimuh’ intege, Ati: Nuko mfit’ ibyiringiro.

Tur’ abagenzi mur’ iyi si, Y’ akaga n’ agahinda, Irimw’ ibyago n’ urwango, N’ ibituro byuzuye mw’ abantu, Kugez’ ubwo Krist’ azaza, Akarokor’ abe bose, Se, n’ iki cyadukomeza, Atar’ ibyiringiro bishyitse?
hymns.author: Arranged

hymns.title: Mugenzi Komera
verses: Mugenzi komera Yes’ ari hafi, Twamutegereje kera, Tugiye kwitahir’ iwacu heza, Turirimbe ko dutsinze, Twihangane twe kumuhemukaho, Kandi w’ ataduhemukiye, Yatwerets’ urukundo ruhebuje, Nirwo rwatumy’ adupfira.
Mugenzi komera, Utegerez’ umudugudu w’ izahabu, Wateguriwe abakiranutsi, Niho tuzaruhukira, Ihangane ntabwo tuzagum’ aha, Mu buhanya no mu miruho, Harubw’ umwijim’ uzatamuruka, Igitondo gitangaze.

Mugenzi komera dore araje, Uwo Muremyi wa byose, Azanye n’ abamarayika benshi, Azanye n’ ingororano, Ihangan’ ugez’ igih’ Umukiza, Azakubwir’ aya magambo, Ngo mugaragu mwiz’ ukiranuka, Igire mu munezero.

Mugenzi ujy’ uhora wihanganye, Komeza kwizera kwawe, Amarira yawe ahanagurwe maz’ uzahabwe n ‘ ikamba, Ihangane mwene Data ni koko, Isezerano rye n’ impamo, Uzibanirayo n’ abakijijwe, Na Yes’ Umukiza wacu.
hymns.author: Arranged
